context: Chitetezo cha Panthers chinapereka mfundo 308 zokha, zomwe zili pachisanu ndi chimodzi mu mgwirizano, pomwe zikutsogoleranso NFL pazopinga ndi 24 ndikudzitamandira zosankha zinayi za Pro Bowl. Pro Bowl yodzitetezera Kawann Short adatsogolera gululi m'matumba ndi 11, pomwe akukakamizanso ma fumbles atatu ndikuchira awiri. Mnzake wa lineman Mario Addison adawonjezera matumba 61/2. Mzere wa Panthers unalinso ndi katswiri wodzitetezera Jared Allen, wothamanga wa nthawi ya 5 yemwe anali mtsogoleri wa thumba la ntchito ya NFL ndi 136, pamodzi ndi mapeto oteteza Kony Ealy, yemwe anali ndi matumba a 5 mu zoyambira 9 zokha. Kumbuyo kwawo, awiri mwa Panthers atatu oyambira linebackers adasankhidwanso kuti azisewera mu Pro Bowl: Thomas Davis ndi Luke Kuechly. Davis adasonkhanitsa matumba a 51/2, ma fumbles anayi okakamiza, ndi zopinga zinayi, pomwe Kuechly adatsogolera gululi pazida (118) adakakamiza ma fumbles awiri, ndipo adalanda njira zinayi zake. Wachiwiri wa Carolina adawonetsa chitetezo cha Pro Bowl Kurt Coleman, yemwe adatsogolera gululi ndi ntchito yapamwamba kwambiri zisanu ndi ziwiri, pomwe adakhalanso ndi 88 tackles ndi Pro Bowl cornerback Josh Norman, yemwe adakula kukhala ngodya yotseka pa nyengoyi ndipo anali ndi zopinga zinayi, ziwiri zomwe zinabwezeretsedwa kuti zikhudze.

context: Ndi 4: 51 yotsala mu lamulo, Carolina adapeza mpira pamzere wawo wa 24-yard ndi mwayi wokwera galimoto yopambana masewera, ndipo posakhalitsa adakumana ndi 3rd-ndi-9. Pa sewero lotsatira, Miller adachotsa mpira kuchoka kwa Newton, ndipo pambuyo pa osewera angapo nkhunda, zinatenga nthawi yayitali kubwerera kumbuyo ndipo adachira ndi Ward, yemwe adaubwezera mamita asanu ku mzere wa Panthers 4-yard. Ngakhale osewera angapo adadumphira mu mulu kuti ayese kuchira, Newton sanachite ndipo kusowa kwake nkhanza pambuyo pake kunamupangitsa kutsutsidwa kwakukulu. Pakadali pano, zolakwa za Denver zinasungidwa kunja kwa malo omaliza kwa masewera atatu, koma chilango chogwira pa cornerback Josh Norman chinapatsa Broncos ndondomeko yatsopano ya downs. Kenaka Anderson adapeza pa 2-yard touchdown kuthamanga ndipo Manning adamaliza kudutsa kwa Bennie Fowler kuti atembenuke 2-point, kupereka Denver kutsogolera 24-10 ndi 3: 08 yotsala ndipo kwenikweni kuyika masewerawa. Carolina anali ndi magalimoto ena awiri, koma analephera kupeza woyamba pansi pa aliyense.

context: Pafupi, ku Ogród Saski (Saxon Garden), Summer Theatre inali kugwira ntchito kuyambira 1870 mpaka 1939, ndipo munthawi yapakati pa nkhondo, zisudzo zinaphatikizaponso Momus, cabaret yoyamba yolemba mabuku ku Warsaw, ndi Leon Schiller's musical theatre Melodram. Wojciech Bogusławski Theatre (1922-26), inali chitsanzo chabwino kwambiri cha "zisudzo zazikulu za ku Poland". Kuyambira pakati pa zaka za m'ma 1930, nyumba ya Great Theatre inali ndi Upati Institute of Dramatic Arts - sukulu yoyamba yoyendetsedwa ndi boma ya zojambulajambula, yokhala ndi dipatimenti yochita zisudzo komanso dipatimenti yotsogolera siteji.

context: Otsutsa awo am'deralo, Polonia Warsaw, ali ndi othandizira ochepa kwambiri, komabe adakwanitsa kupambana Ekstraklasa Championship mu 2000. Anapambananso mpikisano wa dzikolo mu 1946, ndipo adapambana chikho kawiri. Malo a kunyumba kwa Polonia ali ku Konwiktorska Street, kuyenda kwa mphindi khumi kumpoto kuchokera ku Old Town. Polonia adachotsedwa pa ndege yapamwamba kwambiri mdziko muno mu 2013 chifukwa cha mavuto awo azachuma. Tsopano akusewera mu ligi ya 4 (5th tier ku Poland) -ligi yapansi ya akatswiri mu National - Polish Football Association (PZPN) dongosolo.

context: Pa moyo wake wonse, Warsaw wakhala mzinda wa zikhalidwe zosiyanasiyana. Malinga ndi kalembera wa 1901, mwa anthu 711,988 56.2% anali Akatolika, 35.7% Ayuda, 5% Akhristu a Greek Orthodox ndi 2.8% Apulotesitanti. Zaka zisanu ndi zitatu pambuyo pake, mu 1909, panali Ayuda 281,754 (36.9%), Apulotesitanti 18,189 (2.4%) ndi 2,818 Mariavites (0.4%). Zimenezi zinachititsa kuti pakhale kumangidwa kwa malo ambirimbiri olambirira achipembedzo m'mbali zonse za tauniyo. Ambiri a iwo anawonongedwa pambuyo pa kuwukira kwa Warsaw mu 1944. Nkhondoyo itatha, akuluakulu atsopano achikomyunizimu a ku Poland analetsa kumanga tchalitchi ndipo ndi ochepa chabe amene anamangidwanso.
question: Kodi Warsaw yakhala mzinda wamtundu wanji kwa nthawi yayitali yomwe yakhala mzinda?

Nkhondoyo itatha, akuluakulu atsopano achikomyunizimu a ku Poland analetsa kumanga tchalitchi ndipo ndi ochepa chabe amene anamangidwanso.

context: Gawo lalikulu la kugawidwa kwa dera ku Poland ndi commune (gmina). Mzinda ulinso commune - koma ndi chikalata cha mzinda. Mizinda yonse ndi ma commune amayang'aniridwa ndi meya - koma m'maboma meya ndi vogt (wójt mu Chipolishi), komabe m'mizinda - burmistrz. Mizinda ina ikuluikulu imapeza ufulu, mwachitsanzo ntchito ndi mwayi, zomwe zili ndi mayunitsi a gawo lachiwiri la gawo la dera - zigawo kapena powiats. Chitsanzo cha ufulu woterewu ndi kulembetsa galimoto: gmina sangathe kulembetsa magalimoto, iyi ndi ntchito ya powiat (mwachitsanzo nambala yolembetsa imadalira zomwe powiat galimoto idalembedwa, osati gmina). Pankhaniyi timanena za mzinda wa county kapena powiat grodzki. Mizinda yotereyi ndi mwachitsanzo Lublin, Kraków, Gdańsk, Poznań. Ku Warsaw, zigawo zake zilinso ndi zina mwa zoyenera za powiat - monga kulembetsa magalimoto omwe atchulidwa kale. Mwachitsanzo, chigawo cha Wola chili ndi umboni wake ndipo chigawo cha Ursynów - chake (ndipo magalimoto ochokera ku Wola ali ndi mtundu wina wa nambala yolembetsa kuposa awa ochokera ku Ursynów). Koma mwachitsanzo zigawo za ku Kraków zilibe ufulu wa powiat, choncho manambala olembetsa ku Kraków ndi amtundu wofanana ndi zigawo zonse.

context: Malo ogulitsira katundu woyamba ku Warsaw adakhazikitsidwa mu 1817 ndipo adapitilizabe kugulitsa mpaka nkhondo yachiwiri yapadziko lonse. Idakhazikitsidwanso mu Epulo 1991, pambuyo pa kutha kwa ulamuliro wachikomyunizimu pambuyo pa nkhondo mdziko muno komanso kubwezeretsedwanso kwa chuma cha msika waufulu. Masiku ano, Warsaw Stock Exchange (WSE) ndi, malinga ndi zizindikiro zambiri, msika waukulu kwambiri m'derali, ndi makampani a 374 omwe adalembedwa ndi ndalama zonse za 162 584 mln EUR kuyambira pa 31 August 2009. Kuyambira 1991 mpaka 2000, malo ogulitsira katundu anali, mochititsa chidwi, omwe anali m'nyumba yomwe kale inagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati likulu la Polish United Workers' Party (PZPR).

text: Chipani cha Ogwira Ntchito ku Poland

context: Rollo asanafike, anthu ake sanasiyane ndi Picardy kapena Île-de-France, omwe ankaonedwa kuti ndi "Frankish". Poyamba atsamunda a Viking adayamba kufika m'zaka za m'ma 880, koma adagawidwa pakati pa makoloni kum'mawa (Roumois ndi Pays de Caux) mozungulira chigwa chotsika cha Seine ndi kumadzulo ku Cotentin Peninsula, ndipo adalekanitsidwa ndi pagii yachikhalidwe, pomwe anthu adakhalabe ofanana pafupifupi popanda atsamunda akunja. Magulu a Rollo omwe adaukira ndipo pamapeto pake adakhazikika Normandy ndi madera ena a gombe la Atlantic adaphatikizapo Danes, Norwegians, Norse-Gaels, Orkney Vikings, mwina a Sweden, ndi Anglo-Danes ochokera ku English Danelaw pansi pa ulamuliro wa Norse.
question: Ndani atafika adapatsa atsamunda oyambirira a Viking chizindikiritso chofanana?

context: Mabanja awiri otchuka kwambiri a Norman omwe adafika ku Mediterranean anali mbadwa za Tancred waku Hauteville ndi banja la Drengot, omwe Rainulf Drengot adalandira chigawo cha Aversa, woyamba Norman kum'mwera, kuchokera kwa Duke Sergius IV waku Naples mu 1030. Banja la Hauteville lidakwaniritsa udindo wachifumu polengeza kalonga Guaimar IV waku Salerno "Duke of Apulia ndi Calabria". Nthawi yomweyo adapatsa mtsogoleri wawo wosankhidwa, William Iron Arm, udindo wowerengera likulu lake la Melfi. Banja la Drengot pambuyo pake lidafika ku ufumu wa Capua, ndipo mfumu Henry III idalemekeza mwalamulo mtsogoleri wa Hauteville, Drogo, monga "dux et magister Italiae comesque Normannorum totius Apuliae et Calabriae" ("Duke ndi Master of Italy ndi Count of the Normans of all Apulia and Calabria") mu 1047.

context: Anthu a ku Norman atangoyamba kulowa ku Italy, analowa mu Ufumu wa Byzantine kenako ku Armenia, kumenyana ndi a Pecheneg, a Bulgar, ndipo makamaka a Seljuk Turks. Asilikali a Norman anayamba kulimbikitsidwa kubwera kum'mwera ndi a Lombards kuti akachitepo kanthu motsutsana ndi a Byzantine, koma posakhalitsa anamenya nkhondo mu utumiki wa Byzantine ku Sicily. Iwo anali otchuka pamodzi ndi magulu a Varangian ndi Lombard mu kampeni ya Sicilian ya George Maniaces mu 1038-40. Pali mkangano wakuti ngati a Norman mu utumiki wachigiriki analidi ochokera ku Norman Italy, ndipo tsopano zikuwoneka kuti ndi ochepa okha omwe adachokera kumeneko. Sizikudziwikanso kuti ndi angati a "Franks", monga momwe a Byzantine adawatchulira, anali a Norman osati anthu ena aku France.
question: Kodi mdani wamkulu wa Normans ku Italy, Ufumu wa Byzantine ndi Armenia anali ndani?

context: Anthu ena a ku Norman anagwirizana ndi magulu ankhondo a ku Turkey kuti athandizire kuwononga maboma a Armenia a Sassoun ndi Taron kum'mawa kwambiri kwa Anatolia. Pambuyo pake, ambiri anayamba kukatumikira m'boma la Armenia kum'mwera kwa Kilikiya ndi mapiri a Taurus. Munthu wina wa ku Norman dzina lake Oursel anatsogolera gulu la "Franks" m'chigwa chakumtunda cha Firate kumpoto kwa Syria. Kuyambira 1073 mpaka 1074, 8,000 mwa asilikali 20,000 a mkulu wa asilikali a ku Armenia Philaretus Brachamius anali a Normans—omwe kale anali a Oursel—motsogozedwa ndi Raimbaud. Iwo ngakhale anabwereka fuko lawo ku dzina la nyumba yawo yachifumu: Afranji, kutanthauza "Franks." Malonda odziwika pakati pa Amalfi ndi Antiokeya komanso pakati pa Bari ndi Tarso atha kukhala okhudzana ndi kukhalapo kwa Italo-Normans m'mizinda imeneyo pomwe Amalfi ndi Bari anali pansi pa ulamuliro wa Norman ku Italy.

context: Tesla anali wotchuka chifukwa cha zomwe adachita komanso kuwonetsera, pamapeto pake adamupatsa mbiri mu chikhalidwe chotchuka ngati archetypal "wasayansi wamisala". Ma patent ake adamupatsa ndalama zambiri, zambiri zomwe zidagwiritsidwa ntchito popereka ndalama za ntchito zake ndi kupambana kosiyanasiyana.:121,154 Anakhala nthawi yambiri ya moyo wake m'mahotela osiyanasiyana ku New York, kudzera pantchito yake. Tesla adamwalira pa 7 Januware 1943. Ntchito yake inagwera mosadziwika pambuyo pa imfa yake, koma mu 1960 Msonkhano Waukulu pa Zolemera ndi Miyeso unatcha gawo la SI la maginito flux density tesla mu ulemu wake. Pakhala kuyambiranso kwa chidwi cha anthu ku Tesla kuyambira m'ma 1990.

context: Mu 1900, Tesla adapatsidwa ma patent a "dongosolo lotumizira mphamvu zamagetsi" ndi "transmitter yamagetsi." Pamene Guglielmo Marconi adapanga wailesi yake yotchuka yoyamba ya transatlantic mu 1901, Tesla quipped kuti zinachitidwa ndi eni luso a 17 Tesla, ngakhale kuti pali zochepa zothandizira zonena izi. Ichi chinali chiyambi cha zaka za nkhondo za patent pa wailesi ndi ma patent a Tesla omwe akuchirikizidwa mu 1903, kenako chigamulo chobwezera mokomera Marconi mu 1904. Mu 1943, chigamulo cha Khoti Lalikulu la United States chinabwezeretsa ma patent oyambirira a Tesla, Oliver Lodge, ndi John Stone. Khotili linalengeza kuti chigamulo chawo sichinakhudze zonena za Marconi monga woyamba kukwaniritsa kufalitsa kwa wailesi, kungoti popeza zonena za Marconi za ma patent ena zinali zokayikitsa, sakanatha kunena kuti akuphwanya ma patent omwewo (pali zonena kuti khoti lalikulu linali kuyesa kuthetsa nkhondo yoyamba yapadziko lonse yotsutsana ndi boma la United States ndi kampani ya Marconi kudzera pongobwezeretsa setifiketi ya Tesla yoyambirira).

context: Ku United States, boma lililonse limasankha zofunikira kuti mupeze chilolezo chophunzitsa m'masukulu aboma. Chitsimikizo chophunzitsira nthawi zambiri chimatenga zaka zitatu, koma aphunzitsi amatha kulandira zikalata zomwe zimakhala zaka khumi. Aphunzitsi a sukulu zaboma amafunika kukhala ndi digiri ya bachelor ndipo ambiri ayenera kutsimikiziridwa ndi boma lomwe amaphunzitsa. Sukulu zambiri za hayala sizifuna kuti aphunzitsi awo akhale ovomerezeka, malinga ngati akwaniritsa miyezo kuti akhale oyenerera kwambiri monga momwe bungwe la No Child Left Behind linakhazikitsa. Kuphatikiza apo, zofunikira za aphunzitsi othandizira / osakhalitsa nthawi zambiri sizikhala zovuta ngati za akatswiri anthawi zonse. Bungwe la Bureau of Labor Statistics likuyerekezera kuti pali aphunzitsi a sukulu za pulayimale okwana 1.4 miliyoni, aphunzitsi a sukulu zapakati 674,000, ndi aphunzitsi a sukulu ya sekondale 1 miliyoni ogwira ntchito ku US.

context: M'chilimwe cha 1521, Luther adakulitsa cholinga chake kuchokera ku chipembedzo chaumwini monga kukhululukidwa ndi maulendo achipembedzo kupita ku ziphunzitso zomwe zili pamtima pa machitidwe a Tchalitchi. Mu On the Abrogation of the Private Mass, adatsutsa ngati kupembedza mafano lingaliro lakuti misa ndi nsembe, m'malo mwake akutsimikiza kuti ndi mphatso, yomwe iyenera kulandiridwa ndi chiyamiko ndi mpingo wonse. Nkhani yake yakuti On Confession, Kaya Papa ali ndi Mphamvu Yofuna Izo anakana kuvomereza mokakamiza ndipo analimbikitsa kuvomereza kwachinsinsi ndi kukhululukidwa, popeza "Mkhristu aliyense ndi wovomereza." Mu Novembala, Luther analemba The Judgement of Martin Luther on Monastic Vows. Iye anatsimikizira amonke ndi masisitere kuti akhoza kuswa malumbiro awo popanda tchimo, chifukwa malumbiro anali kuyesayesa kosaloledwa ndi kopanda pake kuti apeze chipulumutso.

context: Baibulo la Luther, lomwe linafalitsidwa pa nthawi imene mabuku a m'chijeremani ankafunidwa kwambiri, ndipo mwamsanga linakhala Baibulo lotchuka komanso lotchuka kwambiri. Momwemo, idathandizira kwambiri kusinthika kwa chilankhulo ndi mabuku achijeremani. Pokhala ndi zolemba ndi mawu oyamba a Luther, komanso ndi zojambula zamatabwa za Lucas Cranach zomwe zinali ndi zithunzi zotsutsana ndi papa, zinathandiza kwambiri kufalitsa chiphunzitso cha Luther ku Germany konse. Baibulo la Luther linakhudza matembenuzidwe ena a zinenero za anthu wamba, monga Baibulo la Chingerezi la William Tyndale (1525 m'tsogolo), lomwe linayambitsa Baibulo la King James.

context: Kaŵirikaŵiri nyimbo za Luther zinasonkhezeredwa ndi zochitika zapadera m'moyo wake ndi Kukonzanso Zinthu kumene kunali kuchitika. Khalidwe limeneli linayamba ndi kuphunzira kwake za kuphedwa kwa Johann Esch ndi Heinrich Voes, anthu oyamba kufera chikhulupiriro ndi Tchalitchi cha Roma Katolika chifukwa cha malingaliro a Lutheran, zomwe zinapangitsa Luther kulemba nyimbo yakuti "Ein neues Lied wir heben an" ("Nyimbo yatsopano yomwe timakweza"), yomwe imadziwika kwambiri mu Chingerezi ndi kumasulira kwa John C. Mtumiki ndi mutu ndi mzere woyamba "Woponyedwa ku Mphepo Yosasamala" ndikuyimba nyimbo yomwe Ibstone adalemba mu 1875 ndi Maria C. Tiddeman.

context: Kum'mwera kwa California kuli malo otukuka kwambiri a m'tawuni, komwe kuli madera ena akuluakulu a m'tawuni m'boma, pamodzi ndi madera akuluakulu omwe adasiyidwa osatukuka. Ndi megalopolis yachitatu yokhala ndi anthu ambiri ku United States, pambuyo pa Great Lakes Megalopolis ndi Northeastern megalopolis. Mbali yaikulu ya kum'mwera kwa California ndi yotchuka chifukwa cha madera ake akuluakulu, ofalikira, a m'tawuni komanso kugwiritsa ntchito magalimoto ndi misewu yayikulu. Madera amphamvu ndi Los Angeles, Orange County, San Diego, ndi Riverside-San Bernardino, iliyonse yomwe ili pakati pa mzinda wake, wopangidwa ndi mizinda yambiri yaying'ono ndi madera. Dera la m'tawuni lilinso ndi dera lapadziko lonse lapansi mu mawonekedwe a San Diego-Tijuana, lopangidwa ndi dera la m'tawuni lomwe likutsanulira ku Baja California.
question: Kodi muyezo wa megalopolis wakumwera kwa California uli kuti malinga ndi chiwerengero cha anthu mdziko lonse?

context: Kum'mwera kwa California kuli malo otukuka kwambiri a m'tawuni, komwe kuli madera ena akuluakulu a m'tawuni m'boma, pamodzi ndi madera akuluakulu omwe adasiyidwa osatukuka. Ndi megalopolis yachitatu yokhala ndi anthu ambiri ku United States, pambuyo pa Great Lakes Megalopolis ndi Northeastern megalopolis. Mbali yaikulu ya kum'mwera kwa California ndi yotchuka chifukwa cha madera ake akuluakulu, ofalikira, a m'tawuni komanso kugwiritsa ntchito magalimoto ndi misewu yayikulu. Madera amphamvu ndi Los Angeles, Orange County, San Diego, ndi Riverside-San Bernardino, iliyonse yomwe ili pakati pa mzinda wake, wopangidwa ndi mizinda yambiri yaying'ono ndi madera. Dera la m'tawuni lilinso ndi dera lapadziko lonse lapansi mu mawonekedwe a San Diego-Tijuana, lopangidwa ndi dera la m'tawuni lomwe likutsanulira ku Baja California.

context: Kum'mwera kwa California kuli malo amodzi ophatikizidwa a Statistical Area, madera asanu ndi atatu a Metropolitan Statistics, dera limodzi lapadziko lonse lapansi, ndi magawo angapo a mizinda. Derali lili ndi mizinda iwiri yowonjezereka yomwe anthu oposa mamiliyoni asanu. Awa ndi Greater Los Angeles Area pa 17,786,419, ndi San Diego-Tijuana pa 5,105,768. M'madera akuluakulu awa, dera la Los Angeles-Long Beach-Santa Ana, Riverside-San Bernardino-Ontario, ndi dera la Oxnard-Thousand Oaks-Ventura limapanga Greater Los Angeles; pomwe dera la El Centro ndi dera la San Diego-Carlsbad-San Marcos limapanga Southern Border Region. Kumpoto kwa Greater Los Angeles ndi madera a Santa Barbara, San Luis Obispo, ndi Bakersfield.

context: Pamene Sky Digital idayambitsidwa mu 1998 ntchito yatsopanoyi idagwiritsa ntchito satellite ya Astra 2A yomwe inali pamalo ozungulira a 28.5 ° E, mosiyana ndi ntchito ya analogue yomwe idafalitsidwa kuchokera ku 19.2 ° E.  Izi pambuyo pake zinatsatiridwa ndi ma satellites ambiri a Astra komanso Eutelsat's Eurobird 1 (tsopano Eutelsat 33C) pa 28.5 ° E), zinathandiza kampaniyo kukhazikitsa ntchito yatsopano ya digito yonse, Sky, yomwe imatha kunyamula mazana a ma TV ndi wailesi. Malo akale adagawidwa ndi ofalitsa ochokera kumayiko angapo aku Europe, pomwe malo atsopano pa 28.5 ° E adayamba kugwiritsidwa ntchito pafupifupi njira zomwe zimafalitsa ku United Kingdom.

context: Nyuzipepala ya Daily Mail inanena mu 2012 kuti bungwe lopindulitsa la boma la UK likuyang'ana omwe akufuna "Sky TV bills kuti akhazikitse ngati mkazi yemwe akulandira zopindulitsa monga mayi wosakwatiwa akunena molakwika kuti akukhala yekha" - monga, adanenera, kulembetsa ku njira zamasewera kungapereke kukhalapo kwa mwamuna m'banjamo. context: Chipani chapakati-kumanzere cha Australian Labor Party (ALP), chapakati-chakumanja cha Liberal Party of Australia, National Party of Australia yomwe ili kumidzi ndi zachilengedwe za Australia Greens ndi zipani zazikulu za Victoria. Mwachikhalidwe, Labor ndi yamphamvu kwambiri m'madera ogwira ntchito a Melbourne kumadzulo ndi kumpoto, ndi mizinda yachigawo cha Ballarat, Bendigo ndi Geelong. Chithandizo chachikulu cha a Liberals chili m'madera olemera kwambiri a kum'mawa ndi kunja kwa Melbourne, ndi malo ena akumidzi ndi madera. Ma Nationals ndi amphamvu kwambiri ku Victoria's North Western ndi Eastern madera akumidzi. A Greens, omwe adapambana mipando yawo yoyamba ya nyumba yotsika mu 2014, ndi amphamvu kwambiri mkati mwa Melbourne.

context: Victoria ili ndi malamulo olembedwa omwe adakhazikitsidwa mu 1975, koma potengera malamulo a atsamunda a 1855, omwe adaperekedwa ndi Nyumba ya Malamulo ya United Kingdom monga Victoria Constitution Act 1855, yomwe imakhazikitsa Nyumba ya Malamulo ngati bungwe lopanga malamulo a boma pazinthu zomwe zikubwera pansi pa udindo wa boma. Malamulo a Victoria akhoza kusinthidwa ndi Nyumba ya Malamulo ya Victoria, kupatula makonzedwe ena "okhazikika" omwe amafuna kuti mwina ambiri m'nyumba zonse ziwiri, ambiri atatu mwa asanu m'nyumba zonse ziwiri, kapena kuvomerezedwa ndi anthu a Victoria mu referendum, malingana ndi makonzedwewo.

context: Pambuyo pa kukhazikitsidwa kwa chigawo cha New South Wales mu 1788, Australia inagawidwa kukhala theka lakum'mawa lotchedwa New South Wales ndi theka lakumadzulo lotchedwa New Holland, motsogozedwa ndi boma la atsamunda ku Sydney. Malo oyamba a ku Ulaya m'dera lomwe pambuyo pake linatchedwa Victoria linakhazikitsidwa mu Okutobala 1803 pansi pa Lieutenant-Governor David Collins ku Sullivan Bay ku Port Phillip. Inali ndi anthu 402 (akuluakulu a Boma 5, akuluakulu 9 a asilikali apanyanja, oimba ng'oma 2, ndi anthu 39 apadera, akazi a asilikali 5, ndi mwana, akaidi 307, akazi a akaidi 17, ndi ana 7). Iwo anatumizidwa kuchokera ku England ku HMS Calcutta motsogozedwa ndi Captain Daniel Woodriff, makamaka poopa kuti Afalansa, omwe anali kuyendera derali, angakhazikitse malo awo ndipo motero kutsutsa ufulu wa Britain ku kontinenti.

context: Nkhondo yachipembedzo yomwe inayambiranso m'zaka za m'ma 1620 inachititsa kuti mwayi wandale ndi zankhondo wa a Huguenot uthetsedwe pambuyo pa kugonjetsedwa kwawo. Iwo anasunga makonzedwe achipembedzo a Edict of Nantes kufikira ulamuliro wa Louis XIV, amene pang'onopang'ono anawonjezera chizunzo chawo kufikira pamene anapereka lamulo la Fontainebleau (1685), limene linathetsa lamulo lonse la Chiprotestanti ku France, ndi kukakamiza Ayuguenoti kutembenuka. Ngakhale kuti pafupifupi anthu atatu mwa anthu atatu alionse potsirizira pake anaphedwa kapena kugonjedwa, pafupifupi 500,000 a Huguenot anali atathawa ku France kumayambiriro kwa zaka za zana la 18.

context: Mu 1700 mazana angapo a French Huguenots adasamukira ku England kupita ku Virginia, komwe Korona wa Chingerezi adawalonjeza kuti awapatsa malo ku Lower Norfolk County. Atafika, akuluakulu a atsamunda anawapatsa m'malo mwake malo omwe ali pamtunda wa makilomita 20 pamwamba pa mathithi a mtsinje wa James, kumudzi wosiyidwa wa Monacan wotchedwa Manakin Town, tsopano ku Powhatan County. Atsamunda ena adafika ku Chesterfield County yomwe ili masiku ano. Pa 12 Meyi 1705, Msonkhano Waukulu wa Virginia unapereka lamulo loti a Huguenot 148 omwe adakali ku Manakintown. Mwa anthu 390 oyambirira omwe anali m'mudzi wakutaliwo, ambiri anali atamwalira; ena ankakhala kunja kwa tawuni m'mafamu mu kalembedwe ka Chingerezi; ndipo ena anasamukira kumadera osiyanasiyana. Pang'ono ndi pang'ono adakwatirana ndi anansi awo achingerezi. M'zaka za zana la 18 ndi 19, mbadwa za Afalansa zinasamukira kumadzulo ku Piedmont, ndi kudutsa mapiri a Appalachian kupita kumadzulo kwa zomwe zinakhala Kentucky, Tennessee, Missouri, ndi madera ena. M'dera la Manakintown, Huguenot Memorial Bridge kudutsa Mtsinje wa James ndi Huguenot Road adatchulidwa mu ulemu wawo, monga momwe zinalili zinthu zambiri zakomweko, kuphatikizapo masukulu angapo, kuphatikizapo Huguenot High School.
question: Kodi atsamunda a Huguenot analonjezedwa m'dziko liti la Chingerezi?

M'zaka za zana la 18 ndi 19, mbadwa za Afalansa zinasamukira kumadzulo ku Piedmont, ndi kudutsa mapiri a Appalachian kupita kumadzulo kwa zomwe zinakhala Kentucky, Tennessee, Missouri, ndi madera ena. M'dera la Manakintown, Huguenot Memorial Bridge kudutsa Mtsinje wa James ndi Huguenot Road adatchulidwa mu ulemu wawo, monga momwe zinalili zinthu zambiri zakomweko, kuphatikizapo masukulu angapo, kuphatikizapo Huguenot High School.
question: Kodi atsamunda awa adapangidwa liti ngati atsamunda a Chingerezi?

context: Ena otsogolera mpingo wa Reformed anaphatikizapo a Roma Katolika othandizira kusintha ndi a Gallican, monga Jacques Lefevre (c. 1455-1536). A Gallicans mwachidule adapeza ufulu wodzilamulira wa tchalitchi cha ku France, pa mfundo yakuti chipembedzo cha France sichikanalamulidwa ndi Bishop wa Roma, mphamvu yachilendo. Pa nthawi ya kusintha kwa Apulotesitanti, Lefevre, pulofesa wa pa yunivesite ya Paris, anafalitsa Baibulo lake la Chifalansa la Chipangano Chatsopano mu 1523, kenako Baibulo lonse m'Chifalansa mu 1530. William Farel anali wophunzira wa Lefevre amene anapitiriza kukhala mtsogoleri wa Kukonzanso kwa Switzerland, kukhazikitsa boma lachipulotesitanti ku Geneva. Jean Cauvin (John Calvin), wophunzira wina pa yunivesite ya Paris, nayenso anatembenukira ku Chipulotesitanti. Patapita nthaŵi yaitali kuchokera pamene mpatuko unaponderezedwa ndi Francis I, anthu otsala a ku France a Waldensia, panthaŵiyo makamaka m'chigawo cha Luberon, anafuna kugwirizana ndi William Farel, Calvin ndi Kukonzanso Zinthu, ndipo Olivetan anawasindikizira Baibulo la Chifalansa. Chikhulupiriro cha ku France cha mu 1559 chimasonyeza chisonkhezero chotsimikizika cha Calvin. Pakati pa 1550 ndi 1580, anthu ambiri a m'tchalitchi cha Reformed ku France anayamba kudziwika ndi dzina lakuti Ayuganoti. [kutchulidwa kofunikira]

context: Mipingo yambiri ya Yahuguenot (kapena anthu) ku North America m'kupita kwa nthaŵi inagwirizana ndi zipembedzo zina zachipulotesitanti zokhala ndi ziŵalo zambiri. A Huguenot anazolowera mofulumira ndipo kaŵirikaŵiri anakwatirana kunja kwa madera awo apafupi a ku France, zimene zinachititsa kuti azigwirizana. Mbadwa zawo m'mabanja ambiri zinapitiriza kugwiritsa ntchito mayina oyamba a Chifalansa ndi mayina a ana awo mpaka m'zaka za zana la khumi ndi zisanu ndi zinayi. Atagwirizana, a French adathandizira kwambiri pamoyo wachuma wa United States, makamaka ngati amalonda ndi amisiri kumapeto kwa nthawi ya Colonial ndi kumayambiriro kwa Federal. Mwachitsanzo, E.I. du Pont, yemwe kale anali wophunzira wa Lavoisier, adakhazikitsa mphero za mfuti za Eleutherian.

question: Kodi ndi mtundu wanji wa kutentha womwe umagwiritsidwa ntchito nthawi zambiri mu injini za nthunzi zoseweretsa?

context: Chida chothandiza kwambiri pofufuza ntchito ya injini za nthunzi ndi chizindikiro cha injini ya nthunzi. Mabaibulo oyambirira anali kugwiritsidwa ntchito ndi 1851, koma chizindikiro chopambana kwambiri chinapangidwa kwa wopanga injini yothamanga kwambiri ndi wopanga Charles Porter ndi Charles Richard ndipo adawonetsedwa ku London Exhibition mu 1862. The nthunzi injini chizindikiro amatsatira pa pepala kuthamanga mu yamphamvu lonse mkombero, amene angagwiritsidwe ntchito kuona mavuto osiyanasiyana ndi kuwerengera anapanga mahatchi. Ankagwiritsa ntchito nthawi zonse ndi mainjiniya, makanika ndi oyang'anira inshuwalansi. Chizindikiro cha injini chingagwiritsidwenso ntchito pa injini zoyaka mkati. Onani chithunzi cha chithunzi cha chizindikiro pansipa (mu Mitundu ya mayunitsi oyendetsa gawo).
question: Kodi ndi chida chiti chomwe chimagwiritsidwa ntchito pofufuza ntchito ya injini ya nthunzi?

Ankagwiritsa ntchito nthawi zonse ndi mainjiniya, makanika ndi oyang'anira inshuwalansi. Chizindikiro cha injini chingagwiritsidwenso ntchito pa injini zoyaka mkati. context: Ngakhale kuti injini ya nthunzi yobwezeretsanso siigwiritsidwanso ntchito kwambiri pa malonda, makampani osiyanasiyana akufufuza kapena kugwiritsira ntchito kuthekera kwa injini monga njira ina m'malo mwa injini zoyaka mkati. context: Chopangira mphamvu cha nthunzi chimakhala ndi ma rotor amodzi kapena angapo (ma disc ozungulira) okwera pa shaft yoyendetsa, mosinthana ndi mndandanda wa ma stators (ma disc amodzi) okhazikika ku casing ya turbine. Ma rotors ali ndi makonzedwe ofanana ndi propeller a masamba m'mphepete mwakunja. Nthunzi imagwira ntchito pa masamba awa, ndikupanga kayendedwe kozungulira. Stator imakhala ndi zofanana, koma zokhazikika, mndandanda wa masamba omwe amatumikira kubwezeretsa nthunzi yoyenda pa gawo lotsatira la rotor. Turbine ya nthunzi nthawi zambiri imatha kukhala condenser yapamwamba yomwe imapereka zingalowe. Magawo a turbine ya nthunzi nthawi zambiri amakonzedwa kuti atulutse ntchito yapamwamba kwambiri kuchokera ku liwiro linalake ndi kuthamanga kwa nthunzi, zomwe zimayambitsa mndandanda wa magawo osiyanasiyana apamwamba komanso otsika. Ma turbines amagwira ntchito bwino pokhapokha ngati amazungulira pa liwiro lalikulu, chifukwa chake nthawi zambiri amalumikizidwa ndi zida zochepetsera kuyendetsa ntchito zochepa, monga choyendetsera sitima. M'malo ambiri akuluakulu opangira magetsi, ma turbines amalumikizidwa mwachindunji ndi ma jenereta popanda kuchepetsera gearing. Kuthamanga kwachizolowezi ndi kusintha kwa 3600 pamphindi (RPM) ku USA ndi mphamvu ya 60 Hertz, 3000 RPM ku Europe ndi mayiko ena omwe ali ndi magetsi a 50 Hertz. Mu ntchito mphamvu za nyukiliya turbines zambiri kuthamanga pa theka liwiro izi, 1800 RPM ndi 1500 RPM. A turbine rotor imakhalanso yokhoza kupereka mphamvu pamene ikuzungulira mbali imodzi. Chifukwa chake, gawo lobwezeretsa kapena gearbox nthawi zambiri limafunika pomwe mphamvu zimafunikira kumbali yosiyana. [kutchulidwa kofunikira]

Chifukwa chake, gawo lobwezeretsa kapena gearbox nthawi zambiri limafunika pomwe mphamvu zimafunikira kumbali yosiyana. [kutchulidwa kofunikira]
question: Ku United States, kodi liwiro lachizolowezi la turbine lokhala ndi mphamvu ya 60 Hertz ndi chiyani?

context: Okosijeni adapezeka pawokha ndi Carl Wilhelm Scheele, ku Uppsala, mu 1773 kapena kale, ndi Joseph Priestley ku Wiltshire, mu 1774, koma Priestley nthawi zambiri amapatsidwa patsogolo chifukwa ntchito yake idasindikizidwa koyamba. Dzina lakuti okosijeni linapangidwa mu 1777 ndi Antoine Lavoisier, yemwe kuyesa kwake okosijeni kunathandiza kunyozetsa chiphunzitso chotchuka cha phlogiston cha kuyaka ndi dzimbiri. context:
Mu 1891 katswiri wa zamankhwala wa ku Scotland James Dewar anatha kutulutsa mpweya wamadzimadzi wokwanira kuti aphunzire. Njira yoyamba yogulitsa yopangira okosijeni wamadzimadzi idapangidwa palokha mu 1895 ndi injiniya waku Germany Carl von Linde ndi injiniya waku Britain William Hampson. Amuna onse aŵiriwo anatsitsa kutentha kwa mpweya kufikira utasungunula ndipo kenaka anasunika mpweya wa gawoli mwa kuwaphika umodzi ndi umodzi ndi kuwagwira. Pambuyo pake, mu 1901, kuwotcherera kwa oxyacetylene kunawonetsedwa kwa nthawi yoyamba powotcha chisakanizo cha acetylene ndi O wothinikizidwa
2. Njira imeneyi yowotcherera ndi kudula zitsulo pambuyo pake inakhala yofala.

context: Paleoclimatologists amayeza chiŵerengero cha oxygen-18 ndi oxygen-16 mu zipolopolo ndi mafupa a zamoyo za m'madzi kuti adziwe momwe nyengo inaliri zaka mamiliyoni ambiri zapitazo (onani oxygen isotope ratio cycle). Mamolekyulu a madzi a m'nyanja omwe ali ndi isotope yopepuka, oxygen-16, amatuluka mofulumira pang'ono kuposa mamolekyulu a madzi omwe ali ndi 12% yolemera kwambiri-18; Kusiyana kumeneku kumawonjezeka kutentha kotsika. Pa nthawi ya kutentha kotsika padziko lonse lapansi, chipale chofewa ndi mvula kuchokera ku madzi a nthunzi amenewo amakonda kukhala apamwamba mu oxygen-16, ndipo madzi a m'nyanja omwe atsala kumbuyo amakhala apamwamba mu oxygen-18. Zamoyo za m'madzi kenaka zimaphatikizapo okosijeni-18 wambiri m'mafupa awo ndi zipolopolo kuposa momwe zingachitire m'nyengo yotentha. Akatswiri a paleoclimatologists amayezanso mwachindunji chiŵerengero chimenechi m'mamolekyulu a madzi a zitsanzo za madzi oundana amene ali ndi zaka zikwi mazana angapo.

context: Oxygen imapereka magulu awiri oyamwa a spectrophotometric omwe amafika pachimake pa mafunde a 687 ndi 760 nm. Asayansi ena ozindikira kutali aganiza zogwiritsa ntchito kuyeza kwa kuwala kochokera ku denga la zomera m'magulu amenewo kuti adziwe thanzi la zomera kuchokera papulatifomu ya satellite. Njira imeneyi imagwiritsa ntchito mfundo yakuti m'magulu amenewo n'zotheka kusiyanitsa kuwunikira kwa zomera kuchokera ku fluorescence yake, yomwe ndi yofooka kwambiri. Kuyeza kumakhala kovuta mwaukadaulo chifukwa cha chiŵerengero chochepa cha chizindikiro ndi phokoso komanso kapangidwe ka thupi la zomera; Koma yaperekedwa ngati njira yotheka yowunikira kayendedwe ka kaboni kuchokera ku ma satellites padziko lonse lapansi.

Mankhwala a Hyperbaric (kuthamanga kwambiri) amagwiritsa ntchito zipinda zapadera za okosijeni kuti awonjezere kuthamanga pang'ono kwa O
2 mozungulira wodwalayo ndipo, pakafunika, ogwira ntchito zachipatala. Poizoni wa carbon monoxide, gangrene ya mpweya, ndi matenda a decompression ('zokhotakhota') nthawi zina zimachiritsidwa pogwiritsa ntchito zipangizozi. Kuwonjezeka kwa O
2 Kugwirizana m'mapapo kumathandiza kuchotsa carbon monoxide kuchokera ku gulu la heme la hemoglobin. Mpweya wa okosijeni ndi poizoni kwa mabakiteriya a anaerobic omwe amachititsa gangrene ya mpweya, choncho kuwonjezera kuthamanga kwake pang'ono kumathandiza kuwapha. Matenda a decompression amapezeka mwa akusambira omwe amachepetsa mofulumira kwambiri pambuyo pa kudumpha, zomwe zimapangitsa kuti mpweya wa inert, makamaka nayitrogeni ndi helium, upangidwe m'magazi awo. 2 mwamsanga ndi gawo la chithandizo.

2 Kugwirizana m'mapapo kumathandiza kuchotsa carbon monoxide kuchokera ku gulu la heme la hemoglobin. Mpweya wa okosijeni ndi poizoni kwa mabakiteriya a anaerobic omwe amachititsa gangrene ya mpweya, choncho kuwonjezera kuthamanga kwake pang'ono kumathandiza kuwapha. Matenda a decompression amapezeka mwa akusambira omwe amachepetsa mofulumira kwambiri pambuyo pa kudumpha, zomwe zimapangitsa kuti mpweya wa inert, makamaka nayitrogeni ndi helium, upangidwe m'magazi awo. context: Pa Okutobala 6, 1973, Syria ndi Egypt, mothandizidwa ndi mayiko ena achiarabu, adayambitsa kuukira kodabwitsa ku Israel, pa Yom Kippur. Kukonzanso kumeneku kwa udani mu nkhondo ya Arab-Israeli kunatulutsa kupanikizika kwachuma pamitengo yamafuta. Panthawiyi, Iran inali yachiwiri padziko lonse lapansi yogulitsa mafuta komanso mnzake wapamtima wa US. Patapita milungu ingapo, Shah wa ku Iran ananena poyankhulana kuti: "Ndithudi [mtengo wa mafuta] udzakwera... Ndithudi! Ndipo bwanji... Inu [maiko akumadzulo] mwawonjezera mtengo wa tirigu amene mumatigulitsa ndi 300 peresenti, ndipo chimodzimodzi ndi shuga ndi simenti... Mumagula mafuta athu osakanikirana ndikugulitsa kwa ife, oyengedwa ngati petrochemicals, pamtengo wamtengo wapatali womwe mwatilipira ... Ndi chilungamo chabe kuti, kuyambira tsopano, muyenera kulipira ndalama zambiri za mafuta. Tiyeni tinene nthawi khumi. "

context: Chiletsocho chinali ndi chiyambukiro choipa pa chuma cha US poyambitsa zofuna mwamsanga kuti zithetse zoopsa ku chitetezo cha mphamvu za US. Pamlingo wapadziko lonse, kuwonjezeka kwa mitengo kunasintha malo opikisana m'mafakitale ambiri, monga magalimoto. Mavuto a macroeconomic anali ndi zotsatira zonse za inflationary ndi deflationary. Chiletsocho chinasiya makampani a mafuta akufunafuna njira zatsopano zowonjezera mafuta, ngakhale m'madera ovuta monga Arctic. Kupeza mafuta ndikupanga minda yatsopano nthawi zambiri kumafuna zaka zisanu mpaka khumi zisanapangidwe kwambiri.

context: Mu 1973, Nixon adatchula William E. Simon kukhala Woyang'anira woyamba wa Federal Energy Office, bungwe la kanthawi kochepa lomwe linapangidwa kuti ligwirizanitse kuyankha kwa chiletsocho. Simon anagaŵira maboma mafuta ofanana a m'nyumba a 1974 amene aliyense anadya mu 1972, amene anagwira ntchito m'maboma amene chiŵerengero chawo sichinali kuwonjezeka. M'maboma ena, mizere pamalo ogulitsira mafuta inali yofala. Bungwe la American Automobile Association linanena kuti sabata yomaliza ya February 1974, 20% ya malo opangira mafuta a ku America analibe mafuta.

context: Vuto la mphamvu linayambitsa chidwi chachikulu pa mphamvu zowonjezera, mphamvu za nyukiliya ndi mafuta opangira zinthu zapakhomo. Pali kutsutsidwa kuti ndondomeko za mphamvu za ku America kuyambira vutoli zakhala zikuyang'aniridwa ndi malingaliro a mavuto, kulimbikitsa kukonza mwachangu kwamtengo wapatali komanso njira zothetsera mavuto omwe amanyalanyaza zenizeni za msika ndi zamakono. M'malo mopereka malamulo okhazikika omwe amathandizira kafukufuku woyambirira pamene akusiya malo ambiri a zamalonda ndi luso, ma congress ndi mapulezidenti athandizira mobwerezabwereza ndondomeko zomwe zimalonjeza njira zomwe zili zopindulitsa pa ndale, koma zomwe ziyembekezo zake ndizokayikitsa.

context: Ogula ena anadandaula za kukula kochepa kwa ma compacts oyambirira a ku Japan, ndipo onse a Toyota ndi Nissan (omwe panthawiyo ankadziwika kuti Datsun) adayambitsa magalimoto akuluakulu monga Toyota Corona Mark II, Toyota Cressida, Mazda 616 ndi Datsun 810, zomwe zinawonjezera malo okwera ndi zofunikira monga mpweya, kuyendetsa mphamvu, mawailesi a AM-FM, komanso ngakhale mawindo amphamvu ndi kutseka kwapakati popanda kuwonjezera mtengo wa galimoto. context: Kukhazikitsidwa kwa Seamans kwa komiti ya ad-hoc yotsogoleredwa ndi wothandizira wake wapadera waukadaulo Nicholas E. Golovin mu Julayi 1961, kuti alimbikitse galimoto yoyambitsa kuti igwiritsidwe ntchito pulogalamu ya Apollo, idaimira kusintha kwa chisankho cha NASA. Komitiyi inazindikira kuti njira yosankhidwa inali gawo lofunika kwambiri la kusankha galimoto yoyambira, ndipo inalimbikitsa mokomera njira ya hybrid EOR-LOR. Kulingalira kwake kwa LOR -komanso ntchito yosatha ya Houbolt- kunathandiza kwambiri kufalitsa ntchito ya njirayi. Kumapeto kwa 1961 ndi kumayambiriro kwa 1962, mamembala a Manned Spacecraft Center adayamba kubwera kudzathandiza LOR, kuphatikizapo wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri watsopano wa Office of Manned Space Flight, Joseph Shea, yemwe adakhala mtsogoleri wa LOR. Akatswiri a ku Marshall Space Flight Center (MSFC) anatenga nthaŵi yaitali kuti akhutiritse za ubwino wake, koma kutembenuka kwawo kunalengezedwa ndi Wernher von Braun pamsonkhano wachidule mu June 1962.

context: Pambuyo pa ndege yoyeserera ya LM yopanda anthu AS-206, ogwira ntchito adzauluka woyamba wa Block II CSM ndi LM mu ntchito yapawiri yomwe imadziwika kuti AS-207/208, kapena AS-278 (chombo chilichonse chidzayambitsidwa pa Saturn IB yosiyana.) Malo ogwira ntchito ku Block II adatchedwa Commander (CDR) Command Module Pilot (CMP) ndi Lunar Module Pilot (LMP). Oyendayenda m'mlengalenga adzayamba kuvala chovala chatsopano cha Apollo, chokonzedwa kuti chikhale ndi ntchito yowonjezera ya mwezi (EVA). Chisoti chachikhalidwe cha visor chinasinthidwa ndi mtundu womveka bwino wa "fishbowl" kuti uwoneke kwambiri, ndipo suti ya EVA pamwamba pa mwezi idzaphatikizapo chovala chamkati choziziritsa madzi.

context: Grissom, White, ndi Chaffee anaganiza zopatsa dzina la ndege yawo Apollo 1 monga cholinga cholimbikitsa pa ndege yoyamba yokhala ndi anthu. Iwo anaphunzitsa ndi kuyesa chombo chawo ku North America, ndi m'chipinda chokwera ku Kennedy Space Center. Mayeso a "plugs-out" adakonzedwa mu Januware, omwe angayerekezere kuwerengera koyambitsa pa LC-34 ndi chombo chamlengalenga chosamutsa kuchokera ku pad yoperekedwa kupita ku mphamvu zamkati. Ngati zikuyenda bwino, izi zidzatsatiridwa ndi mayeso okhwima kwambiri a kuwerengera pafupi ndi kukhazikitsidwa kwa February 21, ndi onse a spacecraft ndi galimoto yoyambira mafuta.

question: Kodi ndi malo ena ati omwe Apollo 1 adayesa kupatula Kennedy Space Center?

context: Mayeso a plugs-out adayamba m'mawa wa Januware 27, 1967, ndipo nthawi yomweyo adakanthidwa ndi mavuto. Choyamba ogwira ntchito anaona fungo lachilendo m'zovala zawo za m'mlengalenga, zomwe zinachedwetsa kutsekedwa kwa chitsekocho. Ndiyeno, mavuto a kulankhulana anakhumudwitsa oyendayenda m'mlengalenga ndipo anakakamiza kuŵerenga koyerekeza. Panthawi yogwira iyi, moto wamagetsi unayamba mu kanyumba, ndipo unafalikira mofulumira mu kuthamanga kwakukulu, 100% mpweya wa okosijeni. Kupanikizika kunakwera mokwanira kuchokera ku moto kotero kuti kanyumbako kanaphulika ndipo moto unabuka pamalo a pad, kusokoneza kuyesayesa kwa kupulumutsa ogwira ntchito. Oyendayenda m'mlengalenga anafooka chitseko chisanatsegulidwe.

context: Mapangano akuluakulu omwe amapanga European Union adayamba ndi malamulo wamba a malasha ndi zitsulo, kenako mphamvu ya atomiki, koma mabungwe athunthu komanso ovomerezeka adakhazikitsidwa kudzera mu Pangano la Rome 1957 ndi Maastricht Treaty 1992 (tsopano: TFEU). Zosintha zazing'ono zinapangidwa m'zaka za m'ma 1960 ndi 1970. Mapangano akuluakulu osintha adasainidwa kuti akwaniritse chitukuko cha msika umodzi, wamkati mu Single European Act 1986, kupititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha Europe yowonjezereka mu Pangano la Amsterdam 1997, ndikupanga zosintha zazing'ono ku mphamvu zachibale za mayiko omwe ali mamembala m'mabungwe a EU mu Pangano la Nice 2001 ndi Pangano la Lisbon 2007. Chiyambireni kukhazikitsidwa kwake, mayiko ambiri omwe ali mamembala alowa nawo kudzera m'mapangano osiyanasiyana, kuchokera ku UK, Ireland, Denmark ndi Norway mu 1972 (ngakhale Norway sinathe kujowina), Greece mu 1979, Spain ndi Portugal 1985, Austria, Finland, Norway ndi Sweden mu 1994 (ngakhale kachiwiri Norway idalephera kulowa nawo, chifukwa chosowa chithandizo mu referendum),  Czech Republic, Cyprus, Estonia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Poland, Slovakia ndi Slovenia mu 2004, Romania ndi Bulgaria mu 2007 ndi Croatia mu 2013. Greenland inasaina Pangano mu 1985 lomwe limapatsa udindo wapadera.

context: Ngakhale kuti bungweli lili ndi ulamuliro woyambitsa malamulo, Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Ulaya ndi Council of the European Union ali ndi mphamvu zosintha ndi kukana panthawi ya malamulo. Malinga ndi mgwirizano wa European Union nkhani 9 ndi 10, EU imasunga "mfundo yofanana ya nzika zake" ndipo imatanthauzidwa kuti ikhale yozikidwa pa "demokalase yoimira". Pochitapo kanthu, kufanana ndi demokalase ndizoperewera chifukwa oimira osankhidwa ku Nyumba ya Malamulo sangathe kuyambitsa malamulo otsutsana ndi zofuna za Commission, nzika za mayiko ang'onoang'ono ali ndi kulemera kwa mavoti kuwirikiza kakhumi ku Nyumba ya Malamulo monga nzika za mayiko akuluakulu, ndipo "ambiri oyenerera" kapena mgwirizano wa Bungwe amafunika kukhazikitsa malamulo. Kulungamitsa kwa "kusowa kwa demokalase" kumeneku pansi pa Mapangano nthawi zambiri kumaganiziridwa kuti kumaliza kuphatikiza chuma cha ku Ulaya ndi mabungwe andale kumafuna mgwirizano waukadaulo wa akatswiri, pomwe kumvetsetsa kotchuka kwa EU kunakula ndipo malingaliro amtundu adachepa pambuyo pa nkhondo. M'kupita kwa nthawi, izi zatanthauza kuti Nyumba ya Malamulo pang'onopang'ono idatenga mawu ambiri: kuyambira kukhala msonkhano wosasankhidwa, mpaka chisankho chake choyamba chachindunji mu 1979, kukhala ndi ufulu wowonjezereka mu ndondomeko ya malamulo. Chifukwa chake ufulu wa nzika ndi wochepa poyerekeza ndi ndale za demokalase mkati mwa mayiko onse omwe ali mamembala a ku Ulaya: pansi pa nkhani ya TEU 11 nzika ndi mabungwe ali ndi ufulu monga kufalitsa malingaliro awo ndikupereka njira yomwe iyenera kuganiziridwa ndi Commission ndi siginecha miliyoni imodzi. Nkhani ya TFEU 227 ili ndi ufulu wowonjezereka kwa nzika zopempha Nyumba ya Malamulo pazinthu zomwe zimawakhudza. Chisankho cha Nyumba ya Malamulo, chimachitika zaka zisanu zilizonse, ndipo mavoti a Mamembala a Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Ulaya m'mayiko omwe ali mamembala ayenera kukonzedwa ndi kuimira molingana kapena voti imodzi yosinthika. Pali ma MEP 750 ndipo manambala awo ndi "olingana kwambiri" malinga ndi kukula kwa boma la membala. Izi zikutanthauza - ngakhale kuti Bungweli likuyenera kukhala bungwe lomwe likuyimira mayiko omwe ali mamembala - ku Nyumba ya Malamulo nzika za mayiko ang'onoang'ono omwe ali mamembala ali ndi mawu ambiri kuposa nzika m'mayiko akuluakulu omwe ali mamembala. MEPs amagawanika, monga momwe amachitira m'Nyumba za Malamulo za dziko, motsatira mizere ya zipani zandale: chipani cha European People's Party pakali pano ndi chachikulu kwambiri, ndipo Chipani cha European Socialists chimatsogolera otsutsa. Maphwando samalandira ndalama za boma kuchokera ku EU, monga momwe Khoti Lachilungamo linachitira mu Parti ecologiste "Les Verts" v Parliament kuti iyi inali nkhani kwathunthu yomwe iyenera kulamulidwa ndi mayiko omwe ali mamembala. Mphamvu za Nyumba ya Malamulo zikuphatikizapo kuyitanitsa kufufuza za kusayendetsa bwino kapena kuika Ombudsman podikira mlandu uliwonse wa khoti. Zitha kufuna kuti Commission iyankhe mafunso ndipo ndi ambiri awiri mwa atatu akhoza kudzudzula Commission yonse (monga momwe zinachitikira ku Santer Commission mu 1999). Nthawi zina, Nyumba ya Malamulo ili ndi ufulu wofunsira momveka bwino, womwe Commission iyenera kutsatira moona mtima. Komabe udindo wake kutenga nawo mbali mu ndondomeko ya malamulo udakali wochepa chifukwa palibe membala yemwe angathe kwenikweni kapena kupereka malamulo popanda Commission ndi Council, kutanthauza kuti mphamvu ("kratia") sizili m'manja mwa oimira anthu osankhidwa mwachindunji ("demos"): ku EU sizowonabe kuti "kayendetsedwe ka kaye
question: Kodi ndi mabungwe awiri ati olamulira omwe ali ndi mphamvu yotsutsa malamulo?

Pochitapo kanthu, kufanana ndi demokalase ndizoperewera chifukwa oimira osankhidwa ku Nyumba ya Malamulo sangathe kuyambitsa malamulo otsutsana ndi zofuna za Commission, nzika za mayiko ang'onoang'ono ali ndi kulemera kwa mavoti kuwirikiza kakhumi ku Nyumba ya Malamulo monga nzika za mayiko akuluakulu, ndipo "ambiri oyenerera" kapena mgwirizano wa Bungwe amafunika kukhazikitsa malamulo. Kulungamitsa kwa "kusowa kwa demokalase" kumeneku pansi pa Mapangano nthawi zambiri kumaganiziridwa kuti kumaliza kuphatikiza chuma cha ku Ulaya ndi mabungwe andale kumafuna mgwirizano waukadaulo wa akatswiri, pomwe kumvetsetsa kotchuka kwa EU kunakula ndipo malingaliro amtundu adachepa pambuyo pa nkhondo. M'kupita kwa nthawi, izi zatanthauza kuti Nyumba ya Malamulo pang'onopang'ono idatenga mawu ambiri: kuyambira kukhala msonkhano wosasankhidwa, mpaka chisankho chake choyamba chachindunji mu 1979, kukhala ndi ufulu wowonjezereka mu ndondomeko ya malamulo. Chifukwa chake ufulu wa nzika ndi wochepa poyerekeza ndi ndale za demokalase mkati mwa mayiko onse omwe ali mamembala a ku Ulaya: pansi pa nkhani ya TEU 11 nzika ndi mabungwe ali ndi ufulu monga kufalitsa malingaliro awo ndikupereka njira yomwe iyenera kuganiziridwa ndi Commission ndi siginecha miliyoni imodzi. Nkhani ya TFEU 227 ili ndi ufulu wowonjezereka kwa nzika zopempha Nyumba ya Malamulo pazinthu zomwe zimawakhudza. Chisankho cha Nyumba ya Malamulo, chimachitika zaka zisanu zilizonse, ndipo mavoti a Mamembala a Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Ulaya m'mayiko omwe ali mamembala ayenera kukonzedwa ndi kuimira molingana kapena voti imodzi yosinthika. Pali ma MEP 750 ndipo manambala awo ndi "olingana kwambiri" malinga ndi kukula kwa boma la membala. Izi zikutanthauza - ngakhale kuti Bungweli likuyenera kukhala bungwe lomwe likuyimira mayiko omwe ali mamembala - ku Nyumba ya Malamulo nzika za mayiko ang'onoang'ono omwe ali mamembala ali ndi mawu ambiri kuposa nzika m'mayiko akuluakulu omwe ali mamembala. MEPs amagawanika, monga momwe amachitira m'Nyumba za Malamulo za dziko, motsatira mizere ya zipani zandale: chipani cha European People's Party pakali pano ndi chachikulu kwambiri, ndipo Chipani cha European Socialists chimatsogolera otsutsa. Maphwando samalandira ndalama za boma kuchokera ku EU, monga momwe Khoti Lachilungamo linachitira mu Parti ecologiste "Les Verts" v Parliament kuti iyi inali nkhani kwathunthu yomwe iyenera kulamulidwa ndi mayiko omwe ali mamembala. Mphamvu za Nyumba ya Malamulo zikuphatikizapo kuyitanitsa kufufuza za kusayendetsa bwino kapena kuika Ombudsman podikira mlandu uliwonse wa khoti. Zitha kufuna kuti Commission iyankhe mafunso ndipo ndi ambiri awiri mwa atatu akhoza kudzudzula Commission yonse (monga momwe zinachitikira ku Santer Commission mu 1999). Nthawi zina, Nyumba ya Malamulo ili ndi ufulu wofunsira momveka bwino, womwe Commission iyenera kutsatira moona mtima. Komabe udindo wake kutenga nawo mbali mu ndondomeko ya malamulo udakali wochepa chifukwa palibe membala yemwe angathe kwenikweni kapena kupereka malamulo popanda Commission ndi Council, kutanthauza kuti mphamvu ("kratia") sizili m'manja mwa oimira anthu osankhidwa mwachindunji ("demos"): ku EU sizowonabe kuti "kayendetsedwe ka kaye

question: Kodi chisankho choyamba chachindunji chinachitika liti?

context: Ngakhale kuti bungweli lili ndi ulamuliro woyambitsa malamulo, Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Ulaya ndi Council of the European Union ali ndi mphamvu zosintha ndi kukana panthawi ya malamulo. Malinga ndi mgwirizano wa European Union nkhani 9 ndi 10, EU imasunga "mfundo yofanana ya nzika zake" ndipo imatanthauzidwa kuti ikhale yozikidwa pa "demokalase yoimira". Pochitapo kanthu, kufanana ndi demokalase ndizoperewera chifukwa oimira osankhidwa ku Nyumba ya Malamulo sangathe kuyambitsa malamulo otsutsana ndi zofuna za Commission, nzika za mayiko ang'onoang'ono ali ndi kulemera kwa mavoti kuwirikiza kakhumi ku Nyumba ya Malamulo monga nzika za mayiko akuluakulu, ndipo "ambiri oyenerera" kapena mgwirizano wa Bungwe amafunika kukhazikitsa malamulo. Kulungamitsa kwa "kusowa kwa demokalase" kumeneku pansi pa Mapangano nthawi zambiri kumaganiziridwa kuti kumaliza kuphatikiza chuma cha ku Ulaya ndi mabungwe andale kumafuna mgwirizano waukadaulo wa akatswiri, pomwe kumvetsetsa kotchuka kwa EU kunakula ndipo malingaliro amtundu adachepa pambuyo pa nkhondo. M'kupita kwa nthawi, izi zatanthauza kuti Nyumba ya Malamulo pang'onopang'ono idatenga mawu ambiri: kuyambira kukhala msonkhano wosasankhidwa, mpaka chisankho chake choyamba chachindunji mu 1979, kukhala ndi ufulu wowonjezereka mu ndondomeko ya malamulo. Chifukwa chake ufulu wa nzika ndi wochepa poyerekeza ndi ndale za demokalase mkati mwa mayiko onse omwe ali mamembala a ku Ulaya: pansi pa nkhani ya TEU 11 nzika ndi mabungwe ali ndi ufulu monga kufalitsa malingaliro awo ndikupereka njira yomwe iyenera kuganiziridwa ndi Commission ndi siginecha miliyoni imodzi. Chisankho cha Nyumba ya Malamulo, chimachitika zaka zisanu zilizonse, ndipo mavoti a Mamembala a Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Ulaya m'mayiko omwe ali mamembala ayenera kukonzedwa ndi kuimira molingana kapena voti imodzi yosinthika. question: Kodi pakali pano ndi chipani chachikulu kwambiri pakati pa zipani zandale?

text: Chipani cha Anthu a ku Ulaya

context: Kuyambira pamene inakhazikitsidwa, EU yakhala ikugwira ntchito pakati pa njira zambiri zowonjezereka za malamulo a dziko ndi padziko lonse lapansi. Izi zatanthauza kuti Khoti Lachilungamo la ku Ulaya komanso makhoti apamwamba kwambiri a dziko lapansi ayenera kupanga mfundo zothetsera mikangano ya malamulo pakati pa machitidwe osiyanasiyana. Mkati mwa EU yokha, lingaliro la Khoti Lachilungamo ndiloti ngati malamulo a EU akusemphana ndi malamulo a dziko, ndiye kuti malamulo a EU ali ndi ukulu. Mlandu waukulu woyamba mu 1964, Costa v ENEL, loya wa ku Milan, komanso yemwe kale anali mwiniwake wa kampani ya mphamvu, dzina lake Costa anakana kulipira ngongole yake yamagetsi kwa Enel, pofuna kutsutsa kukhazikitsidwa kwa makampani a mphamvu ku Italy. Iye adanena kuti lamulo la dziko la Italy limatsutsana ndi Pangano la Roma, ndipo adapempha kuti atchulidwe ku Khoti la Malamulo la Italy ndi Khoti Lachilungamo pansi pa nkhani ya TFEU 267. Khoti la Constitutional Court la ku Italy linapereka lingaliro lakuti chifukwa chakuti lamulo la nationalization linali lochokera ku 1962, ndipo panganoli linali kugwira ntchito kuyambira 1958, Costa analibe chonena. Mosiyana ndi izi, Khothi Lachilungamo linanena kuti pamapeto pake Pangano la Roma silinalepheretse kupanga mphamvu zamagetsi, ndipo mulimonse momwe zingakhalire pansi pa Mgwirizanowu Commission yokha ndi yomwe ikanabweretsa, osati a Costa. Komabe, mfundo, a Costa anali ndi ufulu wopempha kuti Panganoli likutsutsana ndi malamulo a dziko, ndipo khoti lidzakhala ndi udindo woganizira zomwe akufuna kuti apange chilolezo, ngati sipadzakhala apilo yotsutsana ndi chigamulo chake. Khoti la Chilungamo, kubwereza malingaliro ake ku Van Gend en Loos, linanena kuti mayiko omwe ali mamembala "ngakhale ali m'madera ochepa, aletsa ufulu wawo wodzilamulira ndikupanga bungwe la malamulo omwe amagwira ntchito kwa nzika zawo komanso kwa iwo eni" pa "maziko a kuyanjana". Lamulo la EU silingathe "kugonjetsedwa ndi malamulo apakhomo, komabe adapangidwira ... popanda maziko alamulo a dera lenilenilo kukayikiridwa." Izi zinatanthauza kuti "mchitidwe uliwonse wotsatira wokhawokha" wa boma la membala sungagwiritsidwe ntchito. Mofananamo, mu Amministrazione delle Finanze v Simmenthal SpA, kampani, Simmenthal SpA, inanena kuti ndalama zoyendera umoyo wa anthu pansi pa lamulo la Italy la 1970 lobweretsa nyama ya ng'ombe kuchokera ku France kupita ku Italy zinali zosemphana ndi Malamulo awiri kuyambira 1964 ndi 1968. Mu "mogwirizana ndi mfundo yoyambirira ya malamulo a Community," linatero Khoti la Chilungamo, "njira zogwiritsidwa ntchito mwachindunji za mabungwe" (monga Malamulo pamlanduwu) "zimapangitsa kuti zikhale zosagwira ntchito makonzedwe aliwonse otsutsana ndi malamulo apano a dziko". Izi zinali zofunikira kuteteza "kukana kofanana" kwa Mgwirizano "maudindo omwe amachitidwa mopanda malire komanso mosasinthika ndi mayiko omwe ali mamembala", zomwe zingathe "kuwononga maziko enieni a" EU. Koma mosasamala kanthu za malingaliro a Khoti la Chilungamo, makhoti a dziko la mayiko omwe ali mamembala sanavomereze kusanthula komweko.
question: Ngati pali kusagwirizana pakati pa malamulo a EU ndi malamulo a dziko, ndi lamulo liti lomwe limakhala patsogolo?

Komabe, mfundo, a Costa anali ndi ufulu wopempha kuti Panganoli likutsutsana ndi malamulo a dziko, ndipo khoti lidzakhala ndi udindo woganizira zomwe akufuna kuti apange chilolezo, ngati sipadzakhala apilo yotsutsana ndi chigamulo chake. Khoti la Chilungamo, kubwereza malingaliro ake ku Van Gend en Loos, linanena kuti mayiko omwe ali mamembala "ngakhale ali m'madera ochepa, aletsa ufulu wawo wodzilamulira ndikupanga bungwe la malamulo omwe amagwira ntchito kwa nzika zawo komanso kwa iwo eni" pa "maziko a kuyanjana". Lamulo la EU silingathe "kugonjetsedwa ndi malamulo apakhomo, komabe adapangidwira ... popanda maziko alamulo a dera lenilenilo kukayikiridwa." Izi zinatanthauza kuti "mchitidwe uliwonse wotsatira wokhawokha" wa boma la membala sungagwiritsidwe ntchito. Mofananamo, mu Amministrazione delle Finanze v Simmenthal SpA, kampani, Simmenthal SpA, inanena kuti ndalama zoyendera umoyo wa anthu pansi pa lamulo la Italy la 1970 lobweretsa nyama ya ng'ombe kuchokera ku France kupita ku Italy zinali zosemphana ndi Malamulo awiri kuyambira 1964 ndi 1968. Mu "mogwirizana ndi mfundo yoyambirira ya malamulo a Community," linatero Khoti la Chilungamo, "njira zogwiritsidwa ntchito mwachindunji za mabungwe" (monga Malamulo pamlanduwu) "zimapangitsa kuti zikhale zosagwira ntchito makonzedwe aliwonse otsutsana ndi malamulo apano a dziko". Izi zinali zofunikira kuteteza "kukana kofanana" kwa Mgwirizano "maudindo omwe amachitidwa mopanda malire komanso mosasinthika ndi mayiko omwe ali mamembala", zomwe zingathe "kuwononga maziko enieni a" EU. Koma mosasamala kanthu za malingaliro a Khoti la Chilungamo, makhoti a dziko la mayiko omwe ali mamembala sanavomereze kusanthula komweko.

context: Palibe pangano lililonse loyambirira lokhazikitsa European Union lomwe limatchula chitetezo cha ufulu wofunikira. Sizinaganiziridwe kuti njira za European Union, ndiko kuti malamulo ndi kayendetsedwe ka mabungwe a European Union, azikhala pansi pa ufulu wachibadwidwe. Panthawiyo nkhawa yokhayo inali yakuti mayiko omwe ali mamembala ayenera kulepheretsedwa kuphwanya ufulu wachibadwidwe, chifukwa chake kukhazikitsidwa kwa European Convention on Human Rights mu 1950 ndi kukhazikitsidwa kwa Khoti Loona za Ufulu wa Anthu ku Ulaya. Khoti Lachilungamo la ku Ulaya linazindikira ufulu wofunikira ngati mfundo yaikulu ya malamulo a European Union pamene kufunika kotsimikizira kuti njira za European Union zikugwirizana ndi ufulu wachibadwidwe womwe uli m'malamulo a mayiko omwe ali mamembala kunawonekera kwambiri. Mu 1999 bungwe la European Council linakhazikitsa bungwe loyang'anira kulemba Chikalata cha Ufulu Wachibadwidwe cha ku Ulaya, chomwe chingakhale maziko a malamulo a European Union ndipo motero chiyenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito mwachindunji ku European Union ndi mabungwe ake. Chikalata cha Ufulu Wofunikira cha European Union chikujambula mndandanda wa ufulu wofunikira kuchokera ku European Convention on Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms, Declaration on Fundamental Rights yopangidwa ndi Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Ulaya mu 1989 ndi Mapangano a European Union.

context: Nkhalango yamvula ya Amazon (Chipwitikizi: Floresta Amazônica kapena Amazônia; Chisipanishi: Selva Amazónica, Amazonía kapena nthawi zambiri Amazonia; Chifalansa: Forêt amazonienne; Chidatchi: Amazoneregenwoud), yomwe imadziwikanso m'Chingelezi kuti Amazonia kapena nkhalango ya Amazon, ndi nkhalango yonyowa yomwe imakhudza mbali yaikulu ya Amazon ku South America. Beseni limeneli limaphatikizapo makilomita 7,000,000 (2,700,000 sq mi), omwe 5,500,000 square kilometres (2,100,000 sq mi) amaphimbidwa ndi nkhalango yamvula. question: Kodi chiwerengero cha mitundu ya mitengo m'nkhalango yamvula ya Amazon ndi yotani?

context: Pakati pa 1991 ndi 2000, nkhalango zonse zomwe zinatayika ku Amazon zinakwera kuchoka pa 415,000 kufika pa 587,000 square kilometres (160,000 mpaka 227,000 sq mi), ndipo nkhalango zambiri zotayika zinakhala msipu wa ng'ombe. Makumi asanu ndi awiri peresenti ya malo omwe kale anali ndi nkhalango ku Amazon, ndi 91% ya nthaka yodulidwa mitengo kuyambira 1970, amagwiritsidwa ntchito kudyetsa ziweto. Pakalipano, Brazil ndi dziko lachiwiri padziko lonse lapansi lomwe limapanga soya pambuyo pa United States. Komabe, kafukufuku watsopano wochitidwa ndi Leydimere Oliveira et al., wasonyeza kuti nkhalango yamvula yambiri ikadulidwa ku Amazon, mvula yochepa imafika m'deralo ndipo motero zokolola zochepa pa hekitala zimakhala. Choncho mosasamala kanthu za lingaliro la anthu ambiri, pakhala palibe phindu lachuma kwa Brazil kuchokera kudula mitengo ya nkhalango yamvula ndi kutembenuza izi kukhala minda ya ziweto.

context: Akatswiri a zachilengedwe akuda nkhawa ndi kutayika kwa mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya zamoyo yomwe idzachitike chifukwa cha kuwonongedwa kwa nkhalango, komanso za kutulutsidwa kwa kaboni yemwe ali mkati mwa zomera, zomwe zingafulumizitse kutentha kwa dziko lapansi. context: M'chaka cha 2010, nkhalango yamvula ya Amazon inakumananso ndi chilala chachikulu, chomwe chinali chachikulu kwambiri kuposa chilala cha mu 2005. context: Pafupifupi ma ctenophores onse ndi nyama zolusa, kutenga nyama kuyambira mphutsi zazing'ono ndi rotifers mpaka akuluakulu a crustaceans ang'onoang'ono; Kupatulapo ndi achinyamata a mitundu iwiri, omwe amakhala ngati tizilombo toyambitsa matenda pa salps omwe akuluakulu a mtundu wawo amadya. M'mikhalidwe yabwino, ma ctenophores amatha kudya nthawi khumi kulemera kwawo patsiku. Mitundu 100-150 yokha ndi yomwe yatsimikiziridwa, ndipo mwina ina 25 sinafotokozedwe mokwanira ndikutchulidwa. Zitsanzo za m'mabuku ophunzirira ndi ma cydippids okhala ndi matupi ooneka ngati dzira ndi ma tentacles awiri obwezeretsa okhala ndi tentilla ("ma tentacles ang'onoang'ono") omwe amaphimbidwa ndi colloblasts, maselo omata omwe amagwira nyama. Phylum ili ndi mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya thupi, kuphatikizapo platyctenids yosalala, yakuya kwambiri, momwe akuluakulu a mitundu yambiri alibe ma combs, ndi ma beroids a m'mphepete mwa nyanja, omwe alibe ma tentacles ndipo amadya ma ctenophores ena pogwiritsa ntchito pakamwa yayikulu yokhala ndi magulu a cilia akuluakulu, ouma omwe amagwira ntchito ngati mano. Kusiyana kumeneku kumathandiza kuti mitundu yosiyanasiyana ikhale ndi anthu ambiri m'dera lomwelo, chifukwa imakhazikika m'mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya nyama, zomwe zimagwira ndi njira zosiyanasiyana monga momwe akangaude amagwiritsira ntchito.

question: Kodi pali mitundu ingati yosiyanasiyana ya ctenohore?

context: Ngakhale matupi awo ofewa, a gelatinous, zinthu zakale zomwe zimaganiziridwa kuti zikuimira ctenophores, mwachiwonekere popanda ma tentacles koma mizere yambiri ya chikombole kuposa mawonekedwe amakono, apezedwa mu lagerstätten kale kwambiri ku Cambrian oyambirira, pafupifupi zaka 515 miliyoni zapitazo. Malo a ctenophores mu mtengo wa banja la chisinthiko cha nyama akhala akutsutsana kwa nthawi yaitali, ndipo malingaliro ambiri pakalipano, potengera phylogenetics ya maselo, ndikuti cnidarians ndi bilaterians ali pafupi kwambiri wina ndi mnzake kuposa aliyense ndi ctenophores. Kusanthula kwaposachedwa kwa maselo a phylogenetics kunatsimikizira kuti kholo lofanana la ma ctenophores onse amakono linali ngati cydippid, ndikuti magulu onse amakono adawonekera posachedwa, mwina pambuyo pa chochitika cha kusoloka kwa Cretaceous-Paleogene zaka 66 miliyoni zapitazo. Umboni wodziunjikira kuyambira zaka za m'ma 1980 ukuwonetsa kuti "cydippids" si monophyletic, mwa kuyankhula kwina samaphatikizapo onse ndi mbadwa zokhazokha za kholo limodzi limodzi, chifukwa magulu ena onse achikhalidwe cha ctenophore ndi mbadwa za ma cydippids osiyanasiyana.

question: Kodi ctenophore imatanthauza chiyani m'Chigiriki?

context: Chifukwa cha matupi awo ofewa, a gelatinous, ma ctenophores ndi osowa kwambiri ngati zinthu zakale, ndipo zinthu zakale zomwe zamasuliridwa ngati ctenophores zapezeka kokha mu lagerstätten, malo omwe chilengedwe chinali choyenera kwambiri kusunga minofu yofewa. Mpaka pakati pa zaka za m'ma 1990 zitsanzo ziwiri zokha zabwino zosanthula zinadziwika, onse mamembala a gulu la korona, kuyambira nthawi yoyambirira ya Devonian (Emsian). Mitundu itatu yowonjezera ya putative kenako idapezeka ku Burgess Shale ndi miyala ina ya ku Canada ya msinkhu wofanana, pafupifupi zaka 505 miliyoni zapitazo pakati pa nthawi ya Cambrian. Zikuoneka kuti zonsezi zinalibe ma tentacles koma zinali ndi mizere pakati pa 24 ndi 80 ya chikombole, kuposa mitundu 8 ya zamoyo. Zikuwonekeranso kuti anali ndi ziwalo zamkati zosiyana ndi chilichonse chomwe chimapezeka mu ctenophores yamoyo. Imodzi mwa mitundu yakale yomwe inanenedwa koyamba mu 1996 inali ndi pakamwa lalikulu, mwachiwonekere yozunguliridwa ndi m'mphepete mwa mapindikidwe omwe mwina anali minofu. Umboni wochokera ku China chaka chimodzi pambuyo pake ukusonyeza kuti ma ctenophores oterewa anali ofala ku Cambrian, koma mwinamwake osiyana kwambiri ndi mitundu yamakono - mwachitsanzo mizere imodzi ya chikombole ya chikombole inayikidwa pa vanes otchuka. Ediacaran Eoandromeda ikhoza kuimira chikombole jelly.

question: Kodi zinthu zakale zomwe zinapezeka ku Burgess Shale zinasowa chiyani?

context: Ubale wa ctenophores ndi ena onse a Metazoa ndiwofunikira kwambiri kuti timvetsetse za chisinthiko choyambirira cha nyama ndi chiyambi cha multicellularity. Zakhala zikukambitsirana kwa zaka zambiri. Ctenophores akhala akunenedwa kuti ndi mzera wa alongo wa Bilateria, mlongo wa Cnidaria, mlongo wa Cnidaria, Placozoa ndi Bilateria, ndi mlongo wa nyama zina zonse za phyla. Mndandanda wa maphunziro omwe adayang'ana kukhalapo ndi kusakhalapo kwa mamembala a mabanja a majini ndi njira zowonetsera (mwachitsanzo, homeoboxes, ma receptors a nyukiliya, njira yowonetsera Wnt, ndi njira za sodium) adawonetsa umboni wogwirizana ndi zochitika ziwiri zomalizazi, kuti ma ctenophores ndi mlongo wa Cnidaria, Placozoa ndi Bilateria kapena mlongo wa nyama zina zonse za phyla. Kafukufuku wambiri waposachedwa poyerekeza ma genome athunthu otsatizana a ctenophores ndi ma genome ena otsatizana a nyama athandizanso ma ctenophores ngati mzere wa alongo ku nyama zina zonse. Udindo umenewu ungasonyeze kuti mitundu ya maselo a neural ndi minofu inatayika m'mizere yayikulu ya nyama (mwachitsanzo, Porifera) kapena kuti iwo anasinthika pawokha mu mzere wa ctenophore. Komabe, ochita kafukufuku ena atsutsa kuti kuyika kwa Ctenophora monga mlongo wa nyama zina zonse ndi vuto la ziwerengero zomwe zimachitika chifukwa cha kuchuluka kwa chisinthiko mu ctenophore genomes, ndikuti Porifera (masiponji) ndi nyama yoyambirira yosiyana kwambiri m'malo mwake. Ctenophores ndi masiponji ndi nyama zokha zomwe zimadziwika kuti zilibe majini enieni a hox.

Ndi chikhalidwe chosiyanasiyana ndipo amaphatikizaponso anthu ambiri aku Mexico-America ndi Asia-America (makamaka a Hmong kapena Laotian).
question: Kodi ndi dera liti lomwe lili kumadzulo kwa msewu waukulu wa 41?

context: Malo oyandikana nawo akuphatikizapo Kearney Boulevard, wotchedwa dzina la wamalonda woyambirira wa zaka za m'ma 1900 komanso mamiliyoni a M. Msewu waung'ono, wamagalimoto awiri akumidzi kwa nthawi yambiri ya kutalika kwake, Kearney Boulevard ili ndi mitengo ya kanjedza yayitali. Pafupifupi theka la kilomita yotambasula ya Kearney Boulevard pakati pa Fresno Street ndi Thorne Ave nthawi ina inali malo osankhidwa a mabanja apamwamba a Fresno a ku Africa ndi America. context: Fresno imatumikiridwa ndi State Route 99, msewu waukulu wakumpoto / kum'mwera womwe umalumikiza malo akuluakulu a California Central Valley. context: Fresno ndi mzinda waukulu kwambiri ku United States womwe sunagwirizane mwachindunji ndi msewu waukulu wa Interstate. Pamene Interstate Highway System idapangidwa m'zaka za m'ma 1950, chisankho chidapangidwa kuti amange zomwe tsopano ndi Interstate 5 kumadzulo kwa Central Valley, ndipo motero kudutsa malo ambiri okhala anthu m'derali, m'malo mopititsa patsogolo zomwe tsopano ndi State Route 99. Chifukwa cha kuchuluka kwa anthu ndi magalimoto mofulumira m'mizinda m'mphepete mwa SR 99, komanso kufunikira kwa ndalama za Federal, zokambirana zambiri zapangidwa kuti zisinthe ku miyezo yapakati pa mayiko ndipo pamapeto pake ziphatikize mu dongosolo la interstate, mwina ngati Interstate 9. Kusintha kwakukulu kwa zizindikiro, m'lifupi mwa njira, kupatukana kwapakati, chilolezo chowonongeka, ndi nkhawa zina zikuchitika panopa.

context: Mu njira yolumikizana phukusi lililonse limaphatikizapo chidziwitso chokwanira choyankhula. Mapaketi amayendetsedwa payekhapayekha, nthawi zina amabweretsa njira zosiyanasiyana komanso kutumiza kunja kwa dongosolo. Phukusi lililonse limalembedwa ndi adilesi yopita, adilesi ya gwero, ndi manambala a doko. Ikhozanso kulembedwa ndi nambala yotsatizana ya paketi. Izi zimalepheretsa kufunika kwa njira yodzipereka yothandizira paketi kupeza njira yake yopita komwe ikupita, koma zikutanthauza kuti zambiri zimafunikira pamutu wa paketi, womwe chifukwa chake ndi wokulirapo, ndipo chidziwitsochi chikuyenera kuyang'aniridwa mu kukumbukira kwa mphamvu-njala yokhutira. Phukusi lililonse limatumizidwa ndipo limatha kudutsa njira zosiyanasiyana; Mwinamwake, dongosololi liyenera kugwira ntchito yambiri pa paketi iliyonse monga momwe dongosolo lolumikizana liyenera kuchitira polumikizana, koma ndi chidziwitso chochepa chokhudza zofunikira za ntchito. Pa kopita, uthenga woyambirira / deta imasonkhanitsidwanso m'dongosolo lolondola, potengera nambala yotsatizana ya paketi. Choncho kulumikizana pafupifupi, komwe kumatchedwanso dera pafupifupi kapena mtsinje wa byte kumaperekedwa kwa wogwiritsa ntchito mapeto ndi protocol yoyendera wosanjikiza, ngakhale kuti mfundo zapakati pa intaneti zimangopereka ntchito yosanjikiza ya intaneti.
question: Kodi phukusi lililonse limaphatikizapo chiyani mu njira yolumikizana

text: adilesi yopita, adilesi ya gwero, ndi manambala a doko

context: Mu njira yolumikizana phukusi lililonse limaphatikizapo chidziwitso chokwanira choyankhula. Mapaketi amayendetsedwa payekhapayekha, nthawi zina amabweretsa njira zosiyanasiyana komanso kutumiza kunja kwa dongosolo. Phukusi lililonse limalembedwa ndi adilesi yopita, adilesi ya gwero, ndi manambala a doko. Ikhozanso kulembedwa ndi nambala yotsatizana ya paketi. Izi zimalepheretsa kufunika kwa njira yodzipereka yothandizira paketi kupeza njira yake yopita komwe ikupita, koma zikutanthauza kuti zambiri zimafunikira pamutu wa paketi, womwe chifukwa chake ndi wokulirapo, ndipo chidziwitsochi chikuyenera kuyang'aniridwa mu kukumbukira kwa mphamvu-njala yokhutira. Phukusi lililonse limatumizidwa ndipo limatha kudutsa njira zosiyanasiyana; Mwinamwake, dongosololi liyenera kugwira ntchito yambiri pa paketi iliyonse monga momwe dongosolo lolumikizana liyenera kuchitira polumikizana, koma ndi chidziwitso chochepa chokhudza zofunikira za ntchito. Pa kopita, uthenga woyambirira / deta imasonkhanitsidwanso m'dongosolo lolondola, potengera nambala yotsatizana ya paketi. Choncho kulumikizana pafupifupi, komwe kumatchedwanso dera pafupifupi kapena mtsinje wa byte kumaperekedwa kwa wogwiritsa ntchito mapeto ndi protocol yoyendera wosanjikiza, ngakhale kuti mfundo zapakati pa intaneti zimangopereka ntchito yosanjikiza ya intaneti.

Kusiyana kwakukulu kawiri kunaphatikizapo kugawidwa kwa ntchito ndi ntchito pakati pa makamu omwe ali m'mphepete mwa intaneti ndi pakati pa intaneti. Mu dongosolo la datagram, oyang'anira ali ndi udindo woonetsetsa kuti mapaketi akuperekedwa mwadongosolo. The User Datagram Protocol (UDP) ndi chitsanzo cha protocol ya datagram. context: DECnet ndi ndondomeko za intaneti zomwe zimapangidwa ndi Digital Equipment Corporation, zomwe zinatulutsidwa poyamba mu 1975 pofuna kulumikiza ma minicomputer awiri a PDP-11. Zinasintha kukhala imodzi mwa zomangamanga zoyambirira za anzawo a intaneti, motero kusintha DEC kukhala mphamvu ya intaneti m'zaka za m'ma 1980. Poyamba inamangidwa ndi zigawo zitatu, pambuyo pake (1982) inasintha kukhala ndondomeko ya intaneti yogwirizana ndi OSI isanu ndi iwiri. Ma protocol a DECnet adapangidwa kwathunthu ndi Digital Equipment Corporation. Komabe, DECnet Phase II (ndipo pambuyo pake) inali miyezo yotseguka yokhala ndi zolemba zofalitsidwa, ndipo kukhazikitsa zingapo kunapangidwa kunja kwa DEC, kuphatikizapo imodzi ya Linux.

context: Merit Network, Inc., bungwe lodziyimira palokha lopanda phindu la 501 (c) (3) lomwe limayang'aniridwa ndi mayunivesite aboma a Michigan, linapangidwa mu 1966 monga Michigan Educational Research Information Triad kuti lifufuze makompyuta pakati pa mayunivesite atatu a boma la Michigan ngati njira yothandizira chitukuko cha maphunziro ndi chuma cha boma. Mothandizidwa koyambirira kuchokera ku State of Michigan ndi National Science Foundation (NSF), maukonde osinthidwa ndi paketi adawonetsedwa koyamba mu Disembala 1971 pamene woyang'anira wolumikizana ndi kulumikizana adapangidwa pakati pa makompyuta a IBM mainframe ku University of Michigan ku Ann Arbor ndi Wayne State University ku Detroit. Mu Okutobala 1972 kulumikizana ndi CDC mainframe ku Michigan State University ku East Lansing kunamaliza triad. Pa zaka zingapo zotsatira kuwonjezera pa woyang'anira kulumikizana ndi kulumikizana kwa intaneti idalimbikitsidwa kuti ithandizire kulumikizana kwa terminal kuti ikhale ndi kulumikizana, kuchititsa kulumikizana kwa batch (kutumiza ntchito yakutali, kusindikiza kwakutali, kusamutsa mafayilo a batch), kusamutsa mafayilo oyankhulana, zipata zopita ku Tymnet ndi Telenet deta ya anthu, X.25 host attachments, zipata zopita ku X.25 data network,  Ethernet yolumikizidwa ndi makamu, ndipo pamapeto pake TCP / IP ndi mayunivesite ena aboma ku Michigan amalowa nawo pa intaneti. Zonsezi zinakhazikitsa gawo la Merit mu polojekiti ya NSFNET kuyambira pakati pa zaka za m'ma 1980.

context: Internet2 ndi bungwe lopanda phindu la United States lomwe limatsogoleredwa ndi mamembala ochokera kumadera ofufuza ndi maphunziro, makampani, ndi boma. Gulu la Internet2, mogwirizana ndi Qwest, linamanga Internet2 Network yoyamba, yotchedwa Abilene, mu 1998 ndipo inali ndalama zazikulu mu polojekiti ya National LambdaRail (NLR). Mu 2006, Internet2 inalengeza mgwirizano ndi Level 3 Communications kuti iyambitse maukonde atsopano a dziko lonse, kukulitsa mphamvu zake kuchokera ku 10 Gbit / s mpaka 100 Gbit / s. Mu Okutobala, 2007, Internet2 idapuma pantchito mwalamulo Abilene ndipo tsopano imatchula maukonde ake atsopano, apamwamba kwambiri monga Internet2 Network.

context: Chidziŵitso cha zamankhwala chinali chitaima m'zaka za m'ma Middle Ages. Nkhani yodalirika kwambiri panthawiyo idachokera kwa akatswiri azachipatala ku Paris mu lipoti kwa mfumu ya France yomwe idaimba mlandu kumwamba, mu mawonekedwe a mgwirizano wa mapulaneti atatu mu 1345 omwe adayambitsa "mliri waukulu mlengalenga". Lipoti limeneli linakhala loyamba ndi lofalitsidwa kwambiri pa mpambo wa mathirakiti a mliri amene ankafuna kupereka uphungu kwa odwala. Mfundo yakuti mliriwo unachititsidwa ndi mpweya woipa inakhala chiphunzitso chovomerezeka kwambiri. Masiku ano, izi zimadziwika kuti chiphunzitso cha Miasma. Mawu akuti 'mliri' analibe tanthauzo lapadera panthawiyi, ndipo kubweranso kokha kwa mliri m'zaka za m'ma Middle Ages kunapatsa dzina lomwe lakhala liwu lamankhwala.

Nkhani yodalirika kwambiri panthawiyo idachokera kwa akatswiri azachipatala ku Paris mu lipoti kwa mfumu ya France yomwe idaimba mlandu kumwamba, mu mawonekedwe a mgwirizano wa mapulaneti atatu mu 1345 omwe adayambitsa "mliri waukulu mlengalenga". Lipoti limeneli linakhala loyamba ndi lofalitsidwa kwambiri pa mpambo wa mathirakiti a mliri amene ankafuna kupereka uphungu kwa odwala. Mfundo yakuti mliriwo unachititsidwa ndi mpweya woipa inakhala chiphunzitso chovomerezeka kwambiri. Masiku ano, izi zimadziwika kuti chiphunzitso cha Miasma. Mawu akuti 'mliri' analibe tanthauzo lapadera panthawiyi, ndipo kubweranso kokha kwa mliri m'zaka za m'ma Middle Ages kunapatsa dzina lomwe lakhala liwu lamankhwala.
question: Kodi chiphunzitso cha mpweya woipa chimadziwika kuti chiyani?

context: Kafukufukuyu adapezanso kuti panali ma clade awiri omwe kale sanadziwike koma ogwirizana (nthambi za majini) a genome ya Y. pestis yogwirizana ndi manda a anthu ambiri. Ma clades awa (omwe amaganiziridwa kuti atha) adapezeka kuti ndi makolo a mitundu yamakono yamakono ya Y. pestis Y. p. orientalis ndi Y. p. medievalis, zomwe zikusonyeza kuti mliriwu ukhoza kulowa ku Ulaya m'mafunde awiri. Kafukufuku wa zotsalira za dzenje la miliri ku France ndi England akuwonetsa kuti mtundu woyamba unalowa ku Ulaya kudzera pa doko la Marseille cha m'ma November 1347 ndipo unafalikira ku France pazaka ziwiri zotsatira, potsirizira pake unafika ku England m'dzinja la 1349, kumene unafalikira m'dzikolo m'miliri itatu. Kafukufuku wa zotsalira za dzenje la mliri kuchokera ku tawuni ya Dutch ya Bergen op Zoom adawonetsa Y. pestis genotype yomwe imayambitsa mliri womwe unafalikira m'mayiko otsika kuchokera ku 1350 wosiyana ndi womwe umapezeka ku Britain ndi France, kutanthauza kuti Bergen op Zoom (ndipo mwina madera ena akumwera kwa Netherlands) sanali ndi matenda mwachindunji kuchokera ku England kapena France mu 1349 ndikuwonetsa mafunde achiwiri a mliri,  osiyana ndi omwe ali ku Britain ndi France, mwina adanyamulidwa kupita ku Low Countries kuchokera ku Norway, mizinda ya Hanseatic kapena malo ena.

question: Kodi y. pestis idafika liti ku England?

context: Njira zosiyanasiyana zothetsera Y. pestis zaikidwa patsogolo. Twigg adanena kuti chifukwa chake chinali mtundu wa anthrax, ndipo Norman Cantor (2001) adaganiza kuti mwina anali kuphatikiza kwa anthrax ndi miliri ina. Scott ndi Duncan atsutsa kuti mliriwu unali mtundu wa matenda opatsirana omwe amadziwika kuti ndi mliri wotuluka magazi wofanana ndi Ebola. Katswiri wofukula za m'mabwinja Barney Sloane watsutsa kuti palibe umboni wokwanira wa kusoloka kwa makoswe ambiri m'mbiri yofukulidwa m'mabwinja a m'mphepete mwa madzi akale ku London ndikuti mliriwu unafalikira mofulumira kwambiri kuti uthandizire mfundo yakuti Y. pestis inafalikira kuchokera ku nthata pa makoswe; Iye akutsutsa kuti kupatsirana kuyenera kukhala kwa munthu ndi munthu. Komabe, palibe njira ina yomwe yavomerezedwa ndi anthu ambiri. Akatswiri ambiri omwe amatsutsa kuti Y. pestis ndi wothandizira wamkulu wa mliriwu amati kukula kwake ndi zizindikiro zake zikhoza kufotokozedwa ndi kuphatikiza kwa mliri wa bubonic ndi matenda ena, kuphatikizapo typhus, nthomba ndi matenda opumira. Kuwonjezera pa matenda a bubonic, ena amanena za mitundu yowonjezera ya septicemic (mtundu wa "poizoni wa magazi") ndi chibayo (mliri wofalitsidwa ndi mpweya umene umaukira mapapo thupi lonse lisanafike) mitundu ya mliriwo, umene umatalikitsa nthaŵi ya mliri m'nyengo zonse ndipo umathandiza kufotokoza kuchuluka kwa imfa ndi zizindikiro zina zolembedwa. M'chaka cha 2014, asayansi a bungwe la Public Health England analengeza zotsatira za kufufuza mitembo 25 yomwe inafukulidwa m'dera la Clerkenwell ku London, komanso zikalata zolembedwa ku London panthawiyi, zomwe zinathandizira lingaliro la chibayo.

context: Mu 1466, anthu pafupifupi 40,000 anafa ndi mliriwu ku Paris. M'zaka za zana la 16 ndi 17, mliriwu unalipo ku Paris pafupifupi 30 peresenti ya nthawiyo. Mliri wa Black Death unawononga Ulaya kwa zaka zitatu usanapitirize kupita ku Russia, kumene matendawa analipo kwinakwake m'dzikoli nthaŵi 25 pakati pa 1350 ndi 1490. Miliri ya mliri inawononga London mu 1563, 1593, 1603, 1625, 1636, ndi 1665, kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu ake ndi 10 mpaka 30% m'zaka zimenezo. Oposa 10% ya anthu a Amsterdam adamwalira mu 1623-25, ndipo kachiwiri mu 1635-36, 1655, ndi 1664. Mliri unachitika ku Venice nthawi 22 pakati pa 1361 ndi 1528. Mliri wa 1576-77 unapha anthu 50,000 ku Venice, pafupifupi gawo limodzi mwa magawo atatu a anthu. Mliri wochedwa pakati pa Europe unaphatikizapo Mliri wa ku Italy wa 1629-1631, womwe umagwirizanitsidwa ndi kayendedwe ka asilikali panthawi ya Nkhondo ya Zaka Makumi Atatu, ndi Mliri Waukulu wa Vienna mu 1679. Oposa 60% ya anthu aku Norway adamwalira mu 1348-50. Mliri womaliza unawononga Oslo mu 1654.

Miliri ya mliri inawononga London mu 1563, 1593, 1603, 1625, 1636, ndi 1665, kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha anthu ake ndi 10 mpaka 30% m'zaka zimenezo. Oposa 10% ya anthu a Amsterdam adamwalira mu 1623-25, ndipo kachiwiri mu 1635-36, 1655, ndi 1664. Mliri unachitika ku Venice nthawi 22 pakati pa 1361 ndi 1528. Mliri wa 1576-77 unapha anthu 50,000 ku Venice, pafupifupi gawo limodzi mwa magawo atatu a anthu. Mliri wochedwa pakati pa Europe unaphatikizapo Mliri wa ku Italy wa 1629-1631, womwe umagwirizanitsidwa ndi kayendedwe ka asilikali panthawi ya Nkhondo ya Zaka Makumi Atatu, ndi Mliri Waukulu wa Vienna mu 1679. Oposa 60% ya anthu aku Norway adamwalira mu 1348-50. Mliri womaliza unawononga Oslo mu 1654.
question: Kodi mliri womaliza unali liti?

context: Mliri Wakuda unawononga mbali yaikulu ya dziko la Chisilamu. Mliri unalipo m'malo osachepera amodzi m'dziko la Chisilamu pafupifupi chaka chilichonse pakati pa 1500 ndi 1850. Mliri unakantha mobwerezabwereza mizinda ya kumpoto kwa Africa. Algiers anataya anthu 30 mpaka 50 zikwi mu 1620-21, ndipo kachiwiri mu 1654-57, 1665, 1691, ndi 1740-42. Mliri udakhalabe chochitika chachikulu m'chitaganya cha Ottoman mpaka gawo lachiwiri la zaka za zana la 19. Pakati pa 1701 ndi 1750, miliri ikuluikulu ndi yaying'ono makumi atatu mphambu zisanu ndi ziwiri idalembedwa ku Constantinople, ndipo ina makumi atatu ndi imodzi pakati pa 1751 ndi 1800. Baghdad yavutika kwambiri chifukwa cha kuchezeredwa ndi mliriwu, ndipo nthawi zina anthu awiri mwa atatu alionse a anthu ake afafanizidwa.

context: Nthawi zinayi zotsatirazi zikuwonetsa nthawi ya geologic. Choyamba chikuwonetsa nthawi yonse kuyambira mapangidwe a Dziko lapansi mpaka pano, koma izi zimapondereza eon yaposachedwa kwambiri. Chifukwa chake, sikelo yachiwiri ikuwonetsa eon yaposachedwa kwambiri yokhala ndi sikelo yowonjezera. Sikelo yachiwiri imapondereza nyengo yaposachedwa kwambiri, kotero nyengo yaposachedwa kwambiri imakulitsidwa mu sikelo yachitatu. Popeza Quaternary ndi nthawi yayifupi kwambiri yokhala ndi nthawi zazifupi, imawonjezeredwa mu sikelo yachinayi. Nthawi yachiwiri, yachitatu, ndi yachinayi chifukwa chake ndi gawo lililonse la nthawi yawo yam'mbuyomu monga momwe zasonyezedwera ndi nyenyezi. Holocene (nyengo yaposachedwa) ndi yaying'ono kwambiri kuti iwonetsedwe bwino pa nthawi yachitatu kumanja, chifukwa china chowonjezera sikelo yachinayi. Nthawi ya Pleistocene (P). Q imayimira nthawi ya Quaternary.
question: Chifukwa chiyani nthawi yachiwiri ikufunika?
