context: Mfundo yotsatizana ndi nyama imachokera pakuwonekera kwa zinthu zakale m'miyala ya sedimentary. Monga zamoyo zimakhalapo nthawi yomweyo padziko lonse lapansi, kukhalapo kwawo kapena (nthawi zina) kusakhalapo kwawo kungagwiritsidwe ntchito kupereka zaka zachibale za mapangidwe omwe amapezeka. Pogwiritsa ntchito mfundo zokhazikitsidwa ndi William Smith pafupifupi zaka zana limodzi chisanafalitsidwe chiphunzitso cha Charles Darwin cha chisinthiko, mfundo zoloŵa m'malo zinapangidwa mosadalira lingaliro la chisinthiko. Mfundoyi imakhala yovuta kwambiri, komabe, chifukwa cha kusatsimikizika kwa zinthu zakale, malo a mitundu yakale chifukwa cha kusintha kwa mbali m'malo okhala (kusintha kwa nkhope mu sedimentary strata), ndikuti si zinthu zonse zakale zomwe zingapezeke padziko lonse lapansi nthawi yomweyo.
question: Kodi ndi mfundo iti yomwe imachokera ku maonekedwe a zinthu zakale m'miyala ya sedimentary?

context: Mu labotale, stratigraphers amasanthula zitsanzo za zigawo za stratigraphic zomwe zingabwezeretsedwe kuchokera kumunda, monga zomwe zimachokera ku kubowola. Stratigraphers amafufuzanso deta kuchokera ku kafukufuku wa geophysical yemwe amasonyeza malo a mayunitsi a stratigraphic pansi pa nthaka. Deta ya geophysical ndi mitengo ya chitsime ikhoza kuphatikizidwa kuti ipange mawonekedwe abwino a pansi pa nthaka, ndipo stratigraphers nthawi zambiri amagwiritsa ntchito mapulogalamu apakompyuta kuti achite izi m'miyeso itatu. Kenaka akatswiri a stratigraphers akhoza kugwiritsa ntchito deta imeneyi kuti amangenso njira zakale zomwe zimachitika pamwamba pa Dziko Lapansi, kutanthauzira malo akale, ndikupeza malo opangira madzi, malasha, ndi hydrocarbon.

context: Akatswiri ena amakono, monga Fielding H. Garrison, ali ndi lingaliro lakuti chiyambi cha sayansi ya geology chingapezeke ku Persia pambuyo poti kugonjetsa kwa Asilamu kunatha. Abu al-Rayhan al-Biruni (973-1048 CE) anali m'modzi mwa akatswiri oyambirira a zam'madzi a ku Persia, omwe ntchito zawo zinaphatikizapo zolemba zoyambirira za geology ya India, akuganiza kuti dziko la India kale linali nyanja. Pogwiritsa ntchito mabuku asayansi achigiriki ndi India omwe sanawonongedwe ndi kugonjetsa kwa Asilamu, katswiri wa ku Persia Ibn Sina (Avicenna, 981-1037) adapereka malongosoledwe atsatanetsatane a mapangidwe a mapiri, chiyambi cha zivomezi, ndi mitu ina yofunika kwambiri pa geology yamakono, yomwe idapereka maziko ofunikira pakukula kwa sayansi pambuyo pake. Ku China, polymath Shen Kuo (1031-1095) adapanga lingaliro la njira yopangira nthaka: potengera momwe adawonera zipolopolo za nyama zakale m'dera la geological m'phiri makilomita mazana ambiri kuchokera kunyanja, adanena kuti dzikolo linapangidwa ndi kukokoloka kwa mapiri komanso ndi kuchotsedwa kwa matope.
question: Fielding H. Garrison amakhulupirira kuti sayansi ya geology ikhoza kupezeka kuti?

context: Akatswiri ena amakono, monga Fielding H. Garrison, ali ndi lingaliro lakuti chiyambi cha sayansi ya geology chingapezeke ku Persia pambuyo poti kugonjetsa kwa Asilamu kunatha. Abu al-Rayhan al-Biruni (973-1048 CE) anali m'modzi mwa akatswiri oyambirira a zam'madzi a ku Persia, omwe ntchito zawo zinaphatikizapo zolemba zoyambirira za geology ya India, akuganiza kuti dziko la India kale linali nyanja. Pogwiritsa ntchito mabuku asayansi achigiriki ndi India omwe sanawonongedwe ndi kugonjetsa kwa Asilamu, katswiri wa ku Persia Ibn Sina (Avicenna, 981-1037) adapereka malongosoledwe atsatanetsatane a mapangidwe a mapiri, chiyambi cha zivomezi, ndi mitu ina yofunika kwambiri pa geology yamakono, yomwe idapereka maziko ofunikira pakukula kwa sayansi pambuyo pake. Ku China, polymath Shen Kuo (1031-1095) adapanga lingaliro la njira yopangira nthaka: potengera momwe adawonera zipolopolo za nyama zakale m'dera la geological m'phiri makilomita mazana ambiri kuchokera kunyanja, adanena kuti dzikolo linapangidwa ndi kukokoloka kwa mapiri komanso ndi kuchotsedwa kwa matope.
question: Pokhala ndi moyo kuyambira 973-1048 CE anali m'modzi mwa akatswiri oyambirira a Perisiya, dzina lake linali chiyani?

context: James Hutton nthawi zambiri amawonedwa ngati katswiri woyamba wamakono wa zam'madzi. Mu 1785 adapereka pepala lotchedwa Theory of the Earth ku Royal Society of Edinburgh. M'pepala lake, adalongosola chiphunzitso chake chakuti Dziko lapansi liyenera kukhala lakale kwambiri kuposa momwe ankaganizira kale kuti lipereke nthawi yokwanira kuti mapiri awonongeke komanso kuti matope apange miyala yatsopano pansi pa nyanja, yomwe idakwezedwa kuti ikhale nthaka youma. Hutton adafalitsa mavoliyumu awiri a malingaliro ake mu 1795 (Vol. 1, Vol. 2).

text: Dziko lapansi liyenera kukhala lakale kwambiri kuposa momwe ankaganizira kale

context: Malo oyamba kulembedwa m'dera lomwe tsopano limatchedwa Newcastle anali Pons Aelius, linga lachiroma ndi mlatho wodutsa mtsinje wa Tyne. Anapatsidwa dzina la banja la Mfumu ya Roma Hadrian, yemwe anayambitsa m'zaka za zana la 2 AD. Ulemu wosowa umenewu ukusonyeza kuti Hadrian mwina anayendera malowa ndikukhazikitsa mlathowu paulendo wake wopita ku Britain. Chiwerengero cha anthu a Pons Aelius panthawiyi chinali choyerekezedwa kukhala 2,000. Zidutswa za Khoma la Hadrian zikuwonekabe m'madera ena a Newcastle, makamaka m'mphepete mwa West Road. Njira ya "Khoma la Roma" ikhoza kupezeka kum'mawa kwa linga lachiroma la Segedunum ku Wallsend-"mapeto a khoma"-ndi ku mpanda wopereka Arbeia ku South Shields. Kukula kwa Khoma la Hadrian kunali makilomita 117, kudutsa m'lifupi mwa Britain; Khoma linaphatikizapo Vallum, ngalande yayikulu yakumbuyo yokhala ndi miyulu yofananira, ndipo inamangidwa makamaka kuti iteteze, kuti ateteze kusamuka kosafunikira komanso kulowerera kwa mafuko a Pictish ochokera kumpoto, osati ngati mzere womenyera nkhondo waukulu.

context: Msika wa Grainger unalowa m'malo mwa msika woyambirira womwe unamangidwa mu 1808 wotchedwa Butcher Market. Msika wa Grainger womwewo, unatsegulidwa mu 1835 ndipo unali msika woyamba wamkati wa Newcastle. Panthawi yotsegulidwa mu 1835 idanenedwa kuti ndi imodzi mwamisika yayikulu komanso yokongola kwambiri ku Europe. Kutsegulira kunakondwerera ndi chakudya chamadzulo chachikulu chomwe alendo 2000 adapezekapo, ndipo Laing Art Gallery ili ndi chithunzi cha mwambowu. Kupatula denga lamatabwa, lomwe linawonongedwa ndi moto mu 1901 ndikusinthidwa ndi zitsulo zachitsulo, Msika uli kwakukulukulu mu mkhalidwe wake woyambirira. Zomangamanga za Grainger Market, monga ambiri ku Grainger Town, omwe ali a grade I kapena II omwe adalembedwa, adalembedwa kalasi I mu 1954 ndi English Heritage.
question: Kodi ndi msika woyambirira wotani womwe msika wa Grainger unalowa m'malo?

context: Lindisfarne ndi gulu la folk-rock lomwe lili ndi mgwirizano wolimba wa Tyneside. Nyimbo yawo yotchuka kwambiri, "Fog on the Tyne" (1971), idaphimbidwa ndi Geordie yemwe kale anali wosewera mpira Paul Gascoigne mu 1990. Venom, yomwe ambiri amawerengedwa kuti ndi oyambitsa chitsulo chakuda komanso yomwe imakhudza kwambiri chitsulo chonse, idapangidwa ku Newcastle mu 1979. Gulu lachitsulo la Skyclad, lomwe nthawi zambiri limawonedwa ngati gulu loyamba lachitsulo chachikhalidwe, linapangidwanso ku Newcastle pambuyo pa kusweka kwa gulu la Martin Walkyier thrash metal, Sabbat. Andy Taylor, yemwe kale anali wotsogolera gitala wa Duran Duran anabadwira kuno mu 1961. Brian Johnson anali membala wa gulu la rock la Geordie asanakhale wotsogolera wa AC / DC.
question: Kodi Lindisfarne ali ndi mtundu wanji wa nyimbo?

Gulu lachitsulo la Skyclad, lomwe nthawi zambiri limawonedwa ngati gulu loyamba lachitsulo chachikhalidwe, linapangidwanso ku Newcastle pambuyo pa kusweka kwa gulu la Martin Walkyier thrash metal, Sabbat. Andy Taylor, yemwe kale anali wotsogolera gitala wa Duran Duran anabadwira kuno mu 1961. Brian Johnson anali membala wa gulu la rock la Geordie asanakhale wotsogolera wa AC / DC.

context: Mzindawu umatumikiridwa ndi Tyne ndi Wear Metro, dongosolo la njanji zam'tawuni ndi zapansi panthaka zomwe zimaphimba mbali yaikulu ya Tyne ndi Wear. Idatsegulidwa m'magawo asanu pakati pa 1980 ndi 1984, ndipo inali njira yoyamba yodutsa njanji yopepuka ku Britain; zowonjezera ziwiri zinatsegulidwa mu 1991 ndi 2002. Idapangidwa kuchokera ku kuphatikiza kwa njanji ndi masiteshoni omwe alipo komanso omwe adamangidwa kumene, ndi ngalande zakuya zomwe zimamangidwa kudzera mumzinda wa Newcastle. Mlatho unamangidwa kudutsa mtsinje wa Tyne, pakati pa Newcastle ndi Gateshead, ndipo unatsegulidwa ndi Mfumukazi Elizabeth II mu 1981. Intaneti imayendetsedwa ndi DB Regio m'malo mwa Nexus ndipo imanyamula anthu oposa 37 miliyoni pachaka, mpaka ku Newcastle Airport, Tynemouth, South Shields ndi South Hylton ku Sunderland. Mu 2004, kampani Marconi idapanga ndikupanga wailesi yam'manja ku dongosolo la Metro yapansi panthaka. Dongosolo la Metro linali loyamba ku UK kukhala ndi ma antennae a foni yam'manja omwe amaikidwa m'ngalande.

context: Mzindawu uli ndi mayunivesite awiri - Newcastle University ndi Northumbria University. Newcastle University ali chiyambi chake mu School of Medicine ndi Opaleshoni, anakhazikitsidwa mu 1834 ndipo anakhala palokha ku Durham University pa 1 August 1963 kupanga University of Newcastle pa Tyne. Newcastle University tsopano ndi imodzi mwa mayunivesite otsogolera padziko lonse lapansi ku UK. Inapambana mphoto yosiririka ya Sunday Times University of the Year mu 2000. Northumbria University ali ndi chiyambi chake mu Newcastle Polytechnic, anakhazikitsidwa mu 1969 ndipo anakhala University of Northumbria pa Newcastle mu 1992 monga mbali ya ndondomeko UK lonse limene polytechnics anakhala mayunivesite atsopano. Yunivesite ya Northumbria idasankhidwa kukhala 'Best New University' ndi The Times Good University Guide 2005 ndipo idapambananso mphoto ya kampani yosiririka kwambiri ya "Bungwe lambiri la IT" (ku UK), ndi magazini yamakampani a IT Computing.

context: V&A ili ndi chiyambi chake mu Chiwonetsero Chachikulu cha 1851, chomwe Henry Cole, mtsogoleri woyamba wa nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale, adagwira nawo ntchito yokonzekera; poyamba inkadziwika kuti Museum of Manufactures, yoyamba kutsegulidwa mu Meyi 1852 ku Marlborough House, koma pofika Seputembala idasamutsidwira ku Somerset House. Panthawiyi zosonkhanitsira zinaphatikizapo zojambulajambula komanso sayansi. Ziwonetsero zingapo kuchokera ku Chiwonetserochi zidagulidwa kuti apange maziko a zosonkhanitsira. Pofika February 1854 zokambirana zinali zikuchitika kuti asamutsire nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale kumalo omwe alipo ndipo adatchedwanso South Kensington Museum. Mu 1855 katswiri wa zomangamanga waku Germany Gottfried Semper, atapemphedwa ndi Cole, adatulutsa kapangidwe ka nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale, koma idakanidwa ndi Board of Trade kuti ndi yokwera mtengo kwambiri. Malowa anali ndi Brompton Park House; Izi zinawonjezeredwa kuphatikizapo zipinda zotsitsimutsa zoyamba zomwe zinatsegulidwa mu 1857, nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale kukhala yoyamba padziko lonse lapansi kupereka malo oterowo.

context: Zosonkhanitsa za Far East zimaphatikizapo ntchito zoposa 70,000 zojambulajambula kuchokera ku mayiko a East Asia: China, Japan ndi Korea. T. T. Tsui Gallery ya zojambulajambula zaku China idatsegulidwa mu 1991, ndikuwonetsa zosonkhanitsa zoimira za V&As pafupifupi zinthu 16,000 zochokera ku China, kuyambira zaka chikwi za 4 BC mpaka lero. Ngakhale kuti ntchito zambiri zojambulajambula zomwe zikuwonetsedwa zimachokera ku mafumu a Ming ndi Qing, pali zitsanzo zabwino kwambiri za zinthu zomwe zimachokera ku ufumu wa Tang ndi nthawi zoyambirira. Chochititsa chidwi n'chakuti, mutu wamkuwa wa mita ya Buddha womwe unalembedwa c.750 AD ndi chimodzi mwazinthu zakale kwambiri mutu wa kavalo wa jade wazaka 2,000 kuchokera kumanda, ziboliboli zina zimaphatikizapo oyang'anira manda a moyo. Zitsanzo zakale za kupanga kwa China zikuwonetsedwa zomwe zimaphatikizapo lacquer, silika, porcelain, jade ndi cloisonné enamel. Zithunzi ziŵiri zazikulu za makolo a mwamuna ndi mkazi zojambulidwa m'madzi pa silika zinalembedwa m'zaka za zana la 18. Pali tebulo lapadera la lacquerware laku China, lopangidwa m'malo ogwirira ntchito achifumu mu ulamuliro wa Xuande Emperor mu ufumu wa Ming. Zitsanzo za zovala zikuwonetsedwanso. Chimodzi mwazinthu zazikulu kwambiri ndi bedi lochokera pakati pa zaka za zana la 17. Ntchito ya opanga mapulani amakono aku China ikuwonetsedwanso.
question: Pafupifupi ndi ntchito zingati zojambulajambula zomwe zimaphatikizidwa mu zosonkhanitsira za Far East?

context: Zosonkhanitsa zovala ndizochuluka kwambiri ku Britain, zomwe zili ndi zovala zoposa 14,000 kuphatikizapo zowonjezera, makamaka kuyambira 1600 mpaka pano. Zojambula zovala, zolemba zojambulajambula, ndi ntchito zina papepala nthawi zambiri zimagwiridwa ndi dipatimenti ya Mawu ndi Zithunzi. Chifukwa chakuti zovala za tsiku ndi tsiku za m'nyengo zam'mbuyomu sizinapulumuke, zosonkhanitsira zimagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi zovala zamakono zopangidwira zochitika zapadera. Imodzi mwa mphatso zoyambirira zofunika kwambiri za zovala inabwera mu 1913 pamene V&A idalandira zosonkhanitsa za Talbot Hughes zokhala ndi zovala ndi zinthu za 1,442 monga mphatso kuchokera ku Harrods potsatira chiwonetsero chake ku sitolo yapafupi.

context: Malo ogulitsira a Musical Instruments adatsekedwa pa 25 February 2010, chisankho chomwe chinali chotsutsana kwambiri. Pempho la pa intaneti la mayina oposa 5,100 pa webusaiti ya Nyumba ya Malamulo linapangitsa kuti Chris Smith afunse Nyumba ya Malamulo za tsogolo la zosonkhanitsira. Yankho, kuchokera kwa Bryan Davies linali lakuti nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale inali ndi cholinga chosunga ndi kusamalira zosonkhanitsira ndikuzisunga kwa anthu onse, ndi zinthu zomwe zikugawidwanso ku British Galleries, Medieval & Renaissance Galleries, ndi malo atsopano omwe adakonzedwa a Furniture ndi Europe 1600-1800, ndikuti Horniman Museum ndi mabungwe ena anali otheka kubwereketsa zinthu kuti zitsimikizire kuti zipangizozo zimakhalabe zowoneka pagulu. Horniman adapitiliza kuchititsa chiwonetsero chogwirizana ndi V&A ya zida zoimbira, ndipo ali ndi ngongole ya zida 35 kuchokera ku nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale.
question: Pafupifupi ndi mayina angati omwe adasainidwa pa pempho la pa intaneti pa webusaiti ya Nyumba ya Malamulo poyankha kutsekedwa kwa malo ogulitsira a Musical Instruments?

context: Mu 1857 John Sheepshanks anapereka zojambula 233, makamaka ndi ojambula a ku Britain a m'nthawiyo, ndi zojambula zofanana ku nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale ndi cholinga chopanga 'A National Gallery of British Art', udindo kuyambira pomwe adatengedwa ndi Tate Britain; ojambula omwe akuimiridwa ndi William Blake, James Barry, Henry Fuseli, Sir Edwin Henry Landseer, Sir David Wilkie, William Mulready, William Powell Frith, Millais ndi Hippolyte Delaroche. Ngakhale kuti ntchito zina za Constable zinabwera ku nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale ndi cholowa cha Sheepshanks, ntchito zambiri za wojambulayo zinaperekedwa ndi mwana wake wamkazi Isabel mu 1888, kuphatikizapo chiwerengero chachikulu cha zojambula zamafuta, chofunika kwambiri ndi chithunzi cha mafuta cha 1821 cha The Hay Wain. Ojambula ena omwe ali ndi ntchito zosonkhanitsira ndi awa: Bernardino Fungai, Marcus Gheeraerts Wamng'ono, Domenico di Pace Beccafumi, Fioravante Ferramola, Jan Brueghel Wamkulu, Anthony van Dyck, Ludovico Carracci, Antonio Verrio, Giovanni Battista Tiepolo, Domenico Tiepolo, Canaletto, Francis Hayman, Pompeo Batoni, Benjamin West, Paul Sandby, Richard Wilson, William Etty, Henry Fuseli, Sir Thomas Lawrence, James Barry,  Francis Danby, Richard Parkes Bonington ndi Alphonse Legros.

context: Mu 1998, netiweki inayamba kugwiritsa ntchito chizindikiritso chojambula chochepa, chopangidwa ndi Pittard Sullivan, chokhala ndi chizindikiro chaching'ono chakuda ndi choyera cha "ABC Circle" pamtundu wachikasu (kukwezedwa panthawiyi kunawonetsanso ndondomeko ya zithunzi za nyenyezi za mapulogalamu ake pa khadi la nthawi komanso ndondomeko ya nda yomwe inayamba usiku uliwonse). Nyimbo yatsopano ya mutu wa zolemba zinayi idayambitsidwa pambali pa phukusi, yochokera ku intaneti ya "Timakonda TV" chithunzi cha chithunzi chomwe chinayambitsidwa chaka chimenecho, ndikupanga siginecha yomvetsera yofanana ndi NBC chimes, CBS 'mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya zolemba zitatu (kuphatikizapo mtundu wamakono womwe umagwiritsidwa ntchito kuyambira 2000) ndi Fox Fanfare. Siginecha ya zolemba zinayi yasinthidwa ndi nyengo iliyonse yapa TV pambuyo pake (ngakhale mitundu yake yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito kuyambira nyengo ya 1998-99 imakhalabe yogwiritsidwa ntchito panthawi yopanga makadi opanda pake omwe akuwonetsedwa potsatira ngongole zotseka za mapulogalamu ambiri). Mu kugwa kwa 2015, ABC imayimitsidwa ndi ma jingles ake anayi a 1998-2002 a zotsatsa ndi makadi a kampani yopanga zachabechabe potsatira ngongole zotseka za mapulogalamu ake ambiri pazaka khumi ndi zisanu ndi ziwiri, tsopano ili ndi nyimbo zosiyana komanso zamtundu wosangalatsa (ndi ng'oma za siginecha ya intaneti ya zolemba zinayi kumapeto). Nyimbo yakale ya mutu wa zolemba zinayi imagwiritsidwabe ntchito ndi ABC on Demand mpaka kumayambiriro kwa chiwonetsero cha ABC.

context: Komabe, vuto linatuluka ponena za malangizo omwe ABC ndi UPT adatenga. Mu 1950, Noble adasankha Robert Kintner kukhala pulezidenti wa ABC pomwe iye mwini anali CEO wake, udindo womwe adzakhala nawo mpaka imfa yake mu 1958. Ngakhale lonjezo la kusagwirizana pakati pa ABC ndi UPT, Goldenson anayenera kulowerera pazosankha za ABC chifukwa cha mavuto azachuma komanso nthawi yayitali ya FCC yosasankha. Goldenson adawonjezera chisokonezo pamene, mu Okutobala 1954, adakonza kuphatikiza pakati pa UPT ndi DuMont Television Network, yomwe inalinso m'mavuto azachuma. Monga gawo la kuphatikiza kumeneku, maukonde akanatchedwanso "ABC-DuMont" kwa zaka zisanu, ndipo DuMont akanalandira ndalama zokwana madola 5 miliyoni, chipinda pa nda ya mapulogalamu a DuMont omwe alipo, ndi nthawi yotsimikizika yotsatsa malonda kwa olandira a DuMont Laboratories. Kuphatikiza apo, kuti atsatire malamulo a umwini wa FCC, zikanakhala zofunikira kugulitsa WABC-TV kapena DuMont yomwe ili ndi siteshoni ya WABD pamsika wa New York City, komanso malo ena awiri. ABC-DuMont yophatikizidwa ikadakhala ndi chuma chopikisana ndi CBS ndi NBC.

context: Kumayambiriro kwa zaka za m'ma 1970, ABC inatha kusintha kwake ku mtundu; zaka khumi zonse zikanakhala kusintha kwa ABC, popeza idayamba kudutsa CBS ndi NBC m'mavoti kuti ikhale malo oyamba. Inayambanso kugwiritsa ntchito deta ya khalidwe ndi chiwerengero cha anthu kuti adziwe bwino mitundu ya othandizira kuti agulitse mipata yotsatsa malonda ndikupereka mapulogalamu omwe angakondweretse omvera ena. Kupindula kwa ABC mu gawo la omvera kunathandizidwa kwambiri ndi mfundo yakuti misika ingapo yaying'ono idakula mokwanira kuti alole kugwirizana kwa nthawi zonse kuchokera ku intaneti zonse zitatu.

question: Kodi ndi deta yamtundu wanji yomwe ABC inayamba kugwiritsa ntchito m'zaka za m'ma 1970 kuti iyang'ane bwino malonda ndi mapulogalamu kwa omvera ena?

context: ABC inalamulira malo apawailesi yakanema a ku America m'zaka za m'ma 1970 ndi kumayambiriro kwa zaka za m'ma 1980 (pofika 1980, maukonde atatu akuluakulu ankaimira 90% ya anthu onse oonera ma TV ku US). Mndandanda wambiri wa flagship unayamba pa intaneti panthawiyi kuphatikizapo Dynasty, sewero lapamwamba kuchokera kwa Aaron Spelling lomwe linakhala lotchuka pamene linayamba ngati mndandanda wapakati pa nyengo mu 1981, miyezi isanu isanafike Spelling's ABC ina ya Charlie's Angelo inatha kuthamanga. Intaneti idalimbikitsidwanso kumayambiriro kwa zaka za m'ma 1980 ndi kupitiliza kupambana kwa Happy Days, Three's Company, Laverne & Shirley ndi Fantasy Island, ndipo adapeza zatsopano mu Too Close for Comfort, Soap spinoff Benson ndi Happy Days spinoff Mork & Mindy. Mu 1981, ABC (kudzera mu gawo lake la ABC Video Services) idakhazikitsa Alpha Repertory Television Service (ARTS), chingwe cha chingwe chomwe chimagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati mgwirizano ndi Hearst Corporation yopereka mapulogalamu a chikhalidwe ndi zaluso, omwe adaulutsidwa ngati utumiki wa usiku pa malo a Nickelodeon.

context: ABC inalamulira malo apawailesi yakanema a ku America m'zaka za m'ma 1970 ndi kumayambiriro kwa zaka za m'ma 1980 (pofika 1980, maukonde atatu akuluakulu ankaimira 90% ya anthu onse oonera ma TV ku US). Mndandanda wambiri wa flagship unayamba pa intaneti panthawiyi kuphatikizapo Dynasty, sewero lapamwamba kuchokera kwa Aaron Spelling lomwe linakhala lotchuka pamene linayamba ngati mndandanda wapakati pa nyengo mu 1981, miyezi isanu isanafike Spelling's ABC ina ya Charlie's Angelo inatha kuthamanga. Intaneti idalimbikitsidwanso kumayambiriro kwa zaka za m'ma 1980 ndi kupitiliza kupambana kwa Happy Days, Three's Company, Laverne & Shirley ndi Fantasy Island, ndipo adapeza zatsopano mu Too Close for Comfort, Soap spinoff Benson ndi Happy Days spinoff Mork & Mindy. Mu 1981, ABC (kudzera mu gawo lake la ABC Video Services) idakhazikitsa Alpha Repertory Television Service (ARTS), chingwe cha chingwe chomwe chimagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati mgwirizano ndi Hearst Corporation yopereka mapulogalamu a chikhalidwe ndi zaluso, omwe adaulutsidwa ngati utumiki wa usiku pa malo a Nickelodeon.

question: Kodi Börte adabereka Jochi chaka chiti?

context: Pamene Jamukha ndi Temüjin adasiyana paubwenzi wawo, aliyense adayamba kulimbitsa mphamvu, ndipo posakhalitsa adakhala otsutsana. Jamukha adathandizira chikhalidwe cha aristocracy cha ku Mongolia, pomwe Temüjin adatsatira njira ya meritocratic, ndipo adakopa otsatira ambiri, ngakhale otsika. Chifukwa cha kugonjetsedwa kwake koyambirira kwa Merkits, komanso kulengeza kwa shaman Kokochu kuti Eternal Blue Sky idapatula dziko lapansi kwa Temüjin, Temüjin adayamba kulamulira. Mu 1186, Temüjin adasankhidwa kukhala khan wa Mongols. Komabe, Jamukha, atawopsezedwa ndi kukwera mwachangu kwa Temüjin, adasunthira mwachangu kuti aletse zolinga za Temüjin. Mu 1187, adayambitsa kuukira bwenzi lake lakale ndi gulu lankhondo la asilikali zikwi makumi atatu. Temüjin mwachangu adasonkhanitsa otsatira ake kuti ateteze kuukirako, koma adamenyedwa motsimikiza mu Nkhondo ya Dalan Balzhut. Jamukha adawopseza anthu kwambiri ndikuvulaza chithunzi chake pophika anyamata makumi asanu ndi awiri akapolo amoyo m'miphika, kupatukana ndi ambiri omwe angakhale otsatira ake ndikupangitsa chifundo kwa Temüjin. Toghrul, monga mtsogoleri wa Temüjin, adathamangitsidwa ku Qara Khitai. Moyo wa Temüjin kwa zaka khumi zotsatira ndi wosadziŵika bwino, popeza zolembedwa za mbiri yakale zimakhala chete pa nthawi imeneyo.

question: Kodi mtsogoleri wa Temüjin Toghrul adathamangitsidwa kuti?

context: Mu 1939 asilikali a Nationalist aku China adatenga mandawo kuchokera pamalo ake ku 'Khola la Ambuye' (Chimongolia: Edsen Khoroo) ku Mongolia kuti aliteteze ku asilikali aku Japan. Idatengedwa kudutsa m'dera la Chikomyunizimu ku Yan'an makilomita 900 pa ngolo kupita ku chitetezo ku nyumba ya amonke yachibuda, Dongshan Dafo Dian, komwe idakhala zaka khumi. Mu 1949, pamene asilikali a Chikomyunizimu anali kupita patsogolo, asilikali a Nationalist anasamutsira makilomita ena 200 kumadzulo kupita ku nyumba yotchuka ya amonke ya ku Tibet ya Kumbum Monastery kapena Ta'er Shi pafupi ndi Xining, yomwe posakhalitsa inagwera pansi pa ulamuliro wa Chikomyunizimu. Kumayambiriro kwa 1954, bier ndi zotsalira za Genghis Khan zinabwezeretsedwa ku Khola la Ambuye ku Mongolia. Pofika mu 1956 kachisi watsopano anamangidwa kumeneko kuti azikhalamo. Mu 1968 panthawi ya Cultural Revolution, Red Guards adawononga pafupifupi chilichonse chamtengo wapatali. "Zotsalira" zinapangidwanso m'zaka za m'ma 1970 ndipo chifaniziro chachikulu cha marble cha Genghis chinamalizidwa mu 1989.

question: Ndani anawononga zotsalira zamtengo wapatali kwambiri m'manda panthawi ya Cultural Revolution?

context: Mosiyana ndi zimene anthu ambiri amakhulupirira, Genghis Khan sanagonjetse madera onse omwe anali mbali ya Ufumu wa Mongol. Pa nthawi ya imfa yake, Ufumu wa Mongolia unayambira ku Nyanja ya Caspian mpaka ku Nyanja ya Japan. Ufumuwo unapitirizabe kukula kwa m'badwo umodzi kapena kuposerapo pambuyo pa imfa ya Genghis mu 1227. Pansi pa wolowa m'malo wa Genghis Ögedei Khan liwiro la kufutukuka lidafika pachimake. Magulu ankhondo a Mongolia adakankhira ku Persia, adamaliza Western Xia ndi zotsalira za a Khwarezmids, ndipo adakangana ndi ufumu wachifumu wa Song wa China, kuyambitsa nkhondo yomwe idatenga mpaka 1279 ndipo yomwe idatha pomwe a Mongolia adalanda dziko lonse la China. Anapitiliranso ku Russia ndi kum'mawa kwa Ulaya.

Ufumuwo unapitirizabe kukula kwa m'badwo umodzi kapena kuposerapo pambuyo pa imfa ya Genghis mu 1227. Pansi pa wolowa m'malo wa Genghis Ögedei Khan liwiro la kufutukuka lidafika pachimake. Magulu ankhondo a Mongolia adakankhira ku Persia, adamaliza Western Xia ndi zotsalira za a Khwarezmids, ndipo adakangana ndi ufumu wachifumu wa Song wa China, kuyambitsa nkhondo yomwe idatenga mpaka 1279 ndipo yomwe idatha pomwe a Mongolia adalanda dziko lonse la China. Anapitiliranso ku Russia ndi kum'mawa kwa Ulaya.

context: Kuwukira kwa Baghdad, Samarkand, Urgench, Kiev, Vladimir pakati pa ena kunayambitsa kuphedwa kwa anthu ambiri, monga pamene zigawo za kum'mwera kwa Khuzestan zinawonongedwa kwathunthu. Mbadwa yake Hulagu Khan idawononga mbali yaikulu ya kumpoto kwa Iran ndikuwononga Baghdad ngakhale kuti magulu ake adaimitsidwa ndi a Mamluk a ku Egypt, koma mbadwa ya Hulagu Ghazan Khan adzabwerera kukamenya a Mamluk a ku Egypt kuchokera ku Levant, Palestine komanso ngakhale Gaza. Malinga ndi ntchito za wolemba mbiri wa ku Persia Rashid-al-Din Hamadani, a Mongolia anapha anthu oposa 70,000 ku Merv ndi oposa 190,000 ku Nishapur. Mu 1237 Batu Khan, mdzukulu wa Genghis Khan, adayambitsa kuwukira ku Kievan Rus '. Kwa zaka zitatu, anthu a ku Mongolia anawononga ndi kuwononga mizinda yonse ikuluikulu ya Kum'mawa kwa Yuropu kupatulapo Novgorod ndi Pskov.

context: A Pharmacy Technician ku UK amaonedwa kuti ndi katswiri wa zaumoyo ndipo nthawi zambiri sagwira ntchito moyang'aniridwa mwachindunji ndi wogulitsa mankhwala (ngati akugwira ntchito ku pharmacy yachipatala) koma m'malo mwake amayang'aniridwa ndikuyang'aniridwa ndi akatswiri ena akuluakulu a mankhwala. Ku UK, udindo wa PhT wakula ndipo udindo waperekedwa kwa iwo kuti ayang'anire dipatimenti ya mankhwala ndi madera apadera mu ntchito ya mankhwala, kulola ogulitsa mankhwala nthawi yokhazikika m'munda wawo wa akatswiri monga alangizi a mankhwala, amathera nthawi yambiri akugwira ntchito ndi odwala komanso pakufufuza. Katswiri wa zamankhwala akakhala woyenerera ayenera kulembetsa ngati katswiri pa kaundula wa General Pharmaceutical Council (GPhC). GPhC ndi bungwe lolamulira la akatswiri azaumoyo a pharmacy ndipo uyu ndi amene amayang'anira machitidwe a ogulitsa mankhwala ndi akatswiri a mankhwala.

text: kuyang'anira dipatimenti ya mankhwala ndi madera apadera pantchito ya mankhwala

context: Kupita patsogolo komwe kunachitika ku Middle East mu botany ndi chemistry kunapangitsa kuti mankhwala mu Chisilamu cha m'zaka zapakati apange kwambiri pharmacology. Mwachitsanzo, Muhammad ibn Zakarīya Rāzi (Rhazes) (865-915), anachitapo kanthu polimbikitsa kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala osokoneza bongo. Abu al-Qasim al-Zahrawi (Abulcasis) (936-1013) adayambitsa kukonzekera mankhwala ndi sublimation ndi distillation. Liber servitoris yake ndi yosangalatsa kwambiri, chifukwa imapatsa wowerenga maphikidwe ndikufotokozera momwe angakonzekerere 'zosavuta' zomwe zidaphatikizidwa ndi mankhwala ovuta omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito panthawiyo. Sabur Ibn Sahl (d 869), anali, komabe, dokotala woyamba kuyambitsa pharmacopoedia, akufotokoza mankhwala osiyanasiyana ndi mankhwala a matenda. Al-Biruni (973-1050) analemba imodzi mwa ntchito zamtengo wapatali kwambiri za Chisilamu pa pharmacology, yotchedwa Kitab al-Saydalah (Buku la Mankhwala Osokoneza bongo), momwe adafotokoza mwatsatanetsatane za makhalidwe a mankhwala ndikufotokozera ntchito ya mankhwala ndi ntchito ndi ntchito za wamankhwala. Avicenna, nayenso, adalongosola zokonzekera zosachepera 700, makhalidwe ake, njira zochitira, ndi zizindikiro zake. Kwenikweni anapereka voliyumu yonse ku mankhwala osavuta mu The Canon of Medicine. Zokhudzidwa kwambiri zinalinso ntchito za al-Maridini wa ku Baghdad ndi Cairo, ndi Ibn al-Wafid (1008-1074), zonsezi zinasindikizidwa m'Chilatini nthawi zoposa makumi asanu, zikuwonekera ngati De Medicinis universalibus et particularibus ndi 'Mesue' wamng'ono, ndi Medicamentis simplicibus ndi 'Abenguefit'. Peter waku Abano (1250-1316) adamasulira ndikuwonjezera chowonjezera pa ntchito ya al-Maridini pansi pa mutu wakuti De Veneris. Zopereka za Al-Muwafqa m'munda zikuyambitsanso upainiya. Kukhala m'zaka za zana la 10, adalemba Maziko a zinthu zenizeni za Remedies, pakati pa ena akufotokoza za arsenious oxide, komanso kudziwa silicic acid. Iye anafotokoza momveka bwino kusiyana pakati pa sodium carbonate ndi potaziyamu carbonate, ndipo anachititsa chidwi ndi poizoni wa mankhwala a mkuwa, makamaka mkuwa vitriol, komanso mankhwala a lead. Amafotokozanso za distillation ya madzi a m'nyanja kuti amwe. [kutsimikizika kofunikira]
question: Zochitika zomwe asayansi adakhudza kulengedwa kwa pharmacology mu Chisilamu chapakati?

Kukhala m'zaka za zana la 10, adalemba Maziko a zinthu zenizeni za Remedies, pakati pa ena akufotokoza za arsenious oxide, komanso kudziwa silicic acid. Iye anafotokoza momveka bwino kusiyana pakati pa sodium carbonate ndi potaziyamu carbonate, ndipo anachititsa chidwi ndi poizoni wa mankhwala a mkuwa, makamaka mkuwa vitriol, komanso mankhwala a lead. Amafotokozanso za distillation ya madzi a m'nyanja kuti amwe. [kutsimikizika kofunikira]

context: Ntchito ya pharmacy imayang'ana kwambiri pa kuwunikira mankhwala (ie "ntchito zachidziwitso") kuposa kupereka mankhwala enieni. Ogulitsa mankhwala alangizi nthawi zambiri amagwira ntchito m'nyumba zosamalira okalamba, koma akuwonjezereka nthambi m'mabungwe ena komanso malo osakhala mabungwe. Mwachikhalidwe alangizi ogulitsa mankhwala nthawi zambiri anali eni mabizinesi odziimira pawokha, ngakhale ku United States ambiri tsopano amagwira ntchito kumakampani angapo akuluakulu oyang'anira mankhwala (makamaka Omnicare, Kindred Healthcare ndi PharMerica). Mchitidwewu ukhoza kusintha pang'onopang'ono pamene ogulitsa mankhwala alangizi akuyamba kugwira ntchito mwachindunji ndi odwala, makamaka chifukwa chakuti okalamba ambiri tsopano akumwa mankhwala ambiri koma akupitirizabe kukhala kunja kwa mabungwe. Ma pharmacy ena am'deralo amagwiritsa ntchito alangizi ogulitsa mankhwala ndi / kapena kupereka ntchito zofunsira.

context: Kusokonezeka kwa chitetezo cha mthupi kungayambitse matenda a autoimmune, matenda otupa ndi khansa. Kuperewera kwa chitetezo cha mthupi kumachitika pamene chitetezo cha mthupi sichigwira ntchito kwambiri kuposa nthawi zonse, zomwe zimapangitsa kuti pakhale matenda obwerezabwereza komanso oopsa kwambiri. Mwa anthu, chitetezo cha mthupi chikhoza kukhala chifukwa cha matenda a majini monga kupweteka kwakukulu kwa chitetezo cha mthupi, matenda opezeka monga HIV / AIDS, kapena kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala oletsa chitetezo cha mthupi. Mosiyana ndi izi, autoimmune imachokera ku chitetezo cha mthupi chochulukirapo chomwe chimaukira minofu yabwinobwino ngati kuti ndi zamoyo zachilendo. Matenda ofala a autoimmune amaphatikizapo chithokomiro cha Hashimoto, nyamakazi, matenda a shuga a mellitus mtundu wa 1, ndi systemic lupus erythematosus. Immunology imaphatikizapo kuphunzira mbali zonse za chitetezo cha mthupi.

context: Mankhwala odana ndi zotupa nthawi zambiri amagwiritsidwa ntchito poletsa zotsatira za kutupa. Glucocorticoids ndi amphamvu kwambiri mwa mankhwalawa; Komabe, mankhwalawa akhoza kukhala ndi zotsatira zambiri zosayenera, monga kunenepa kwambiri, hyperglycemia, osteoporosis, ndipo kugwiritsa ntchito kwawo kuyenera kulamulidwa mwamphamvu. Mlingo wotsika wa mankhwala odana ndi zotupa nthawi zambiri umagwiritsidwa ntchito mogwirizana ndi mankhwala a cytotoxic kapena immunosuppressive monga methotrexate kapena azathioprine. Mankhwala a cytotoxic amalepheretsa chitetezo cha mthupi mwa kupha maselo ogawanika monga maselo a T omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito. Komabe, kupha kumakhala kosasankha ndipo maselo ena omwe amagawanika nthawi zonse ndi ziwalo zawo zimakhudzidwa, zomwe zimayambitsa zotsatira za poizoni. Mankhwala osokoneza bongo monga cyclosporin amalepheretsa maselo a T kuyankha zizindikiro molondola poletsa njira zopititsira chizindikiro.
question: Kodi gulu lamphamvu kwambiri la mankhwala odana ndi kutupa ndi liti?

question: Kodi chitsanzo cha mankhwala oteteza chitetezo cha mthupi chomwe chimalepheretsa ntchito ya maselo a T posintha njira zosinthira chizindikiro?

context: Mosiyana ndi zimenezo, mkati mwa nthaŵi zodzuka maselo osiyana ochititsa chidwi, monga ngati maselo opha achilengedwe a cytotoxic ndi CTLs (cytotoxic T lymphocytes), pachimake kuti apeze yankho logwira mtima motsutsana ndi tizilombo toyambitsa matenda alionse olowerera. Komanso panthawi yogwira ntchito yogalamuka, mamolekyulu odana ndi kutupa, monga cortisol ndi catecholamines, amafika pachimake. Pali malingaliro awiri okhudza chifukwa chake boma la pro-inflammatory limasungidwa nthawi yogona. Choyamba, kutupa kungayambitse kusokonezeka kwakukulu kwa chidziwitso ndi thupi ngati kungachitike panthawi yogalamuka. Chachiwiri, kutupa kungachitike panthawi yogona chifukwa cha kukhalapo kwa melatonin. Kutupa kumayambitsa kupsinjika kwakukulu kwa oxidative ndipo kukhalapo kwa melatonin panthawi yogona kungathe kuthana mwachangu ndi kupanga kwaulere panthawiyi.
question: Kodi ndi zitsanzo ziti za maselo osiyanitsa omwe amafika pachimake panthawi yogalamuka?

question: Melatonin panthawi yogona imatha kuthana ndi kupanga chiyani?

context: Kusinthika kwa chitetezo cha mthupi chosinthika kunachitika mwa kholo la nsagwada za vertebrates. Mamolekyulu ambiri akale a chitetezo cha mthupi chosinthika (mwachitsanzo, immunoglobulins ndi T cell receptors) amapezeka kokha mu nsagwada za vertebrates. Komabe, molekyulu yosiyana yochokera ku lymphocyte yapezeka mu nsagwada zakale zopanda nsagwada, monga lamprey ndi hagfish. Nyama zimenezi zili ndi mamolekyulu ambiri otchedwa Variable lymphocyte receptors (VLRs) omwe, mofanana ndi ma antigen receptors a nsagwada, amapangidwa kuchokera ku chiŵerengero chochepa chabe (chimodzi kapena ziwiri) cha majini. Mamolekyu awa amakhulupirira kuti amamanga ma antigen a tizilombo toyambitsa matenda mofanana ndi ma antibodies, komanso ndi mlingo wofanana wa mwachindunji.

question: Kusinthika kwa gawo liti la chitetezo cha mthupi kunachitika mu kholo la chisinthiko cha nsagwada?

context: Njira zomwe zimagwiritsidwa ntchito kuzemba chitetezo cha mthupi chosinthika ndizovuta kwambiri. Njira yosavuta ndikusintha mofulumira ma epitopes osakhala ofunikira (amino acid ndi / kapena shuga) pamwamba pa tizilombo toyambitsa matenda, pamene mukusunga ma epitopes ofunikira obisika. Izi zimatchedwa kusiyana kwa antigenic. Chitsanzo ndi HIV, yomwe imasintha mofulumira, choncho mapuloteni omwe ali pa envulopu yake ya kachilomboka omwe ali ofunika kwambiri kuti alowe m'selo lomwe amakhala nawo amasintha nthawi zonse. Kusintha pafupipafupi kumeneku kwa ma antigen kungafotokoze kulephera kwa katemera wolunjika pa kachilomboka. Tizilombo toyambitsa matenda a Trypanosoma brucei timagwiritsa ntchito njira yofananayo, nthawi zonse kumasintha mtundu wina wa mapuloteni apamwamba kupita ku wina, kulola kuti ikhale patsogolo pa kuyankha kwa antibody. Kuphimba ma antigen ndi mamolekyulu omwe amakhala nawo ndi njira ina yofala yopeŵera kudziwika ndi chitetezo cha mthupi. Mu HIV, envulopu yomwe imaphimba virion imapangidwa kuchokera ku membrane yakunja ya selo lolandira; Mavairasi oterewa "odziphimba" amachititsa kuti chitetezo cha mthupi chikhale chovuta kuti chizindikire ngati zomangamanga "zosadziyimira pawokha".
question: Kodi ndi njira yotani yomwe chitetezo cha mthupi chosinthika chimapeŵedwa ndi unyolo wa ma epitopes osakhala ofunikira omwe amatchedwa?

Tizilombo toyambitsa matenda a Trypanosoma brucei timagwiritsa ntchito njira yofananayo, nthawi zonse kumasintha mtundu wina wa mapuloteni apamwamba kupita ku wina, kulola kuti ikhale patsogolo pa kuyankha kwa antibody. Kuphimba ma antigen ndi mamolekyulu omwe amakhala nawo ndi njira ina yofala yopeŵera kudziwika ndi chitetezo cha mthupi. Mu HIV, envulopu yomwe imaphimba virion imapangidwa kuchokera ku membrane yakunja ya selo lolandira; Mavairasi oterewa "odziphimba" amachititsa kuti chitetezo cha mthupi chikhale chovuta kuti chizindikire ngati zomangamanga "zosadziyimira pawokha".
question: Kodi ndi chitsanzo chotani cha tizilombo toyambitsa matenda tidagwiritsa ntchito njira yopangira antigenic kuti tithawe chiwonongeko?

question: Kodi ndi Mmwenye uti wotchuka amene anachita kusamvera kwa boma?

context: Kusamvera kwa boma kosasintha ndi kusamvera malamulo kosavuta chifukwa chakuti amaweruzidwa kuti ndi "olakwika" ndi chikumbumtima cha munthu, kapena monga gawo la kuyesetsa kuti malamulo ena asagwire ntchito, kuchititsa kuti achotsedwe, kapena kukakamiza kuti apeze zofuna za munthu pankhani ina. Kusamvera kwa anthu osintha ndikuyesera mwachangu kugwetsa boma (kapena kusintha miyambo yachikhalidwe, miyambo yachikhalidwe, zikhulupiriro zachipembedzo, ndi zina zotero ... Kusintha sikuyenera kukhala ndale, mwachitsanzo "kusintha kwa chikhalidwe", kumangotanthauza kusintha kwakukulu komanso kofala kwa gawo la chikhalidwe cha anthu). Zochita za Gandhi zafotokozedwa ngati kusamvera kwa anthu osintha. Zanenedwa kuti anthu a ku Hungary motsogozedwa ndi Ferenc Deák adatsogolera kusamvera kwa boma la Austria. Thoreau analembanso za kusamvera kwa anthu kukwaniritsa "kusintha kwamtendere." Howard Zinn, Harvey Wheeler, ndi ena azindikira ufulu wovomerezedwa mu The Declaration of Independence kuti "asinthe kapena kuthetsa" boma lopanda chilungamo kuti likhale mfundo ya kusamvera kwa boma.

Ndipo anthu ena osamvera boma, pokhala anarchists, sakhulupirira kuyenera kwa boma lililonse, ndipo chifukwa chake sakuwona chifukwa chovomereza chilango chifukwa chophwanya malamulo a milandu omwe samaphwanya ufulu wa ena.

question: Ndi chifukwa chiyani?

context: Nthawi zina akuluakulu a boma amapereka chilolezo kwa osamvera boma, monga momwe zinalili ndi Camden 28, pomwe omwe akuimbidwa mlanduwo adapatsidwa mwayi wovomereza mlandu umodzi ndipo sanalandire nthawi ya ndende. M'mikhalidwe ina yomangidwa ndi anthu ambirimbiri, omenyera ufuluwo amasankha kugwiritsa ntchito njira zogwirizana kuti ateteze mgwirizano womwewo kwa aliyense. Koma anthu ena omenyera ufulu asankha kulowa m'chikalata chakhungu, akuvomereza mlandu popanda mgwirizano uliwonse wopempha. Mohandas Gandhi adavomereza mlandu ndipo adauza bwalo lamilandu kuti, "Ndili pano kuti . . . kugonjera mosangalala chilango chachikulu kwambiri chomwe chingaperekedwe kwa ine chifukwa cha zomwe mwalamulo ndi mlandu wadala komanso zomwe zikuwoneka kwa ine kukhala ntchito yapamwamba kwambiri ya nzika. "

context: Engineering News-Record (ENR) ndi magazini yamalonda ya makampani omanga. Chaka chilichonse, ENR imasonkhanitsa ndikupereka lipoti la deta yokhudza kukula kwa makampani opanga ndi zomangamanga. Amafalitsa mndandanda wamakampani akuluakulu ku United States (Top-40) komanso mndandanda wamakampani akulu kwambiri padziko lonse lapansi (Top-250, ndi kuchuluka kwa ntchito yomwe akugwira kunja kwa dziko lawo). Mu 2014, ENR inasonkhanitsa deta m'magawo asanu ndi anayi a msika. Zinagawidwa ngati mayendedwe, mafuta, nyumba, mphamvu, mafakitale, madzi, kupanga, zimbudzi / zinyalala, telecom, zinyalala zoopsa kuphatikiza gulu lakhumi la ntchito zina. Mu malipoti awo pa Top 400, iwo anagwiritsa ntchito deta pa mayendedwe, zimbudzi, zinyalala zoopsa ndi madzi kuti aike makampani ngati makontrakitala olemera.

context: Chizoloŵezi chamakono cha kapangidwe ndikugwirizana kwa ukatswiri wosiyana kale, makamaka pakati pa makampani akuluakulu. M'mbuyomu, akatswiri a zomangamanga, okonza zamkati, mainjiniya, opanga, oyang'anira zomangamanga, ndi makontrakitala ambiri anali osiyana kwathunthu, ngakhale m'makampani akuluakulu. Pakalipano, kampani yomwe imadziwika kuti ndi "zomangamanga" kapena "kayendetsedwe ka zomangamanga" ikhoza kukhala ndi akatswiri ochokera m'madera onse okhudzana ngati ogwira ntchito, kapena kukhala ndi kampani yogwirizana yomwe imapereka luso lililonse lofunikira. Choncho, kampani iliyonse yotereyi ikhoza kudzipereka ngati "kugula kamodzi" kwa ntchito yomanga, kuyambira pachiyambi mpaka kumapeto. Izi zimasankhidwa ngati mgwirizano wa "kapangidwe kapangidwe" pomwe wogwira ntchitoyo amapatsidwa ndondomeko yogwira ntchito ndipo ayenera kuchita ntchitoyi kuyambira kapangidwe mpaka kumanga, kwinaku akutsatira magwiridwe antchito.

question: Kodi ndi mgwirizano wamtundu wanji womwe umaperekedwa pamene kontrakitala wapatsidwa ndondomeko ya ntchito ndipo ayenera kuchita ntchitoyo kuyambira kapangidwe mpaka kumanga, kwinaku akutsatira magwiridwe antchito?

context: Ntchitoyi iyenera kutsatira zofunikira za zoning ndi malamulo omanga. Kumanga polojekiti yomwe imalephera kutsatira malamulo sikupindulitsa mwiniwake. Zofunikira zina zamalamulo zimachokera ku malum mu se malingaliro, kapena chikhumbo chofuna kuteteza zinthu zomwe zili zoyipa mosakayikira - kugwa kwa mlatho kapena kuphulika. Zofunikira zina zamalamulo zimachokera ku malum prohibitum kulingalira, kapena zinthu zomwe zili nkhani ya mwambo kapena chiyembekezo, monga kudzipatula kwa mabizinesi ku chigawo cha bizinesi ndi malo okhala ku chigawo chokhalamo. Loya angafunefune kusintha kapena kuchotsedwa m'lamulo lomwe limayang'anira malo omwe nyumbayo idzamangidwe, mwina potsutsa kuti lamulo siligwira ntchito (kapangidwe ka mlatho sikungayambitse kugwa), kapena kuti mwambowu sukufunikanso (kuvomereza malo ogwirira ntchito kwakula m'deralo).

Zofunikira zina zamalamulo zimachokera ku malum mu se malingaliro, kapena chikhumbo chofuna kuteteza zinthu zomwe zili zoyipa mosakayikira - kugwa kwa mlatho kapena kuphulika. Zofunikira zina zamalamulo zimachokera ku malum prohibitum kulingalira, kapena zinthu zomwe zili nkhani ya mwambo kapena chiyembekezo, monga kudzipatula kwa mabizinesi ku chigawo cha bizinesi ndi malo okhala ku chigawo chokhalamo. Loya angafunefune kusintha kapena kuchotsedwa m'lamulo lomwe limayang'anira malo omwe nyumbayo idzamangidwe, mwina potsutsa kuti lamulo siligwira ntchito (kapangidwe ka mlatho sikungayambitse kugwa), kapena kuti mwambowu sukufunikanso (kuvomereza malo ogwirira ntchito kwakula m'deralo).
question: Ndani angafune kusintha kapena kuchotsedwa m'lamulo lomwe limayang'anira malo omwe nyumbayo idzamangidwe?

context: Ergänzungsschulen ndi sukulu za sekondale kapena zapambuyo pa sekondale (zosakhala zapamwamba), zomwe zimayendetsedwa ndi anthu apadera, mabungwe apadera kapena kawirikawiri, magulu achipembedzo ndipo amapereka mtundu wa maphunziro omwe sapezeka m'masukulu aboma. Ambiri mwa masukulu amenewa ndi sukulu zaukadaulo. Komabe, masukulu aukadaulo awa sali mbali ya maphunziro awiri aku Germany. Ergänzungsschulen ali ndi ufulu wogwira ntchito kunja kwa malamulo a boma ndipo amaperekedwa ndalama zonse mwa kulipiritsa ophunzira awo ndalama zolipirira maphunziro.
question: Kodi sukulu za sekondale zaumwini ku Germany zimatchedwa chiyani?

context: Ku India, sukulu za payekha zimatchedwa sukulu zodziyimira pawokha, koma popeza kuti sukulu zina za payekha zimalandira thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku boma, zikhoza kukhala sukulu yothandizidwa kapena yopanda thandizo. Choncho, m'lingaliro lokhwima, sukulu ya payekha ndi sukulu yodziyimira payokha yopanda thandizo. Cholinga cha tanthauzo ili, kulandira thandizo la ndalama kokha kumalingaliridwa, osati malo ogulidwa kuchokera ku boma pamlingo wothandizira. Zili mu mphamvu ya boma la mgwirizano ndi maboma a boma kuyendetsa masukulu popeza Maphunziro amawonekera m'nda wa maphunziro a malamulo m'malamulo. Mchitidwewu wakhala woti boma la mgwirizano lipereke malangizo akuluakulu a ndondomeko pamene mayiko amapanga malamulo awo ndi malamulo a kayendetsedwe ka gawoli. Mwa zina, izi zapangitsanso kuti pakhale mabungwe osiyanasiyana a mayeso a 30 kapena akuluakulu a maphunziro omwe amachititsa mayeso a zikalata zomaliza sukulu. Mabungwe Otchuka a Mayeso omwe alipo m'maboma ambiri ndi CBSE ndi CISCE, NENBSE

context: Ena mwa masukulu akale kwambiri ku South Africa ndi masukulu a tchalitchi apadera omwe adakhazikitsidwa ndi amishonale kumayambiriro kwa zaka za zana la khumi ndi zisanu ndi zinayi. Gawo la payekha lakula kuyambira pamenepo. Pambuyo pa kuthetsedwa kwa tsankho, malamulo oyang'anira maphunziro apadera ku South Africa adasintha kwambiri. Lamulo la South African Schools Act la 1996 limazindikira magulu awiri a sukulu: "boma" (lolamulidwa ndi boma) ndi "lodziyimira pawokha" (lomwe limaphatikizapo sukulu zachikhalidwe zachinsinsi ndi sukulu zomwe zimayendetsedwa payekha[kumveketsa kofunikira].)
question: Kodi ndi lamulo liti la ku South Africa lomwe linavomereza mitundu iwiri ya sukulu?

context: M'zaka zomaliza za nthawi ya tsankho, makolo m'masukulu a boma oyera anapatsidwa mwayi wotembenuka kukhala mawonekedwe a "theka-payekha" otchedwa Model C, ndipo ambiri mwa masukulu amenewa anasintha ndondomeko zawo zovomerezeka kuti alandire ana a mafuko ena. Pambuyo pa kusintha kwa demokalase, mawonekedwe alamulo a "Model C" adathetsedwa, komabe, mawuwa akupitilizabe kugwiritsidwa ntchito pofotokoza masukulu aboma omwe kale anali osungidwa kwa ana oyera .. Sukuluzi zimakonda kutulutsa zotsatira zabwino zamaphunziro kuposa sukulu zaboma zomwe kale zinali zosungidwa kwa magulu ena amtundu . Sukulu zakale za "Model C" si sukulu zachinsinsi, chifukwa zimayang'aniridwa ndi boma. Sukulu zonse ku South Africa (kuphatikizapo sukulu zonse zodziyimira pawokha ndi sukulu zaboma) zili ndi ufulu wokhazikitsa ndalama zokakamiza sukulu, ndipo sukulu zomwe kale zinali zamtundu wa C zimakonda kukhazikitsa ndalama zapamwamba kwambiri kuposa sukulu zina zaboma.
question: Pambuyo pa tsankho, ndi mitundu iti ya sukulu zomwe zimatchedwa sukulu za "Model C"?

context: M'madera ambiri a United States, pambuyo pa chigamulo cha 1954 pa mlandu wapadera wa khoti wa Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka yomwe idafuna kuti masukulu aku United States asiye "mwachangu mwadala", mabanja am'deralo adakonza mafunde a "masukulu achikhristu" apadera. M'madera ambiri a Kumwera kwa United States, ophunzira ambiri oyera anasamukira ku masukulu, pamene sukulu zaboma zinakhala zowonjezereka kwambiri ndi ophunzira a ku Africa ndi America (onani Mndandanda wa masukulu apadera ku Mississippi). Maphunziro a masukulu nthawi zambiri anali College Preparatory. Kuyambira m'ma 1970, ambiri mwa "masukulu osiyanitsa" awa atsekedwa, ngakhale ena akupitirizabe kugwira ntchito. [kutchulidwa kofunikira]

context: Yunivesiteyi imakonzedwa m'magulu khumi ndi amodzi osiyana a maphunziro-khumi ndi Radcliffe Institute for Advanced Study-ndi mabungwe m'dera lonse la Boston: malo ake akuluakulu a 209 (85 ha) ali pa Harvard Yard ku Cambridge, pafupifupi makilomita 3 (5 km) kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa Boston; sukulu yamabizinesi ndi malo othamanga, kuphatikiza Harvard Stadium, ali kutsidya lina la mtsinje wa Charles mdera la Allston ku Boston ndipo sukulu zamankhwala, mano, ndi zaumoyo wa anthu zili ku Longwood Medical Area. context: Panthawi ya divestment kuchokera ku South Africa kumapeto kwa zaka za m'ma 1980, ophunzira omenyera ufulu adakhazikitsa "shantytown" yophiphiritsira ku Harvard Yard ndipo adatseka nkhani yoperekedwa ndi South African Vice Consul Duke Kent-Brown. Kampani ya Harvard Management Company inakana mobwerezabwereza kusiya, ponena kuti "ndalama zogwirira ntchito siziyenera kukhala pansi pa malamulo osagwirizana ndi zachuma kapena carping ndi anthu osadziwika bwino kapena ndi magulu apadera okondweretsa." Komabe, yunivesiteyo potsirizira pake inachepetsa chuma chake cha ku South Africa ndi $230 miliyoni (kuchokera pa $400 miliyoni) chifukwa cha chitsenderezocho.

context: Jacksonville ili m'chigawo cha First Coast kumpoto chakum'mawa kwa Florida ndipo ili m'mphepete mwa mtsinje wa St. Johns, pafupifupi makilomita 40 kum'mwera kwa mzere wa boma la Georgia ndi pafupifupi makilomita 550 kumpoto kwa Miami. Madera a Jacksonville Beaches ali m'mphepete mwa nyanja ya Atlantic yoyandikana nayo. Poyamba derali linali kukhala ndi anthu a Timucua, ndipo mu 1564 panali malo a Fort Caroline, amodzi mwa midzi yoyambirira ya ku Ulaya m'dziko lomwe tsopano limatchedwa kontinenti ya United States. Pansi pa ulamuliro wa Britain, kukhazikika kunakula pamalo opapatiza mumtsinje kumene ng'ombe zinawoloka, zomwe zimadziwika kuti Wacca Pilatka kupita ku Seminole ndi Cow Ford kwa British. Tawuni yokhala ndi mataundi idakhazikitsidwa kumeneko mu 1822, patatha chaka chimodzi United States italandira Florida kuchokera ku Spain; idatchedwa dzina la Andrew Jackson, bwanamkubwa woyamba wankhondo wa Florida Territory ndi Purezidenti wachisanu ndi chiwiri wa United States.

Poyamba derali linali kukhala ndi anthu a Timucua, ndipo mu 1564 panali malo a Fort Caroline, amodzi mwa midzi yoyambirira ya ku Ulaya m'dziko lomwe tsopano limatchedwa kontinenti ya United States. Pansi pa ulamuliro wa Britain, kukhazikika kunakula pamalo opapatiza mumtsinje kumene ng'ombe zinawoloka, zomwe zimadziwika kuti Wacca Pilatka kupita ku Seminole ndi Cow Ford kwa British. Tawuni yokhala ndi mataundi idakhazikitsidwa kumeneko mu 1822, patatha chaka chimodzi United States italandira Florida kuchokera ku Spain; idatchedwa dzina la Andrew Jackson, bwanamkubwa woyamba wankhondo wa Florida Territory ndi Purezidenti wachisanu ndi chiwiri wa United States.
question: Afalansa asanafike, dera lomwe tsopano limatchedwa Jacksonville poyamba linali ndi anthu ati?

context: Jacksonville ili m'chigawo cha First Coast kumpoto chakum'mawa kwa Florida ndipo ili m'mphepete mwa mtsinje wa St. Johns, pafupifupi makilomita 40 kum'mwera kwa mzere wa boma la Georgia ndi pafupifupi makilomita 550 kumpoto kwa Miami. question: Kodi ndi mbiri yakale iti yomwe Jacksonville idatchulidwa?

context: Wofufuza wa ku France wa Huguenot Jean Ribault adalemba mtsinje wa St. Johns mu 1562, akuutcha Mtsinje wa May chifukwa adaupeza mu Meyi. Ribault adakhazikitsa chipilala chamiyala pafupi ndi Jacksonville yamakono, akumanena kuti dziko latsopano lomwe linapezeka ku France. Mu 1564, René Goulaine de Laudonnière adakhazikitsa malo oyamba aku Europe, Fort Caroline, ku St. Johns pafupi ndi mudzi waukulu wa Saturiwa. Philip II waku Spain adalamula Pedro Menéndez de Avilés kuti ateteze chidwi cha Spain poukira anthu aku France ku Fort Caroline. Pa Seputembara 20, 1565, gulu lankhondo la Spain lochokera kudera lapafupi la Spain la St. Augustine linaukira Fort Caroline, ndipo linapha pafupifupi asilikali onse a ku France omwe ankateteza. Anthu a ku Spain adasintha dzina la mpanda wa San Mateo, ndipo pambuyo pa kutulutsidwa kwa Afalansa, malo a St. Augustine monga malo ofunika kwambiri ku Florida adalimbikitsidwa. Malo a Fort Caroline akutsutsana koma kukonzanso linga kunakhazikitsidwa pamtsinje wa St. Johns mu 1964.

context: Jacksonville, mofanana ndi mizinda yambiri ikuluikulu ku United States, inavutika ndi zotulukapo zoipa za kufutukuka kofulumira kwa mizinda pambuyo pa nkhondo yachiwiri ya padziko lonse. Kumangidwa kwa misewu yayikulu kunapangitsa kuti anthu asamukire ku nyumba zatsopano m'madera akumidzi. Pambuyo pa nkhondo yachiwiri yapadziko lonse, boma la mzinda wa Jacksonville linayamba kuwonjezera ndalama zolipirira ntchito zatsopano zomangamanga za boma mu chitukuko chomwe chinachitika pambuyo pa nkhondo. Nkhani ya Meya W. Haydon Burns 'Jacksonville inachititsa kuti pakhale nyumba yatsopano ya mzinda, holo ya anthu, laibulale ya anthu onse ndi ntchito zina zomwe zinapangitsa kuti anthu azinyadira kwambiri. Komabe, chitukuko cha midzi ndi mafunde otsatira a "ndege yoyera" yapakati adasiya Jacksonville ndi anthu osauka kwambiri kuposa kale. Fuko lokhala ndi anthu ambiri mumzindawu, lomwe si loyera la Chisipanishi, linatsika kuchoka pa 75.8% mu 1970 kufika pa 55.1% pofika 2010.
question: Kodi n'chiyani chinapangitsa kuti anthu azikhala m'nyumba zabata za m'tawuni?

context: Jacksonville yawonongeka pang'ono ndi mphepo yamkuntho kusiyana ndi mizinda ina yambiri ya kum'mawa kwa gombe, ngakhale kuti chiwopsezo chilipo cha kugunda mwachindunji ndi mphepo yamkuntho yaikulu. Mzindawu wangolandira kugunda kamodzi mwachindunji kuchokera ku mphepo yamkuntho kuyambira 1871; komabe, Jacksonville yakumana ndi mphepo yamkuntho kapena pafupifupi mphepo yamkuntho nthawi zoposa khumi ndi ziwiri chifukwa cha mphepo yamkuntho yomwe imadutsa boma kuchokera ku Gulf of Mexico kupita ku Atlantic Ocean, kapena kudutsa kumpoto kapena kumwera ku Atlantic ndikudutsa m'deralo. Zotsatira zamphamvu kwambiri ku Jacksonville zinali kuchokera ku mphepo yamkuntho Dora mu 1964, mphepo yamkuntho yokhayo yomwe inalembedwa yomwe inagunda Gombe Loyamba ndi mphepo yamkuntho yokhazikika. Diso linawoloka St. Augustine ndi mphepo yomwe inali itangochepa pang'ono kufika pa 110 mph (180 km / h), ndikupangitsa kuti ikhale yamphamvu Category 2 pa Saffir-Simpson Scale. Jacksonville inawonongekanso kuchokera ku 2008's Tropical Storm Fay yomwe inadutsa m'boma, kubweretsa madera a Jacksonville pansi pa mdima kwa masiku anayi. Mofananamo, zaka zinayi izi zisanachitike, Jacksonville adasefukira ndi mphepo yamkuntho Frances ndi mphepo yamkuntho Jeanne, yomwe idagwera kum'mwera kwa derali. Mphepo zamkuntho izi zinali zodula kwambiri ku Jacksonville. Mphepo yamkuntho ya Floyd mu 1999 idawononga makamaka Jacksonville Beach. Pa nthawi ya Floyd, doko la Jacksonville Beach linawonongeka kwambiri, ndipo pambuyo pake linagwetsedwa. Doko lomwe linamangidwanso pambuyo pake linawonongedwa ndi Fay, koma silinawonongeke. Mphepo yamkuntho yotchedwa Tropical Storm Bonnie idzawononga pang'ono mu 2004, ndipo inayambitsa mphepo yamkuntho yaing'ono. Pa Meyi 28, 2012, Jacksonville inagwidwa ndi mphepo yamkuntho yotchedwa Tropical Storm Beryl, yomwe inali ndi mphepo yothamanga kwambiri pa ola limodzi (113 km / h) yomwe inagwera pafupi ndi Jacksonville Beach.
question: Kodi ndi mphepo yamkuntho iti yomwe idakhudza kwambiri Jacksonville?

Mphepo yamkuntho yotchedwa Tropical Storm Bonnie idzawononga pang'ono mu 2004, ndipo inayambitsa mphepo yamkuntho yaing'ono. Pa Meyi 28, 2012, Jacksonville inagwidwa ndi mphepo yamkuntho yotchedwa Tropical Storm Beryl, yomwe inali ndi mphepo yothamanga kwambiri pa ola limodzi (113 km / h) yomwe inagwera pafupi ndi Jacksonville Beach.
question: Kodi sikelo yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito kuyeza mphamvu ya mphepo yamkuntho imatchedwa chiyani?

context: Jacksonville yawonongeka pang'ono ndi mphepo yamkuntho kusiyana ndi mizinda ina yambiri ya kum'mawa kwa gombe, ngakhale kuti chiwopsezo chilipo cha kugunda mwachindunji ndi mphepo yamkuntho yaikulu. Mzindawu wangolandira kugunda kamodzi mwachindunji kuchokera ku mphepo yamkuntho kuyambira 1871; komabe, Jacksonville yakumana ndi mphepo yamkuntho kapena pafupifupi mphepo yamkuntho nthawi zoposa khumi ndi ziwiri chifukwa cha mphepo yamkuntho yomwe imadutsa boma kuchokera ku Gulf of Mexico kupita ku Atlantic Ocean, kapena kudutsa kumpoto kapena kumwera ku Atlantic ndikudutsa m'deralo. Zotsatira zamphamvu kwambiri ku Jacksonville zinali kuchokera ku mphepo yamkuntho Dora mu 1964, mphepo yamkuntho yokhayo yomwe inalembedwa yomwe inagunda Gombe Loyamba ndi mphepo yamkuntho yokhazikika. Diso linawoloka St. Augustine ndi mphepo yomwe inali itangochepa pang'ono kufika pa 110 mph (180 km / h), ndikupangitsa kuti ikhale yamphamvu Category 2 pa Saffir-Simpson Scale. Jacksonville inawonongekanso kuchokera ku 2008's Tropical Storm Fay yomwe inadutsa m'boma, kubweretsa madera a Jacksonville pansi pa mdima kwa masiku anayi. question: Kodi chinsinsi cha kukula kwachuma chakhala chiyani?

context: Mu 1993, Galor ndi Zeira adawonetsa kuti kusiyana pamaso pa kupanda ungwiro kwa msika wa ngongole kumakhala ndi zotsatira zowononga kwa nthawi yaitali pa mapangidwe a anthu ndi chitukuko cha chuma. Kafukufuku wa 1996 wa Perotti adafufuza njira zomwe kusiyana kungakhudze kukula kwachuma. Iye anasonyeza kuti, mogwirizana ndi njira ya kupanda ungwiro kwa msika wa ngongole, kusiyana kumagwirizanitsidwa ndi mlingo wotsika wa mapangidwe a anthu (maphunziro, chidziwitso, ndi kuphunzira) ndi mlingo wapamwamba wa kubereka, ndipo motero kuchepa kwa kukula. Anapeza kuti kusiyana kumagwirizanitsidwa ndi milingo yapamwamba ya misonkho yogawidwanso, yomwe imagwirizanitsidwa ndi kuchepa kwa kukula kuchokera ku kuchepetsa ndalama zachinsinsi ndi ndalama. Perotti anamaliza kuti, "anthu ofanana kwambiri ali ndi chiwerengero chochepa cha kubereka komanso ndalama zambiri m'maphunziro. Zonsezi zikuwonetsedwa pakukula kwakukulu. Komanso, anthu osalingana kwambiri amakonda kukhala osakhazikika pa ndale komanso m'chikhalidwe, zomwe zikuwonetsedwa ndi kuchepa kwa ndalama ndipo motero kukula. "

context: Kafukufuku wokhudza kusiyana kwa ndalama ndi kukula nthawi zina wapeza umboni wotsimikizira lingaliro la Kuznets curve, lomwe limanena kuti ndi chitukuko cha chuma, kusiyana kumayamba kuwonjezeka, kenako kumachepa. Katswiri wa zachuma Thomas Piketty amatsutsa lingaliro limeneli, ponena kuti kuyambira mu 1914 mpaka mu 1945 nkhondo ndi "ziwawa zachuma ndi ndale" zinachepetsa kusiyana. Komanso, Piketty akutsutsa kuti "zamatsenga" Kuznets curve hypothesis, ndikugogomezera kwake kulinganiza kukula kwachuma m'kupita kwa nthawi, sizingatheke kufotokoza kuwonjezeka kwakukulu kwa kusiyana kwachuma m'mayiko otukuka kuyambira m'ma 1970.

context: Malingaliro ena omwe adapangidwa m'zaka za m'ma 1970 adakhazikitsa njira zomwe zingatheke zomwe kusiyana kungakhale ndi zotsatira zabwino pa chitukuko cha chuma. Malinga ndi kuwunikira kwa 1955, ndalama zosungidwa ndi olemera, ngati izi zikuwonjezeka ndi kusiyana, zinalingaliridwa kuti zithetse kuchepa kwa ogula. Lipoti la 2013 lonena za Nigeria likusonyeza kuti kukula kwakwera chifukwa cha kuwonjezeka kwa kusiyana kwa ndalama. Nthanthi zina zotchuka kuyambira m'ma 1950 mpaka 2011 zinanena molakwika kuti kusiyana kunali ndi zotsatira zabwino pa chitukuko cha chuma. Kusanthula kochokera poyerekeza ziwerengero zofanana pachaka ndi kukula kwa pachaka kunali kusocheretsa chifukwa zimatenga zaka zingapo kuti zotsatira ziwonetsedwe ngati kusintha kwa kukula kwachuma. Akatswiri azachuma a IMF anapeza kugwirizana kwamphamvu pakati pa kuchepa kwa kusiyana m'mayiko osatukuka ndi nyengo zokhazikika za kukula kwachuma. Maiko omwe akutukuka kumene omwe ali ndi kusiyana kwakukulu "akwanitsa kuyambitsa kukula pamlingo waukulu kwa zaka zingapo" koma "nthawi yayitali ya kukula imagwirizanitsidwa mwamphamvu ndi kufanana kwambiri pakugawa ndalama."

question: Kodi nthawi yayitali yakukula imagwirizanitsidwa ndi chiyani?

context: Ngakhale akuvomereza ntchito yaikulu yomwe kukula kwachuma kungathe kugwira ntchito pa chitukuko cha anthu, kuchepetsa umphawi komanso kukwaniritsidwa kwa Zolinga za Chitukuko cha Millennium, zikuyamba kumveka bwino pakati pa anthu a chitukuko kuti zoyesayesa zapadera ziyenera kupangidwa kuonetsetsa kuti zigawo zosauka za anthu zimatha kutenga nawo mbali pakukula kwachuma. Zotsatira za kukula kwachuma pa kuchepetsa umphawi - kukula kwa umphawi - kungadalire mlingo womwe ulipo wa kusiyana. Mwachitsanzo, ndi kusiyana kochepa dziko lomwe lili ndi kukula kwa 2% pa munthu aliyense ndi 40% ya anthu ake omwe akukhala mu umphawi, likhoza kuchepetsa umphawi theka m'zaka khumi, koma dziko lomwe lili ndi kusiyana kwakukulu lingatenge pafupifupi zaka 60 kuti likwaniritse kuchepetsa komweko. M'mawu a Mlembi Wamkulu wa bungwe la United Nations Ban Ki-Moon kuti: "Ngakhale kuti chitukuko cha chuma n'chofunika, sikokwanira kuti tipite patsogolo pa kuchepetsa umphawi."

context: Dokotala samayenda yekha ndipo nthawi zambiri amabweretsa mnzake m'modzi kapena angapo kuti agawane zochitikazi. Kaŵirikaŵiri anzake amakhala anthu, popeza kuti wapeza chidwi ndi pulaneti la Dziko Lapansi. Nthawi zambiri amapeza zochitika zomwe zimamupangitsa chidwi pamene akuyesera kuletsa mphamvu zoyipa kuti zisavulaze anthu osalakwa kapena kusintha mbiri, pogwiritsa ntchito luso lake lokha komanso chuma chochepa, monga ngati screwdriver yake yosiyanasiyana. Monga Ambuye wa Nthawi, Dokotala ali ndi mphamvu yobwezeretsanso thupi lake likawonongeka kwambiri, kutenga mawonekedwe atsopano ndi umunthu. Dokotalayo wapeza adani ambiri obwerezabwereza paulendo wake, kuphatikiza Daleks, Cybermen, ndi Master, Time Lord wina wopanduka.

question: Kodi Ambuye ndi mtundu wanji wa Doctor Who?

context: Mndandanda woyamba wa pulogalamuyi, An Unearthly Child, ukuwonetsa kuti Dokotalayo ali ndi mdzukulu wamkazi, Susan Foreman. Mu mndandanda wa 1967, Manda a Cybermen, pamene Victoria Waterfield amakayikira kuti Dokotala angakumbukire banja lake chifukwa, "kukhala wakale kwambiri", Dokotala akunena kuti angathe pamene akufunadi-"Nthawi yonse amagona m'maganizo mwanga". Mndandanda wa 2005 ukuwonetsa kuti Dokotala Wachisanu ndi chinayi adaganiza kuti ndiye Mbuye wa Nthawi womaliza wopulumuka, ndikuti dziko lakwawo lidawonongedwa; mu "Mwana Wopanda Kanthu" (2005), Dr. Constantine akunena kuti, "Nkhondo isanayambe, ndinali bambo ndi agogo. Tsopano sindine. " Dokotalayo akuyankha kuti, "Inde, ndikudziwa kumverera." Mu "Smith ndi Jones" (2007), atafunsidwa ngati ali ndi mchimwene, adayankha kuti, "Ayi, osatinso." Mu "Fear Her" (2006) ndi "Mwana wamkazi wa Dokotala" (2008), akunena kuti m'mbuyomu, anali bambo.

context: Chiyambireni chitsitsimutso cha 2005, Dokotala nthawi zambiri amayenda ndi mnzake wamkazi woyamba, yemwe amakhala ndi gawo lalikulu lofotokozera. Steven Moffat adalongosola mnzakeyo ngati munthu wamkulu wawonetsero, pamene nkhaniyi imayambiranso ndi mnzake aliyense ndipo amasintha kwambiri kuposa Dokotala. Mabwenzi oyambirira a Madokotala a chisanu ndi chinayi ndi khumi anali Rose Tyler (Billie Piper), Martha Jones (Freema Agyeman), ndi Donna Noble (Catherine Tate) ndi Mickey Smith (Noel Clarke) ndi Jack Harkness (John Barrowman) omwe amabwerezabwereza ngati anzawo achiwiri. Dokotala wa khumi ndi chimodzi adakhala woyamba kuyenda ndi okwatirana, Amy Pond (Karen Gillan) ndi Rory Williams (Arthur Darvill), pomwe misonkhano yosagwirizana ndi Mtsinje wa Song (Alex Kingston) ndi Clara Oswald (Jenna Coleman) idapereka nkhani zopitilira. Mndandanda wakhumi udzayambitsa Pearl Mackie ngati Bill, mnzake watsopano woyenda naye wa Dokotala.

context: Wothandizira nyimbo pafupipafupi pazaka 15 zoyambirira anali Dudley Simpson, yemwenso amadziwika bwino chifukwa cha mutu wake komanso nyimbo zamwadzidzidzi za Blake's 7, komanso nyimbo zake zovutitsa mutu ndi zolemba zoyambirira za 1970s za The Tomorrow People. Chiwerengero choyamba cha Doctor Who cha Simpson chinali Planet of Giants (1964) ndipo anapitiriza kulemba nyimbo za zochitika zambiri za m'ma 1960 ndi 1970, kuphatikizapo nkhani zambiri za nthawi za Jon Pertwee / Tom Baker, kutha ndi The Horns of Nimon (1979). context: Doctor Who wawonekera pa siteji nthawi zambiri. Kumayambiriro kwa zaka za m'ma 1970, Trevor Martin adasewera gawo mu Doctor Who ndi Daleks mu Makiyi Asanu ndi Awiri a Doomsday. Kumapeto kwa zaka za m'ma 1980, Jon Pertwee ndi Colin Baker onse adasewera Dokotala nthawi zosiyanasiyana panthawi yothamanga sewero lotchedwa Doctor Who - The Ultimate Adventure. Kwa masewera awiri, pomwe Pertwee anali kudwala, David Banks (wodziwika bwino chifukwa chosewera Cybermen) adasewera Dokotala. Masewera ena oyambirira akhala akuchitika ngati zopangidwa ndi amateur, ndi osewera ena akusewera Dokotala, pomwe Terry Nation adalemba The Curse of the Daleks, sewero la siteji lomwe lidakwera kumapeto kwa zaka za m'ma 1960, koma popanda Dokotala.

context: Nyumba zoyambirira za yunivesite ya Chicago, zomwe zimapanga zomwe tsopano zimatchedwa Main Quadrangles, zinali mbali ya "dongosolo lalikulu" lomwe linapangidwa ndi oyang'anira awiri a University of Chicago ndipo linakonzedwa ndi katswiri wa zomangamanga wa Chicago Henry Ives Cobb. Ma Main Quadrangles ali ndi ma quadrangles asanu ndi limodzi, aliyense atazunguliridwa ndi nyumba, omwe ali m'malire a quadrangle imodzi yayikulu. Nyumba za Main Quadrangles zinapangidwa ndi Cobb, Shepley, Rutan ndi Coolidge, Holabird & Roche, ndi makampani ena a zomangamanga mu chisakanizo cha mitundu ya Victorian Gothic ndi Collegiate Gothic, yopangidwa pa makoleji a University of Oxford. (Mitchell Tower, mwachitsanzo, imapangidwa ndi Oxford's Magdalen Tower, ndipo yunivesite ya Commons, Hutchinson Hall, imatsanzira Christ Church Hall.)

context: Pambuyo pa zaka za m'ma 1940, kalembedwe ka Gothic pakampu kanayamba kupereka njira ku masitaelo amakono. Mu 1955, Eero Saarinen adapatsidwa mgwirizano kuti apange dongosolo lachiwiri lalikulu, lomwe linapangitsa kuti amange nyumba kumpoto ndi kumwera kwa Midway, kuphatikizapo Laird Bell Law Quadrangle (zovuta zopangidwa ndi Saarinen); mndandanda wa nyumba zaluso; nyumba yokonzedwa ndi Ludwig Mies van der Rohe ya School of Social Service Administration ya yunivesite;, nyumba yomwe idzakhala nyumba ya Harris School of Public Policy Studies ndi Edward Durrell Stone, ndi Regenstein Library, nyumba yayikulu kwambiri pakampu, chimango chankhanza chopangidwa ndi Walter Netsch wa kampani ya Chicago Skidmore,  Owings & Merrill. Pulani ina yaikulu, yomwe idapangidwa mu 1999 ndikusinthidwa mu 2004, idatulutsa Gerald Ratner Athletics Center (2003), Max Palevsky Residential Commons (2001), South Campus Residence Hall ndi malo odyera (2009), chipatala chatsopano cha ana, ndi zomangamanga zina, zowonjezera, ndi kubwezeretsa. Mu 2011, yunivesiteyi inatha galasi la Joe ndi Rika Mansueto Library, lomwe limapereka chipinda chachikulu chowerengera laibulale ya yunivesite ndipo chimalepheretsa kufunika kwa malo osungirako mabuku kunja kwa kampu.
question: Mkati mwa zaka khumi ziti kumene sukuluyi inayamba kuoneka yamakono?

Mu 1955, Eero Saarinen adapatsidwa mgwirizano kuti apange dongosolo lachiwiri lalikulu, lomwe linapangitsa kuti amange nyumba kumpoto ndi kumwera kwa Midway, kuphatikizapo Laird Bell Law Quadrangle (zovuta zopangidwa ndi Saarinen); mndandanda wa nyumba zaluso; nyumba yokonzedwa ndi Ludwig Mies van der Rohe ya School of Social Service Administration ya yunivesite;, nyumba yomwe idzakhala nyumba ya Harris School of Public Policy Studies ndi Edward Durrell Stone, ndi Regenstein Library, nyumba yayikulu kwambiri pakampu, chimango chankhanza chopangidwa ndi Walter Netsch wa kampani ya Chicago Skidmore,  Owings & Merrill. Pulani ina yaikulu, yomwe idapangidwa mu 1999 ndikusinthidwa mu 2004, idatulutsa Gerald Ratner Athletics Center (2003), Max Palevsky Residential Commons (2001), South Campus Residence Hall ndi malo odyera (2009), chipatala chatsopano cha ana, ndi zomangamanga zina, zowonjezera, ndi kubwezeretsa. Mu 2011, yunivesiteyi inatha galasi la Joe ndi Rika Mansueto Library, lomwe limapereka chipinda chachikulu chowerengera laibulale ya yunivesite ndipo chimalepheretsa kufunika kwa malo osungirako mabuku kunja kwa kampu.
question: Kodi ndi sukulu iti ya malamulo aboma yomwe idapeza kuti ndi nyumba yomwe Ludwig Mies van der Rohe adapanga?

text: Harris School of Public Policy Studies

context: Pambuyo pa zaka za m'ma 1940, kalembedwe ka Gothic pakampu kanayamba kupereka njira ku masitaelo amakono. Pulani ina yaikulu, yomwe idapangidwa mu 1999 ndikusinthidwa mu 2004, idatulutsa Gerald Ratner Athletics Center (2003), Max Palevsky Residential Commons (2001), South Campus Residence Hall ndi malo odyera (2009), chipatala chatsopano cha ana, ndi zomangamanga zina, zowonjezera, ndi kubwezeretsa. question: Kodi Gerald Ratner Athletics Center idamangidwa liti?

context: Yunivesiteyi imayendetsa mabungwe angapo a maphunziro ndi mapulogalamu kupatula masukulu ake apamwamba komanso omaliza maphunziro. Imagwira ntchito ku University of Chicago Laboratory Schools (sukulu ya tsiku lachinsinsi la ophunzira a K-12 ndi sukulu ya tsiku), Sonia Shankman Orthogenic School (pulogalamu yothandizira anthu omwe ali ndi mavuto a khalidwe ndi malingaliro), ndi masukulu anayi a hayala a boma ku South Side of Chicago omwe amayang'aniridwa ndi yunivesite ya Urban Education Institute. Kuphatikiza apo, Hyde Park Day School, sukulu ya ophunzira omwe ali ndi vuto la kuphunzira, imakhala ndi malo pa yunivesite ya Chicago. Kuyambira 1983, Yunivesite ya Chicago yakhala ikugwira ntchito ya University of Chicago School Mathematics Project, pulogalamu ya masamu yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito m'masukulu a pulayimale ndi sekondale a m'tawuni. Yunivesiteyi imayendetsa pulogalamu yotchedwa Council on Advanced Studies in the Social Sciences and Humanities, yomwe imayang'anira misonkhano yosiyanasiyana kuti ipereke msonkhano kwa ophunzira omaliza maphunziro, akatswiri, ndi akatswiri ochezera kuti apereke ntchito yamaphunziro yomwe ikuchitika. Yunivesiteyi imagwiranso ntchito ku University of Chicago Press, kampani yaikulu kwambiri yofalitsa nkhani ku United States.
question: Kodi dzina la sukulu ya tsiku lachinsinsi la ophunzira a K-12 omwe yunivesite imayendetsa ndi ati?

context: Mu zachuma, opambana odziwika bwino a Nobel Memorial Prize mu Economic Sciences Milton Friedman, mlangizi wamkulu wa Purezidenti wa Republican U.S. Ronald Reagan ndi Conservative British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, George Stigler, wopambana Nobel komanso wochirikiza chiphunzitso cholanda malamulo, Gary Becker, wothandizira kwambiri ku nthambi ya zachuma za banja, Herbert A. context: Boma la Kublai linakumana ndi mavuto azachuma pambuyo pa 1279. Nkhondo ndi ntchito zomangamanga zinawononga chuma cha Mongol. Zoyesayesa zosonkhanitsa ndi kusonkhanitsa ndalama za misonkho zinakanthidwa ndi ziphuphu ndi zochitika zandale. Maulendo ankhondo osasamalidwa bwino adatsatira mavuto azachuma. Kublai anaukira Japan kachiwiri mu 1281 chifukwa cha mphepo yamkuntho. Kublai adasokoneza makampeni ake motsutsana ndi Annam, Champa, ndi Java, koma adapambana Pyrrhic motsutsana ndi Burma. Maulendowo analepheretsedwa ndi matenda, nyengo yosasangalatsa, ndi malo otentha osayenera nkhondo yokwera pamahatchi a Mongolia. Ufumu wa Tran womwe unalamulira Annam (Dai Viet) unaphwanya ndi kugonjetsa a Mongolia pa Nkhondo ya Bạch Đằng (1288). Dera la China la Fujian linali nyumba yoyambirira ya fuko la Chinese Tran (Chen) asanasamukire pansi pa Trần Kinh (陳京, Chén Jīng) kupita ku Dai Viet ndipo mbadwa zake zinakhazikitsa ufumu wa Trần womwe unalamulira Vietnam Đại Việt, ndipo mamembala ena a fuko lawo ankatha kulankhulabe Chitchaina monga pamene nthumwi ya ufumu wa Yuan inakumana ndi kalonga wa Trần wolankhula Chitchaina Trần Quốc Tuấn (pambuyo pake Mfumu Trần Hưng Đạo) mu 1282. Pulofesa Liam Kelley adanena kuti anthu ochokera ku ufumu wa Song China monga Zhao Zhong ndi Xu Zongdao adathawira ku ufumu wa Tran adalamulira Vietnam pambuyo pa kuwukira kwa Mongolia kwa Song, ndipo adathandizira a Tran kulimbana ndi kuwukira kwa Mongol. Ufumu wa Tran unachokera kudera la Fujian ku China monga momwe anachitira mtsogoleri wachipembedzo wa Daoist Xu Zongdao yemwe adalemba kuwukira kwa Mongol ndikuwatchula kuti "achifwamba akumpoto". Annam, Burma, ndi Champa adazindikira ulamuliro wa Mongol ndipo adakhazikitsa ubale wamtengo wapatali ndi ufumu wa Yuan.
question: Kodi boma la Kublai linatha liti ndalama?

Ufumu wa Tran unachokera kudera la Fujian ku China monga momwe anachitira mtsogoleri wachipembedzo wa Daoist Xu Zongdao yemwe adalemba kuwukira kwa Mongol ndikuwatchula kuti "achifwamba akumpoto". question: Kodi ufumu wa Tran unalamulira kuti?

context: Mfumu Gegeen Khan, mwana wamwamuna wa Ayurbarwada komanso wolowa m'malo, adalamulira zaka ziwiri zokha, kuyambira 1321 mpaka 1323. Anapitiliza ndondomeko za abambo ake kuti asinthe boma potengera mfundo za Confucius, mothandizidwa ndi mtsogoleri wake wamkulu Baiju yemwe adasankhidwa kumene. Mu ulamuliro wake, Da Yuan Tong Zhi (Chitchaina: 大元通制, "mabungwe ambiri a Yuan Wamkulu"), mndandanda waukulu wa malamulo ndi malamulo a ufumu wa Yuan omwe adayambitsidwa ndi abambo ake, adalengezedwa mwalamulo. Gegeen anaphedwa m'kulanda boma kumene kunaphatikizapo akalonga asanu ochokera m'gulu lopikisana nawo, mwinamwake akatswiri a steppe otsutsa kusintha kwa Confucius. Iwo anaika Yesün Temür (kapena Taidingdi) pampando wachifumu, ndipo, pambuyo poyesa kulephera kukhazikitsa bata akalonga, nayenso anagonjera ku regicide.

context: Dongosolo la bureaucracy lomwe linapangidwa ndi Kublai Khan linawonetsa zikhalidwe zosiyanasiyana mu ufumuwo, kuphatikizapo a Han Chinese, Khitans, Jurchens, Mongols, ndi Tibetan Buddhist. Ngakhale kuti mawu ovomerezeka a mabungwewo angasonyeze kuti kapangidwe ka boma kanali pafupifupi kokha ka mafumu amtundu wa China, boma la Yuan kwenikweni linali ndi zinthu zosiyanasiyana zochokera ku zikhalidwe zosiyanasiyana. Zinthu zamtundu waku China za bureaucracy makamaka zinachokera ku mafumu a Tang, Song, komanso mafumu a Khitan Liao ndi Jurchen Jin. Alangizi a ku China monga Liu Bingzhong ndi Yao Shu anapereka mphamvu yamphamvu ku khoti loyambirira la Kublai, ndipo boma lapakati linakhazikitsidwa mkati mwa zaka khumi zoyambirira za ulamuliro wa Kublai. Boma ili lidatengera gawo lachikhalidwe cha China la magawo atatu a ulamuliro pakati pa maofesi aboma, asilikali, ndi oyang'anira, kuphatikiza Central Secretariat (Zhongshu Sheng) kuyang'anira nkhani zaboma, Privy Council (Chitchaina: 樞密院) kuyang'anira nkhani zankhondo, ndi Censorate kuti aziyang'anira mkati ndi kuyendera. Komabe, ntchito zenizeni za mabungwe aboma apakati ndi am'deralo, zinawonetsa kugwirizana kwakukulu pakati pa maulamuliro aboma ndi ankhondo, chifukwa cha kudalira kwachikhalidwe cha Mongolia pa mabungwe ankhondo ndi maofesi monga maziko a ulamuliro. Ngakhale zili choncho, bungwe la anthu wamba loterolo, ndi Central Secretariat ngati bungwe lapamwamba lomwe linali (mwachindunji kapena mwachindunji) lomwe linali ndi udindo wa mabungwe ena ambiri aboma (monga miyambo yachikhalidwe cha Chinese Six Ministries), lidapangidwa ku China. Nthawi zosiyanasiyana bungwe lina la boma lapakati lotchedwa Department of State Affairs (Shangshu Sheng) lomwe makamaka limagwira ntchito zachuma linakhazikitsidwa (monga mu ulamuliro wa Külüg Khan kapena Emperor Wuzong), koma nthawi zambiri linasiyidwa posakhalitsa.

context: Mankhwala akumadzulo ankagwiritsidwanso ntchito ku China ndi Akhristu a Nestorian a khoti la Yuan, komwe nthawi zina ankatchedwa huihui kapena mankhwala achisilamu. Dokotala wa ku Nestorian Yesu Womasulira anayambitsa Office of Western Medicine mu 1263 mu ulamuliro wa Kublai. Madokotala a Huihui ogwira ntchito m'zipatala ziwiri zachifumu anali ndi udindo wochiritsa banja lachifumu ndi mamembala a khothi. Madokotala a ku China anatsutsa mankhwala akumadzulo chifukwa dongosolo lake la nthabwala linatsutsana ndi nzeru za yin-yang ndi wuxing zomwe zimayambitsa mankhwala achikhalidwe a ku China. context: Kenya ikugwira ntchito m'masewera angapo, pakati pawo cricket, rallying, mpira, rugby union ndi nkhonya. Dzikoli limadziwika makamaka chifukwa cha ulamuliro wake mu masewera apakati komanso mtunda wautali, pokhala nthawi zonse amatulutsa akatswiri a Olimpiki ndi Commonwealth Games mu zochitika zosiyanasiyana zamtunda, makamaka mu 800 m, 1,500 m, 3,000 m steeplechase, 5,000 m, 10,000 m ndi marathon. Othamanga aku Kenya (makamaka Kalenjin) akupitilizabe kulamulira dziko lothamanga mtunda, ngakhale mpikisano wochokera ku Morocco ndi Ethiopia wachepetsa ukuluwu. Othamanga odziwika kwambiri ku Kenya anaphatikizapo akazi anayi a Boston Marathon omwe adapambana komanso katswiri wa dziko lapansi kawiri Catherine Ndereba, 800m padziko lonse lapansi David Rudisha, yemwe kale anali ndi mbiri ya dziko la Marathon Paul Tergat, ndi John Ngugi.

Dzikoli limadziwika makamaka chifukwa cha ulamuliro wake mu masewera apakati komanso mtunda wautali, pokhala nthawi zonse amatulutsa akatswiri a Olimpiki ndi Commonwealth Games mu zochitika zosiyanasiyana zamtunda, makamaka mu 800 m, 1,500 m, 3,000 m steeplechase, 5,000 m, 10,000 m ndi marathon. Othamanga aku Kenya (makamaka Kalenjin) akupitilizabe kulamulira dziko lothamanga mtunda, ngakhale mpikisano wochokera ku Morocco ndi Ethiopia wachepetsa ukuluwu. Othamanga odziwika kwambiri ku Kenya anaphatikizapo akazi anayi a Boston Marathon omwe adapambana komanso katswiri wa dziko lapansi kawiri Catherine Ndereba, 800m padziko lonse lapansi David Rudisha, yemwe kale anali ndi mbiri ya dziko la Marathon Paul Tergat, ndi John Ngugi.
question: Ndani akulamulira dziko la kuthamanga mtunda wautali?

question: Kodi dziko la Kenya limapikisana nalo mtunda wautali ndi mayiko ati?

context: Katswiri wa zachuma wa ku Korea Hoesung Lee ndi wapampando wa IPCC kuyambira pa Okutobala 8, 2015, pambuyo pa chisankho cha IPCC Bureau yatsopano. Chisankho ichi chisanachitike, IPCC idatsogoleredwa ndi wachiwiri kwa wapampando wake Ismail El Gizouli, yemwe adasankhidwa kukhala wapampando pambuyo pa kusiya ntchito kwa Rajendra K. Pachauri mu February 2015. Mipando yam'mbuyomu inali Rajendra K. Pachauri, yemwe adasankhidwa mu Meyi 2002; Robert Watson mu 1997; ndi Bert Bolin mu 1988. Mpando umathandizidwa ndi bungwe losankhidwa kuphatikizapo wachiwiri kwa michendo, atsogoleri a gulu logwira ntchito, ndi mlembi.

context: Chidule chachikulu cha lipoti la WG I Summary for Policymakers chimanena kuti ali otsimikiza kuti mpweya wotulutsa mpweya womwe umachitika chifukwa cha zochita za anthu ukuwonjezera kwambiri kuchuluka kwa mpweya wotentha, zomwe zimapangitsa pafupifupi kutentha kwina kwa dziko lapansi. Amawerengera ndi chidaliro kuti CO2 yakhala ikuyang'anira zoposa theka la kutentha kwa kutentha. Iwo akulosera kuti pansi pa zochitika za "business as usual" (BAU), kutentha kwapadziko lonse lapansi kudzawonjezeka ndi pafupifupi 0.3 °C pa zaka khumi m'zaka za zana la [21]. Iwo amaweruza kuti kutentha kwa mpweya padziko lonse lapansi kwawonjezeka ndi 0.3 mpaka 0.6 ° C pazaka 100 zapitazi, zogwirizana kwambiri ndi kuneneratu kwa zitsanzo za nyengo, komanso kukula kofanana ndi kusinthasintha kwa nyengo yachilengedwe. Kudziwika mosapita m'mbali kwa kutentha kowonjezereka sikungatheke kwa zaka khumi kapena kuposerapo.

context: Kuwonetseratu kumeneku sikunaphatikizidwe mu chidule chomaliza cha opanga malamulo. Bungwe la IPCC lavomereza kuti tsikuli ndi lolakwika, pomwe likutsimikiziranso kuti mapeto omwe ali pachidule chomaliza anali olimba. Iwo adasonyeza chisoni chifukwa cha "kugwiritsa ntchito molakwika njira zokhazikitsidwa bwino za IPCC pankhaniyi". Tsiku la 2035 latchulidwa molondola ndi IPCC kuchokera ku lipoti la WWF, lomwe lalakwitsa gwero lake, lipoti la ICSI "Kusiyana kwa Chipale chofewa ndi Ayezi m'mbuyomu komanso pakali pano pa Global and Regional Scale".
