text: "Kusiyana kwa Chipale Chofewa ndi Ayezi m'mbuyomu komanso pakali pano pamlingo wapadziko lonse lapansi komanso wachigawo"

context: Lipoti lachitatu lowunikira (TAR) linali ndi chithunzi cholembedwa kuti "Millennial Northern Hemisphere kutentha reconstruction" potengera pepala la 1999 la Michael E. Mann, Raymond S. Bradley ndi Malcolm K. Hughes (MBH99), lomwe lakhala likutchedwa "hockey stick graph". Chithunzichi chinawonjezera graph yofanana mu Chithunzi 3.20 kuchokera ku IPCC Second Assessment Report ya 1995, ndipo inasiyana ndi schematic mu lipoti loyamba lofufuza lomwe linalibe mayunitsi otentha, koma linawoneka kuti likuwonetsa kusiyana kwakukulu kwa kutentha kwa dziko lonse lapansi pazaka 1000 zapitazi, ndi kutentha kwakukulu pa nthawi ya Medieval Warm Period kuposa pakati pa zaka za zana la 20. Schematic sinali chiwembu chenicheni cha deta, ndipo inali yochokera ku chithunzi cha kutentha m'chigawo chapakati cha England, ndi kutentha kowonjezeka pamaziko a umboni wa minda ya mpesa ya Medieval ku England. Ngakhale ndi kuwonjezeka kumeneku, kuchuluka komwe kunawonetsa kwa Medieval Warm Period sikunafike kutentha komwe kunalembedwa pakati pa England mu 2007. Kupezeka kwa MBH99 kunathandizidwa ndi zomangamanga zotchulidwa ndi Jones et al. 1998, Pollack, Huang & Shen 1998, Crowley & Lowery 2000 ndi Briffa 2000, pogwiritsa ntchito deta ndi njira zosiyana. Kukonzanso kwa Jones et al. ndi Briffa kunaphimbidwa ndi kukonzanso kwa MBH99 mu Chithunzi 2.21 cha lipoti la IPCC.

context: Ndondomeko ya IPCC pa kusintha kwa nyengo ndi kugwira ntchito bwino kwake komanso kupambana kwake kwayerekezedwa ndi kuthana ndi mavuto ena a chilengedwe (yerekezerani kuchepa kwa ozoni ndi kutentha kwa dziko lapansi). Pankhani ya kuchepa kwa ozoni lamulo lapadziko lonse lapansi lochokera ku Montreal Protocol lakhala likuyenda bwino, pankhani ya Kusintha kwa Nyengo, Kyoto Protocol inalephera. Mlandu wa Ozone unagwiritsidwa ntchito pofufuza momwe ndondomeko ya IPCC imagwirira ntchito. Mkhalidwe wa lockstep wa IPCC wamanga mgwirizano waukulu wa sayansi pamene mayiko ndi maboma akutsatirabe zolinga zosiyana, ngati si zotsutsana. Chitsanzo choyambirira cha liniya yopanga ndondomeko ya chidziwitso chambiri chomwe tili nacho, bwino kuyankha kwa ndale kudzakhala kukayikiridwa.

context: Ma chloroplast ali ndi DNA yawoyawo, yomwe nthawi zambiri imatchedwa ctDNA, kapena cpDNA. Amadziwikanso kuti plastome. Kukhalapo kwake kunatsimikiziridwa koyamba mu 1962, ndipo koyamba mu 1986-pamene magulu awiri ofufuza a ku Japan anatsatira DNA ya chloroplast ya chiwindi ndi fodya. Kuyambira nthawi imeneyo, mazana a ma DNA a chloroplast ochokera ku mitundu yosiyanasiyana akhala akutsatizana, koma makamaka ndi a zomera zamtunda ndi algae wobiriwira-glaucophytes, algae wofiira, ndi magulu ena a algal ndi ochepa kwambiri, zomwe zingayambitse kukondera kwina pamalingaliro a kapangidwe ka DNA ya chloroplast ndi zomwe zili.

context: Nambala yoyamba (kapena prime) ndi nambala yachilengedwe yayikulu kuposa 1 yomwe ilibe zogawanitsa zabwino kupatula 1 ndi yokha. Mwachitsanzo, 5 ndi yaikulu chifukwa 1 ndi 5 ndizo zokhazokha zabwino zowonjezera, pomwe 6 ndi yophatikizika chifukwa ili ndi zogawanitsa 2 ndi 3 kuwonjezera pa 1 ndi 6. Theorem yofunika kwambiri ya masamu imakhazikitsa gawo lalikulu la ma primes mu chiphunzitso cha manambala: chiwerengero chilichonse chachikulu kuposa 1 chikhoza kufotokozedwa ngati chotulukapo cha primes chomwe chiri chapadera mpaka kulamulira. Mwachitsanzo, 5 ndi yaikulu chifukwa 1 ndi 5 ndizo zokhazokha zabwino zowonjezera, pomwe 6 ndi yophatikizika chifukwa ili ndi zogawanitsa 2 ndi 3 kuwonjezera pa 1 ndi 6. Theorem yofunika kwambiri ya masamu imakhazikitsa gawo lalikulu la ma primes mu chiphunzitso cha manambala: chiwerengero chilichonse chachikulu kuposa 1 chikhoza kufotokozedwa ngati chotulukapo cha primes chomwe chiri chapadera mpaka kulamulira. Kusiyana mu theorem iyi kumafuna kupatula 1 ngati prime chifukwa munthu akhoza kuphatikizapo mwachisawawa zochitika zambiri za 1 mu factorization iliyonse, mwachitsanzo, 3, 1 · 3, 1 · 1 · 3, ndi zina zotero zonse zovomerezeka za 3.

context: Katundu wokhala wamkulu (kapena ayi) amatchedwa primality. Njira yosavuta koma pang'onopang'ono yotsimikizira ukulu wa nambala yopatsidwa n imadziwika kuti gawo loyeserera. Zimaphatikizapo kuyesa ngati n ndi chiwerengero chachikulu cha chiwerengero chilichonse pakati pa 2 ndi . Ma aligorivimu othandiza kwambiri kuposa kugawidwa kwa mayesero apangidwa kuti ayese ukulu wa manambala ambiri. Izi zikuphatikizapo mayeso oyambirira a Miller-Rabin, omwe ndi othamanga koma ali ndi mwayi wochepa wolakwika, ndi mayeso oyambirira a AKS, omwe nthawi zonse amatulutsa yankho lolondola mu nthawi ya polynomial koma amachedwa kwambiri kuti akhale othandiza. Njira zofulumira kwambiri zimapezeka pa manambala a mawonekedwe apadera, monga manambala a Mersenne. context: Mtundu wachitatu wa malingaliro umakhudza mbali za kugawidwa kwa ma primes. Zimaganiziridwa kuti pali mapasa ambiri osawerengeka, awiriawiri a primes omwe ali ndi kusiyana kwa 2 (mapasa oyamba kulingalira). Kulingalira kwa Polignac ndikulimbitsa malingaliro amenewo, limanena kuti pa chiwerengero chilichonse chabwino n, pali awiriawiri ambiri otsatizana omwe amasiyana ndi 2n. Zimaganiziridwa kuti pali ma primes ambiri a mawonekedwe n2 + 1. Malingaliro awa ndi milandu yapadera ya lingaliro lalikulu la Schinzel Malingaliro a H. Brocard akuti nthawi zonse pamakhala ma primes osachepera anayi pakati pa mabwalo a ma primes otsatizana akuluakulu kuposa 2. Kulingalira kwa Legendre kumanena kuti pali nambala yaikulu pakati pa n2 ndi (n + 1)2 pa chiwerengero chilichonse chabwino n. Zimatanthauzidwa ndi kulingalira kwamphamvu kwa Cramér.

Nthawi zambiri, "prime" imasonyeza kuchepa kapena kusawonongeka, m'lingaliro loyenera. Mwachitsanzo, munda waukulu ndi gawo laling'ono kwambiri la munda F wokhala ndi 0 ndi 1. context: Makamaka, chizolowezi ichi chimakhala chocheperako pamene chiwerengero chikuchulukitsa ndi p, mosiyana kwambiri ndi mtengo wokhazikika (wotchedwanso prime wopanda malire). Pamene kumaliza Q (pafupifupi, kudzaza mipata) polemekeza mtengo weniweni kumapereka munda wa manambala enieni, kumaliza polemekeza chikhalidwe cha p-adic |−|p kumapereka munda wa manambala a p-adic. Izi ndizo njira zonse zotheka kumaliza Q, ndi theorem ya Ostrowski. Mafunso ena a masamu okhudzana ndi Q kapena minda yambiri yapadziko lonse lapansi akhoza kusamutsidwa mmbuyo ndi mtsogolo ku minda yomalizidwa (kapena yakomweko). Mfundo yapadziko lonse lapansi iyi ikugogomezeranso kufunika kwa primes ku chiphunzitso cha manambala.

context: Makamaka, chizolowezi ichi chimakhala chocheperako pamene chiwerengero chikuchulukitsa ndi p, mosiyana kwambiri ndi mtengo wokhazikika (wotchedwanso prime wopanda malire). Pamene kumaliza Q (pafupifupi, kudzaza mipata) polemekeza mtengo weniweni kumapereka munda wa manambala enieni, kumaliza polemekeza chikhalidwe cha p-adic |−|p kumapereka munda wa manambala a p-adic. Izi ndizo njira zonse zotheka kumaliza Q, ndi theorem ya Ostrowski. Mafunso ena a masamu okhudzana ndi Q kapena minda yambiri yapadziko lonse lapansi akhoza kusamutsidwa mmbuyo ndi mtsogolo ku minda yomalizidwa (kapena yakomweko). Mfundo yapadziko lonse lapansi iyi ikugogomezeranso kufunika kwa primes ku chiphunzitso cha manambala.

context: Pakati pa Bingen ndi Bonn, Middle Rhine imadutsa mu Rhine Gorge, mapangidwe omwe adapangidwa ndi kukokoloka. Mlingo wa kukokoloka unali wofanana ndi kukwezedwa m'deralo, kotero kuti mtsinjewo unasiyidwa pafupifupi pamlingo wake woyambirira pamene malo ozungulira anakwera. Chigwachi ndi chozama kwambiri ndipo ndi kutambasula kwa mtsinjewo womwe umadziwika ndi nyumba zake zambiri ndi minda ya mpesa. Ndi UNESCO World Heritage Site (2002) ndipo imadziwika kuti "Romantic Rhine", yokhala ndi nyumba zoposa 40 ndi malinga ochokera ku Middle Ages ndi midzi yambiri yokongola komanso yokongola yakumidzi.

context: Rhine-Meuse Delta, dera lofunika kwambiri lachilengedwe la Netherlands limayamba pafupi ndi Millingen aan de Rijn, pafupi ndi malire a Dutch-Germany ndi kugawidwa kwa Rhine kukhala Waal ndi Nederrijn. Popeza Rhine imapereka madzi ambiri, nthawi yochepa ya Rhine Delta imagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri. Komabe, dzina limeneli limagwiritsidwanso ntchito kwa mtsinje wa delta kumene Rhine imalowa mu Nyanja ya Constance, choncho zikuwonekeratu kutcha yaikulu Rhine-Meuse delta, kapena ngakhale Rhine-Meuse-Scheldt delta, monga Scheldt imathera mu delta yomweyo.

context: Glacial yotsiriza inathamanga kuchokera ku ~ 74,000 (BP = Pamaso pa Pano), mpaka kumapeto kwa Pleistocene (~ 11,600 BP). Kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa Ulaya, idawona magawo awiri ozizira kwambiri, kufika mozungulira 70,000 BP ndi kuzungulira 29,000-24,000 BP. Gawo lomaliza lisanafike pang'ono nyengo yotsiriza ya ayezi padziko lonse lapansi (Last Glacial Maximum). Panthawiyi, mtsinje wa Lower Rhine unayenda pafupifupi kumadzulo kudutsa ku Netherlands ndipo unafika kum'mwera chakumadzulo, kudutsa English Channel ndipo potsiriza, ku Atlantic Ocean. English Channel, Irish Channel ndi mbali yaikulu ya Nyanja ya Kumpoto inali nthaka youma, makamaka chifukwa chakuti madzi a m'nyanja anali pafupifupi 120 m (390 ft) otsika kuposa lero.

context: Pamene kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa Ulaya pang'onopang'ono kunayamba kutentha kuyambira zaka 22,000 zapitazo kupita mtsogolo, nthaka yapansi panthaka yozizira komanso madzi oundana a m'mapiri anayamba kusungunuka ndipo chipale chofewa cha kugwa-chisanu chinasungunuka m'dzinja. Zambiri zotulutsa zinatumizidwa ku Rhine ndi kutsegulidwa kwake pansi pa mtsinje. Kutentha mofulumira ndi kusintha kwa zomera, kukhala nkhalango yotseguka, kunayamba pafupifupi 13,000 BP. Pofika 9000 BP, Europe inali ndi nkhalango zonse. Ndi kuchepa kwa madzi oundana padziko lonse lapansi, madzi a m'nyanja adakwera ndipo English Channel ndi North Sea adasefukiranso. Madzi osungunuka, kuwonjezera pa nyanja ndi kutsika kwa nthaka, anamiza magombe akale a ku Ulaya molakwika.

context: Kumapeto kwa nkhondo yoyamba ya padziko lonse, mtsinje wa Rhineland unali pansi pa Pangano la Versailles. Izi zinalamula kuti likhale ndi ogwirizana, mpaka 1935 ndipo pambuyo pake, lidzakhala dera lopanda asilikali, ndipo gulu lankhondo la Germany lidzaletsedwa kulowa. Pangano la Versailles ndi makonzedwe ameneŵa, mwachisawawa, anachititsa mkwiyo waukulu ku Germany ndipo kaŵirikaŵiri amatchulidwa kuti anathandiza Adolf Hitler kukwera ulamuliro. Ogwirizanawo adachoka ku Rhineland, mu 1930 ndipo gulu lankhondo la Germany linalandanso mu 1936, lomwe linali lotchuka kwambiri ku Germany. Ngakhale kuti ogwirizanawo mwina akanatha kuletsa kulandiranso, Britain ndi France sanafune kutero, mbali ya ndondomeko yawo yotonthoza Hitler.

Izi zinalamula kuti likhale ndi ogwirizana, mpaka 1935 ndipo pambuyo pake, lidzakhala dera lopanda asilikali, ndipo gulu lankhondo la Germany lidzaletsedwa kulowa. Pangano la Versailles ndi makonzedwe ameneŵa, mwachisawawa, anachititsa mkwiyo waukulu ku Germany ndipo kaŵirikaŵiri amatchulidwa kuti anathandiza Adolf Hitler kukwera ulamuliro. Ogwirizanawo adachoka ku Rhineland, mu 1930 ndipo gulu lankhondo la Germany linalandanso mu 1936, lomwe linali lotchuka kwambiri ku Germany. Ngakhale kuti ogwirizanawo mwina akanatha kuletsa kulandiranso, Britain ndi France sanafune kutero, mbali ya ndondomeko yawo yotonthoza Hitler.
question: Kodi ndi liti pamene gulu lankhondo la Germany linalandanso Rhineland?

context: Pansi pa malamulo a Scotland Act 1978, msonkhano wosankhidwa udzakhazikitsidwa ku Edinburgh malinga ngati ambiri mwa osankhidwa a ku Scotland adavotera mu referendum yomwe idzachitike pa 1 March 1979 yomwe ikuyimira osachepera 40% ya osankhidwa onse. Referendum ya 1979 ya Scottish devolution kuti ikhazikitse Msonkhano wa Scottish wa devolved inalephera. Ngakhale kuti mavoti anali 51.6% poyanja Msonkhano wa Scotland, chiwerengerochi sichinali chofanana ndi 40% ya chiwerengero chonse cha osankhidwa chomwe chimawonedwa kuti chikufunika kuti adutse muyeso, popeza 32.9% ya anthu oyenerera kuvota sanavote, kapena sanathe, kuvota.

context: Monga ku Nyumba ya Malamulo, ziyeneretso zingapo zimagwira ntchito kukhala MSP. Ziyeneretso zoterezi zinayambitsidwa pansi pa House of Commons Disqualification Act 1975 ndi British Nationality Act 1981. Makamaka, mamembala ayenera kukhala oposa zaka 18 ndipo ayenera kukhala nzika ya United Kingdom, Republic of Ireland, imodzi mwa mayiko omwe ali mu Commonwealth of Nations, nzika ya dziko la Britain kunja, kapena nzika ya European Union yomwe imakhala ku UK. Mamembala a apolisi ndi magulu ankhondo amaletsedwa kukhala mu Nyumba ya Malamulo ya Scotland monga MSPs osankhidwa, ndipo mofananamo, ogwira ntchito m'boma ndi mamembala a malamulo akunja amaletsedwa. Munthu sangakhale ku Nyumba ya Malamulo ya ku Scotland ngati aweruzidwa kuti ndi wamisala pansi pa malamulo a Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003.

context: Pamene anali kuphunzira zamalamulo ndi filosofi ku England ndi Germany, Iqbal anakhala membala wa nthambi ya London ya All India Muslim League. Anabwerera ku Lahore mu 1908. Pomwe adagawa nthawi yake pakati pa zamalamulo ndi ndakatulo zafilosofi, Iqbal adakhalabe wokangalika mu Muslim League. Iye sanachirikize kulowerera kwa India mu Nkhondo Yadziko Lonse ndipo adakhalabe pafupi ndi atsogoleri andale achisilamu monga Muhammad Ali Johar ndi Muhammad Ali Jinnah. Anali wotsutsa chipani chachikulu cha Indian National Congress komanso dziko lapansi. Nkhani zisanu ndi ziwiri za Chingerezi za Iqbal zinafalitsidwa ndi Oxford University Press mu 1934 m'buku lotchedwa The Reconstruction of Religious Thought in Islam. Nkhani zimenezi zimakhudza kwambiri udindo wa Chisilamu monga chipembedzo komanso nzeru zandale ndi zamalamulo m'nthawi yamakono.

context: "The Islamic State", yomwe kale inkadziwika kuti "Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant" ndipo isanafike kuti "Islamic State of Iraq", (ndipo imatchedwa chidule cha Daesh ndi otsutsa ake ambiri), ndi gulu lankhondo la Wahhabi / Salafi jihadist lomwe limatsogoleredwa ndipo makamaka limapangidwa ndi Aluya a Sunni ochokera ku Iraq ndi Syria. M'chaka cha 2014, gululi linadzilengeza lokha kuti ndi caliphate, lomwe lili ndi ulamuliro wachipembedzo, ndale komanso zankhondo pa Asilamu onse padziko lonse lapansi. Kuyambira pa Marichi 2015 [kusintha], inali ndi ulamuliro pa dera lomwe lili ndi anthu mamiliyoni khumi ku Iraq ndi Syria, ndipo ili ndi ulamuliro wa dzina pa madera ang'onoang'ono a Libya, Nigeria ndi Afghanistan. (Ngakhale kuti ndi boma lodzifotokozera lokha, lilibe chidziwitso chapadziko lonse lapansi.) Gululi limagwiranso ntchito kapena lili ndi othandizira m'madera ena padziko lapansi, kuphatikizapo North Africa ndi South Asia.

Mabungwewa adagwiranso ntchito ngati malo oti apaulendo agawane nkhani izi. Akatswiri andale monga Friedrich Ratzel wa ku Germany ndi Halford Mackinder wa ku Britain nawonso anachirikiza ulamuliro wa imperialism. Ratzel adakhulupirira kuti kuwonjezeka kunali kofunikira kuti boma lipulumuke pomwe Mackinder adathandizira kukula kwa ufumu wa Britain; Mfundo ziwirizi zinalamulira chilangocho kwa zaka makumi ambiri.

question: Kodi mabungwe a malo ku Ulaya angathandize bwanji apaulendo ena?

context: Kum'mawa, monga momwe Edward Said adanenera, amatanthauza momwe Kumadzulo kunayambitsira malo olingalira a Kum'mawa. Malo oyerekezera awa amadalira nkhani yofunika kwambiri yomwe siyiyimira kusiyanasiyana kapena zenizeni za chikhalidwe cha Kum'mawa. M'malo mwake, pofunikira Kum'mawa, nkhaniyi imagwiritsa ntchito lingaliro la kudziwika kwa malo kuti apange kusiyana ndi mtunda pakati pa "ife" Kumadzulo ndi "iwo" Kum'mawa, kapena "pano" Kumadzulo ndi "kumeneko" Kum'mawa. Kusiyana kumeneku kunali koonekera makamaka m'mabuku ndi ntchito zowoneka bwino za maphunziro oyambirira a ku Ulaya a Kum'mawa omwe anaika Kum'mawa kukhala kopanda nzeru komanso kumbuyo motsutsana ndi Kumadzulo kwanzeru komanso kopita patsogolo. Kutanthauzira Kum'mawa ngati masomphenya oipa a iwo okha, monga otsika ake, sikuti kunangowonjezera kudzikonda kwa Kumadzulo, komanso inali njira yolamuliramu Kum'mawa ndikudziwitsa Kumadzulo kuti athe kulamulidwa ndi kulamulidwa. Choncho nkhani ya Kum'mawa inatumikira ngati kulungamitsa kwa malingaliro a imperialism yoyambirira ya Kumadzulo, popeza idapanga bungwe la chidziwitso ndi malingaliro omwe amalungamitsa ulamuliro wa chikhalidwe, chikhalidwe, ndale, ndi zachuma m'madera ena.

question: Kumadzulo kunadziwona okha ngati chiyani poyerekeza ndi kum'mawa?

context: Chikhalidwe cha imperialism ndi pamene chisonkhezero cha dziko chimamveka m'magulu a chikhalidwe ndi chikhalidwe, mwachitsanzo mphamvu yake yofewa, kotero kuti imasintha makhalidwe abwino, chikhalidwe ndi chikhalidwe cha dziko la wina. Izi ndizoposa nyimbo "zakunja", wailesi yakanema kapena filimu yomwe ikukhala yotchuka ndi achinyamata, koma chikhalidwe chotchuka chimenecho chimasintha ziyembekezo zawo za moyo ndi chikhumbo chawo kuti dziko lawo likhale lofanana kwambiri ndi dziko lachilendo lomwe likuwonetsedwa. Mwachitsanzo, zojambula za moyo wapamwamba waku America mu sopo opera Dallas panthawi ya Cold War zinasintha ziyembekezo za anthu aku Romania; chitsanzo chaposachedwa kwambiri ndi chisonkhezero cha mndandanda wamasewera aku South Korea ku North Korea. Kufunika kwa mphamvu zofewa sikutayika pa maulamuliro olamulira, kulimbana ndi chisonkhezero choterechi ndi ziletso pa chikhalidwe chotchuka chakunja, kulamulira intaneti ndi mbale za satellite zosavomerezeka etc. Komanso kugwiritsa ntchito chikhalidwe koteroko sikwaposachedwa, monga gawo la ulamuliro wachiroma anthu apamwamba am'deralo adzawonetsedwa ndi ubwino ndi zapamwamba za chikhalidwe ndi moyo wachiroma, ndi cholinga choti kenako akhale otenga nawo mbali ofunitsitsa.

question: Kodi maulamuliro amalimbana bwanji ndi chikhalidwe cha imperialism?

context: Kugwirizana pakati pa chikapitolizimu, aristocracy, ndi imperialism kwakhala kukukambidwa kwa nthaŵi yaitali pakati pa akatswiri a mbiri yakale ndi akatswiri andale. Zambiri za mkanganowu zidayambitsidwa ndi akatswiri monga JA Hobson (1858-1940), Joseph Schumpeter (1883-1950), Thorstein Veblen (1857-1929), ndi Norman Angell (1872-1967). Ngakhale olemba omwe sanali a Marxist awa anali ochuluka kwambiri nkhondo yoyamba yapadziko lonse isanachitike, adakhalabe okangalika m'zaka zapakati pa nkhondo. Ntchito yawo yophatikizidwa inadziwitsa phunziro la imperialism ndi zotsatira zake ku Ulaya, komanso zinathandizira kulingalira za kuwuka kwa zovuta zankhondo ndi zandale ku United States kuyambira zaka za m'ma 1950. Hobson anatsutsa kuti kusintha kwa chikhalidwe cha anthu m'dziko muno kungachiritse matenda apadziko lonse a imperialism mwa kuchotsa maziko ake azachuma. Hobson adanena kuti kulowerera kwa boma kudzera m'misonkho kungalimbikitse kugwiritsa ntchito anthu ambiri, kupanga chuma, ndikulimbikitsa dongosolo lapadziko lonse lamtendere, lolekerera, losiyanasiyana.

question: Hobson adatsutsa kuti imperialism inali yapadziko lonse chiyani?

Zambiri za mkanganowu zidayambitsidwa ndi akatswiri monga JA Hobson (1858-1940), Joseph Schumpeter (1883-1950), Thorstein Veblen (1857-1929), ndi Norman Angell (1872-1967). Ngakhale olemba omwe sanali a Marxist awa anali ochuluka kwambiri nkhondo yoyamba yapadziko lonse isanachitike, adakhalabe okangalika m'zaka zapakati pa nkhondo. Ntchito yawo yophatikizidwa inadziwitsa phunziro la imperialism ndi zotsatira zake ku Ulaya, komanso zinathandizira kulingalira za kuwuka kwa zovuta zankhondo ndi zandale ku United States kuyambira zaka za m'ma 1950. Hobson anatsutsa kuti kusintha kwa chikhalidwe cha anthu m'dziko muno kungachiritse matenda apadziko lonse a imperialism mwa kuchotsa maziko ake azachuma. Hobson adanena kuti kulowerera kwa boma kudzera m'misonkho kungalimbikitse kugwiritsa ntchito anthu ambiri, kupanga chuma, ndikulimbikitsa dongosolo lapadziko lonse lamtendere, lolekerera, losiyanasiyana.
question: Kodi Hobson adatsutsa bwanji kuti achotse dziko la imperialism?

context: France idatenga ulamuliro wa Algeria mu 1830 koma idayamba mwakhama kumanganso ufumu wake wapadziko lonse lapansi pambuyo pa 1850, ndikuyang'ana kwambiri kumpoto ndi kumadzulo kwa Africa, komanso ku South-East Asia, ndi kugonjetsa kwina ku Central ndi East Africa, komanso South Pacific. Republicans, poyamba adana ndi ufumu, adayamba kuthandizira pamene Germany idayamba kumanga ufumu wake wa atsamunda. Pamene unakula, ufumu watsopanowo unatenga maudindo a malonda ndi France, kupereka zipangizo ndi kugula zinthu zopangidwa, limodzinso ndi kupereka ulemu ku dziko la amayi ndi kufalitsa chitukuko ndi chinenero cha Chifalansa limodzinso ndi Chikatolika. Inaperekanso anthu ofunika kwambiri pa nkhondo zonse ziŵiri zapadziko lonse.

context: Gulu lomwe lidzakhala The United Methodist Church linayamba pakati pa zaka za zana la 18 mkati mwa Church of England. Kagulu kakang'ono ka ophunzira, kuphatikizapo John Wesley, Charles Wesley ndi George Whitefield, adakumana ku Oxford University. Iwo ankasumika maganizo pa phunziro la Baibulo, kuphunzira malemba mwadongosolo ndi kukhala ndi moyo woyera. Ophunzira ena adawanyoza, ndikunena kuti iwo anali "Holy Club" ndi "a Methodist", pokhala adongosolo komanso mwatsatanetsatane mwapadera mu phunziro lawo la Baibulo, malingaliro ndi moyo wodziletsa. M'kupita kwa nthaŵi, otchedwa Methodist anayambitsa mabungwe kapena makalasi a mamembala a Tchalitchi cha England amene ankafuna kukhala ndi moyo wachipembedzo kwambiri.

context: Mamembala a Mpingo wa United Methodist omwe amadziwika ndi udindo wothandizira moyo akonzekera kukhala Taskforce of United Methodists on Abortion and Sexuality (TUMAS) kuti apititse patsogolo udindo wawo mkati mwa chipembedzocho. Panali kuyesa kuchotsa umembala wa United Methodist Church mu Religious Coalition for Reproductive Choice pa Msonkhano wawo Wamkulu, womwe unachitikira mu Meyi 2012, ndi pempho lomwe linadutsa m'komiti yaing'ono ya malamulo ndi mavoti a komiti, koma sanapatsidwe voti yapansi. Rev. Paul T. Stallsworth, pulezidenti wa Taskforce of United Methodists on Abortion and Sexuality adati "anali ndi zifukwa zonse zokhulupirira" kuti nthumwi zolimbikitsa moyo zikanapambana mavoti apansi.

context: M'mbiri yakale, Tchalitchi cha Methodist chathandizira gulu la kudziletsa. John Wesley anachenjeza za kuopsa kwa kumwa mowa mu ulaliki wake wotchuka, "Kugwiritsa Ntchito Ndalama," komanso m'kalata yake yopita kwa chidakwa. Panthaŵi ina, atumiki a Methodist anafunikira kulonjeza kuti sadzamwa mowa ndipo analimbikitsa mipingo yawo kuchita chimodzimodzi. Lero Tchalitchi cha United Methodist chimanena kuti "chimatsimikizira chithandizo chathu chokhalapo kwa nthawi yaitali cha kuleka kumwa mowa monga mboni yokhulupirika ya chikondi cha Mulungu chomasula ndi chowombola anthu." Ndipotu, Tchalitchi cha United Methodist chimagwiritsa ntchito madzi a mphesa opanda chotupitsa mu sakalamenti ya Chikumbutso Choyera, motero "kusonyeza nkhawa ya ubusa yobwezeretsa zidakwa, kuthandiza kutenga nawo mbali kwa ana ndi achinyamata, komanso kuthandizira umboni wa tchalitchi cha kuleka." Komanso, mu 2011 ndi 2012, The United Methodist Church's General Board of Church and Society idapempha onse a United Methodist kuti aleke kumwa mowa pa Lent.

context: Mpingo wa United Methodist umatsutsa kulembedwa usilikali ngati wosagwirizana ndi chiphunzitso cha Malemba. Chifukwa chake, Tchalitchi chimathandizira ndikuwonjezera utumiki wake kwa anthu omwe chifukwa cha chikumbumtima chawo amatsutsa nkhondo yonse, kapena nkhondo iliyonse, ndipo chifukwa chake amakana kutumikira m'gulu lankhondo kapena kugwirizana ndi machitidwe a kulembedwa usilikali. Komabe, Tchalitchi cha United Methodist chimachirikizanso ndi kufutukula utumiki wake kwa anthu amene mwachikumbumtima chawo amasankha kutumikira m'gulu lankhondo kapena kulandira ntchito ina. Mpingo umanenanso kuti "monga Akhristu amadziwa kuti njira yochitira nkhondo, kapena njira yosachitapo kanthu nthawi zonse imakhala yolungama pamaso pa Mulungu."

context: Atsogoleri achipembedzo oyamba a Methodist adaikidwa ndi John Wesley, wansembe wa Church of England, chifukwa cha mavuto omwe adayambitsidwa ndi American Revolution yomwe idalekanitsa a Methodist ku States ndi Tchalitchi cha England ndi masakalamenti ake. Masiku ano, atsogoleri achipembedzo amaphatikizapo amuna ndi akazi amene amaikidwa ndi mabishopu kukhala akulu ndi madikoni ndipo amaikidwa m'mautumiki osiyanasiyana. Akulu mu Mpingo wa United Methodist amatsutsa ndipo amagonjera ulamuliro ndi kusankhidwa kwa mabishopu awo. Nthawi zambiri amatumikira monga abusa m'mipingo yakumaloko. Madikoni ali mu utumiki wautumiki ndipo akhoza kutumikira monga oimba, mapemphero, aphunzitsi, oyang'anira bizinesi, ndi mbali zina zingapo. Akulu ndi madikoni amafunika kupeza digiri ya master (nthawi zambiri M.Div.), kapena digiri ina yofanana, asanatumizidwe kenako pamapeto pake kuikidwa. Akulu omwe amagwirizana kwathunthu ndi membala wa Msonkhano wawo Wapachaka wa Order of Elders. Momwemonso, dikoni aliyense wogwirizana mokwanira ndi membala wa Msonkhano wawo Wapachaka Order of Deacons.

context: Atsamunda a ku Britain anali ochuluka kuposa a ku France 20 mpaka 1 ndi anthu pafupifupi 1.5 miliyoni omwe anali m'mphepete mwa gombe la kum'mawa kwa kontinenti, kuchokera ku Nova Scotia ndi Newfoundland kumpoto, kupita ku Georgia kum'mwera. Ambiri mwa makoloni akale anali ndi malo omwe amafika kutali kwambiri kumadzulo, popeza kukula kwa kontinenti sikunadziwike panthawi yomwe zikalata zawo zachigawo zinaperekedwa. context: Ngakhale Washington asanabwerere, Dinwiddie adatumiza gulu la amuna 40 motsogozedwa ndi William Trent kumalo amenewo, komwe m'miyezi yoyambirira ya 1754 adayamba kumanga linga laling'ono losungidwa. Bwanamkubwa Duquesne anatumiza magulu owonjezera a ku France motsogozedwa ndi Claude-Pierre Pecaudy de Contrecœur kuti akapulumutse Saint-Pierre panthawi yomweyo, ndipo Contrecœur adatsogolera amuna 500 kumwera kuchokera ku Fort Venango pa Epulo 5, 1754. Magulu awa atafika ku linga pa Epulo 16, Contrecœur mowolowa manja adalola gulu laling'ono la Trent kuchoka. Anagula zida zawo zomangira kuti apitirize kumanga zomwe zinakhala Fort Duquesne.

context: Washington atabwerera ku Williamsburg, Dinwiddie adamulamula kuti atsogolere gulu lalikulu kuti lithandize Trent pantchito yake. Ali panjira, Washington adadziwa za kubwerera kwa Trent. Popeza Tanaghrisson adalonjeza kuthandizira a British, Washington idapitiliza kupita ku Fort Duquesne ndikukumana ndi mtsogoleri wa Mingo. Kuphunzira za gulu lofufuza la ku France m'deralo, Washington, ndi Tanaghrisson ndi gulu lake, adadabwitsa anthu aku Canada pa Meyi 28 mu zomwe zidadziwika kuti Nkhondo ya Jumonville Glen. Iwo anapha anthu ambiri a ku Canada, kuphatikizapo mkulu wawo, Joseph Coulon de Jumonville, yemwe mutu wake ukunenedwa kuti unagawanika ndi Tanaghrisson ndi tomahawk. Wolemba mbiri Fred Anderson akunena kuti Tanaghrisson anali kuchitapo kanthu kuti apeze chithandizo cha anthu a ku Britain ndi kupezanso ulamuliro pa anthu ake. Iwo anali ndi chizoloŵezi chochirikiza Afalansa, amene anali ndi maunansi a malonda kwa nthaŵi yaitali. Mmodzi mwa amuna a Tanaghrisson adauza Contrecoeur kuti Jumonville adaphedwa ndi mfuti zaku Britain.

context: Newcastle adamulowetsa m'malo mwake mu Januware 1756 ndi Lord Loudoun, ndi Major General James Abercrombie ngati wachiwiri wake. Palibe aliyense wa amuna ameneŵa amene anali ndi chidziŵitso chochuluka cha kampeni monga maofesala atatu amene France anatumiza ku North America. Asilikali okhazikika a ku France adafika ku New France mu Meyi 1756, motsogozedwa ndi Major General Louis-Joseph de Montcalm ndipo adathandizidwa ndi Chevalier de Lévis ndi Colonel François-Charles de Bourlamaque, onse odziwa ntchito kuchokera ku Nkhondo ya Austrian Succession. context: Aristotle anapereka kukambitsirana kwa filosofi za lingaliro la mphamvu monga mbali yofunika kwambiri ya chilengedwe cha Aristotelian. Malinga ndi malingaliro a Aristotle, bwalo lapadziko lapansi linali ndi zinthu zinayi zomwe zimabwera kupuma pa "malo achilengedwe" osiyanasiyana mmenemo. Aristotle ankakhulupirira kuti zinthu zosasunthika padziko lapansi, zomwe zimapangidwa makamaka ndi zinthu zapadziko lapansi ndi madzi, zimakhala m'malo ake achilengedwe pansi ndipo zidzakhalabe choncho ngati zitasiyidwa zokha. Anasiyanitsa pakati pa chizoloŵezi chachibadwa cha zinthu kuti zipeze "malo awo achilengedwe" (mwachitsanzo, kuti matupi olemera agwe), zomwe zinapangitsa kuti "kuyenda kwachilengedwe", ndi kayendedwe kosakhala kwachilengedwe kapena kokakamiza, komwe kumafuna kupitiliza kugwiritsa ntchito mphamvu. Chiphunzitsochi, chozikidwa pa zochitika za tsiku ndi tsiku za momwe zinthu zimayendera, monga kugwiritsa ntchito mphamvu yofunikira kuti ngolo iziyenda, inali ndi vuto la malingaliro kuwerengera khalidwe la zipolopolo, monga kuuluka kwa mivi. Malo omwe woponya mivi amasunthira projectile anali kumayambiriro kwa kuwuluka, ndipo pamene projectile idayenda mlengalenga, palibe chifukwa chodziwika bwino chomwe chimachitapo kanthu. Aristotle ankadziwa za vutoli ndipo adanena kuti mpweya wosamutsidwa kudzera m'njira ya projectile umanyamula chipolopolocho kupita ku cholinga chake. Mafotokozedwe awa amafuna kupitiliza ngati mpweya kuti asinthe malo ambiri.

Malo omwe woponya mivi amasunthira projectile anali kumayambiriro kwa kuwuluka, ndipo pamene projectile idayenda mlengalenga, palibe chifukwa chodziwika bwino chomwe chimachitapo kanthu. Aristotle ankadziwa za vutoli ndipo adanena kuti mpweya wosamutsidwa kudzera m'njira ya projectile umanyamula chipolopolocho kupita ku cholinga chake. Mafotokozedwe awa amafuna kupitiliza ngati mpweya kuti asinthe malo ambiri.
question: Kodi Aristotle ankakhulupirira kuti malo achilengedwe a zinthu zapadziko lapansi ndi zamadzi?

context: Aristotle anapereka kukambitsirana kwa filosofi za lingaliro la mphamvu monga mbali yofunika kwambiri ya chilengedwe cha Aristotelian. Malinga ndi malingaliro a Aristotle, bwalo lapadziko lapansi linali ndi zinthu zinayi zomwe zimabwera kupuma pa "malo achilengedwe" osiyanasiyana mmenemo. Aristotle ankakhulupirira kuti zinthu zosasunthika padziko lapansi, zomwe zimapangidwa makamaka ndi zinthu zapadziko lapansi ndi madzi, zimakhala m'malo ake achilengedwe pansi ndipo zidzakhalabe choncho ngati zitasiyidwa zokha. Aristotle ankadziwa za vutoli ndipo adanena kuti mpweya wosamutsidwa kudzera m'njira ya projectile umanyamula chipolopolocho kupita ku cholinga chake. Mafotokozedwe awa amafuna kupitiliza ngati mpweya kuti asinthe malo ambiri.
question: Kodi Aristotle anatchula chiyani kuti kuyenda mokakamiza?

context: Kukula kwa ziphunzitso zazikulu za mphamvu kunapitilira motsatira mgwirizano wa malingaliro osiyanasiyana. Mwachitsanzo, Isaac Newton anagwirizanitsa mphamvu imene imachititsa kuti zinthu zigwe pamwamba pa Dziko lapansi ndi mphamvu imene imachititsa kuti zinthu ziziyenda bwino m'chiphunzitso chake cha mphamvu yokoka. Michael Faraday ndi James Clerk Maxwell adawonetsa kuti mphamvu zamagetsi ndi maginito zinali zogwirizana kudzera mu chiphunzitso chimodzi chokhazikika cha electromagnetism. M'zaka za zana la 20, chitukuko cha makina a quantum chinapangitsa kumvetsetsa kwamakono kuti mphamvu zitatu zoyambirira zofunikira (zonse kupatula mphamvu yokoka) ndizowonetsera zinthu (fermions) zomwe zimagwirizana posinthana tinthu tomwe totchedwa gauge bosons. Chitsanzo chokhazikika ichi cha physics ya tinthu timapereka kufanana pakati pa mphamvu ndipo chinapangitsa asayansi kulosera kugwirizana kwa mphamvu zofooka ndi zamagetsi mu chiphunzitso cha electroweak pambuyo pake chotsimikiziridwa ndi kuyang'ana. Mapangidwe athunthu a chitsanzo chokhazikika akuwonetseratu njira ya Higgs yomwe siinawonedwe, koma zowonera monga kugwedezeka kwa neutrino zikuwonetsa kuti chitsanzo chokhazikika ndi chosakwanira. Chiphunzitso Chachikulu Chogwirizana cholola kuphatikiza kwa kuyanjana kwa electroweak ndi mphamvu yamphamvu chimagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati kuthekera ndi ziphunzitso zosankhidwa monga supersymmetry zomwe zimapangidwira kuti zikhale ndi mavuto ena omwe sanathetsedwe mu physics. Akatswiri a physics akuyesetsabe kupanga zitsanzo zodziyimira pawokha zomwe zingaphatikize kuyanjana konse kofunikira kukhala chiphunzitso cha chirichonse. Einstein adayesa ndipo adalephera kuyesayesa kumeneku, koma pakali pano njira yotchuka kwambiri yoyankhira funsoli ndi chiphunzitso cha chingwe.: 212-219

question: Kodi ndi mtundu wanji wa chitsanzo cha physics chomwe Einstein analephera kupanga?

context: Kuyambira pamenepo, ndipo pakadali pano, general relativity yavomerezedwa ngati chiphunzitso chomwe chimafotokoza bwino mphamvu yokoka. Mu GR, mphamvu yokoka siimawonedwa ngati mphamvu, koma m'malo mwake, zinthu zomwe zimayenda momasuka m'minda yokoka zimayenda pansi pa inertia yawo m'mizere yowongoka kudzera mu danga-nthawi yokhotakhota - yofotokozedwa ngati njira yaifupi kwambiri ya danga-nthawi pakati pa zochitika ziwiri za danga-nthawi. Kuchokera pamalingaliro a chinthucho, kayendedwe konse kamachitika ngati kuti palibe mphamvu yokoka iliyonse. Ndi kokha poyang'ana kayendedwe m'lingaliro lapadziko lonse lapansi kuti kupindika kwa danga-nthawi kumatha kuwonedwa ndipo mphamvuyo imatengedwa kuchokera ku njira yokhotakhota ya chinthucho. Choncho, njira yowongoka mu danga-nthawi imawoneka ngati mzere wokhotakhota mumlengalenga, ndipo imatchedwa ballistic trajectory ya chinthucho. Mwachitsanzo, mpira woponyedwa kuchokera pansi umayenda mu parabola, monga momwe zilili m'munda wofanana wa mphamvu yokoka. Njira yake ya danga-nthawi (pamene gawo lowonjezera la ct likuwonjezeredwa) ndi pafupifupi mzere wolunjika, wokhotakhota pang'ono (wokhala ndi utali wa kupindika kwa dongosolo la zaka zochepa zowunikira). Nthawi yochokera ku kusintha kwa chinthucho ndi zomwe timatcha "mphamvu yokoka".

Tensor yopanikizika imawerengera mphamvu zomwe zimayambitsa mitundu yonse (mapindiki) kuphatikizanso kupanikizika kwamakokedwe ndi kupanikizika.: 133-134: 38-1-38-11
question: Kodi ndi chiyani chomwe chimagwirizanitsidwa ndi mphamvu zabwinobwino?
